title: WT11-A-AI SILICON LABS, BLUETOOTH MODULE, WT12, IWRAP 3
overview:
WT11 is a next-generation, class 1, Bluetooth 2.0 + EDR module. It introduces three times faster data rates compared to the existing Bluetooth 1.2 modules even with a lower power consumption. WT11 is a highly integrated and sophisticated Bluetooth module, containing all the necessary elements from Bluetooth radio antenna to a fully implemented protocol stack. Therefore WT11 provides an ideal solution for developers who want to integrate Bluetooth wireless technology into their designs with limited knowledge of Bluetooth and RF technologies. WT11 module combined with Bluegiga's complete development, testing and verification services and excellent developer support; OEMs and designers ensure that their products reach the market rapidly and cost-efficiently in relation to time and resources. Bluegiga has extensive in-house knowledge of both software and hardware, offering customers a single point of contact to all Bluetooth related issues.
	


    
          
    Bluetooth Class 1
          
    Enhanced Data Rates with data throughput up to 2-3Mbps
          
    Support for Adaptive Frequency Hopping (AFH) and 802.11 co-existence
          
    USB version 2.0
          
    UART with bypass mode
          
    8Mbits of flash memory
          
    Supported profiles: SPP, HFP, OBEX OPP, DUN, HCI, HID
          
    Industrial temperature range from -40°C to +85°C
          
    Simple iWRAP™ firmware for controlling Bluetooth wireless technology
          
    Fully qualified end product with Bluetooth 2.0 + EDR, CE, FCC and IC

                        Portable Devices, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics,

title: WP500100S-01 LANTRONIX, Serial to Ethernet Conversion Module
overview:
WP500100S-01 is a WiPort NR Sample with AES1 WiPort NR enclosed, most compact integrated solution available to add Ethernet networking to any device with a serial interface. Using this integrated hardware and software module, you will add to your profits by significantly reducing product development time, risk and cost. With a high level of integration, in a compact package, WiPort NR Device Server features a Lantronix DSTni x86 Ethernet Processor SoC, memory, a 10/100 Ethernet transceiver and dual high-speed serial ports. All of this combines to give you a complete ready-to-use network enabling solution. Total pin compatibility with Lantronix's WiPort 802.11 wireless module enables a single board design that can be either wired networking or wireless networking ready using either the WiPort NR or the WiPort. To enable access to a local network or the Internet, The WiPort NR integrates a fully developed TCP/IP network stack and OS. The WiPort NR also includes an embedded web server.
	


    
          
    Complete integrated RoHS compliant solution
          
    Supports 802.11 WLAN or Ethernet connectivity, Serial to 802.11b/g conversion
          
    Wired Ethernet to 802.11 b/g WLAN Bridging
          
    Stable, field proven TCP/IP protocol suite and web-based application framework
          
    Optional End-to-End 128, 192 and 256bit AES Encryption
          
    WPA PSK TKIP security, 128bit WEP encryption
          
    Dual serial ports and 11 General Purpose Input/Output (GPIO) pins
          
    Easy configuration through a web interface and Easy installation of customised web pages
          
    Embedded web server, e-mail alerts and high performance data throughput
          
    Upgradeable firmware via the network or serial port
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Security

title: WLM100 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, WLAN MOD, 802.11B, 2.4GHZ, U.FL CONN
overview:
WLM100 is a low power 802.11b WLAN module with ext. power amplifier, ext. antenna connector. The WLM100 fully certified module offers a quick, easy and cost effective way for device and appliances manufacturers to add WiFi capabilities to their products. The module provides multiple serial UART or SPI interfaces, enabling connection to any embedded design utilizing a 8/16/32bit microcontroller via simple commands. The WLM100 is an ideal solution for organizations with limited or no WiFi or RF expertise, as it not only dramatically reduces RF design time but also removes the burden of testing and certification, allowing customers to focus on their core application, product or expertise. The module supports data rates up to 11Mbps, is compliant with 802.11b and meets regulatory and WiFi Alliance requirements.
	


    
          
    Infrastructure or Adhoc mode
          
    Multiple UART and SPI interfaces
          
    Supports SPI Master and Slave
          
    Up to 11Mbps in SPI Master Mode
          
    Up to 3Mbps in SPI Slave Mode
          
    Up to 921.6Kbps on UART
          
    Full WiFi stack including WPS and optional networking stack and services
          
    802.11i Security
          
    WEP, WPA, WPA2-PSK, Enterprise
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Medical, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: WL1837MODGIMOCT TEXAS INSTRUMENTS, BLUETOOTH MODULE, V4.1, 100MBPS
overview:
The WL1837MODGIMOCT from Texas Instruments is a WiLink™ 8 industrial dual band, 2x2 MIMO Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and Bluetooth smart (low energy) module in 100 pin QFM (MOC). The certified WiLink 8 module from TI offers high throughput and extended range along with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth coexistence in a power optimized design. The WL1837MOD is a Wi-Fi, dual-band, 2.4 and 5GHz module solution with two antennas supporting Industrial temperature grade. The device is FCC, IC, ETSI/CE, and TELEC certified for AP (with DFS support) and client. TI offers drivers for high level operating systems, such as Linux® and Android™. Additional drivers, such as WinCE and RTOS which includes QNX, Nucleus, ThreadX and FreeRTOS are supported through third parties.
	


    
          
    Integrates RF, power amplifiers (PAs), clock, RF switches, filters, passives and power management
          
    Quick hardware design with TI module collateral and reference designs
          
    13.3mm x 13.4mm x 2mm small form factor
          
    FCC, IC, ETSI/CE and TELEC certified with chip antennas
          
    WLAN baseband processor and RF transceiver support of IEEE Std 802.11a, 802.11b, 802.11g, 802.11n
          
    Bluetooth 4.1 compliance and CSA2 support, DC supply range for all modes from 2.9V to 4.8V
          
    Configurable wake on WLAN filters to only wake up the system
          
    Reduces design overhead
          
    Different provisioning methods for in-home devices connectivity to Wi-Fi in one step
          
    Operating temperature range from -40°C to 85°C
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Multimedia, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Automation & Process Control

title: WIRELESSCOM/G10 TELTONIKA, MODULE, GSM / GPRS / CSD, RS232
overview:
WirelessCom/G10 is a device designed for communication with remote devices which have RS232 ports. RS232 interface is one of the industries leading standard. This interface can be found in a large variety of devices like, data loggers, POS terminals, vending machines, PLCs, control panels, various meters, switches, routers and the list goes on.  It is a frequent case when such devices are present in remote locations and there is a need to monitor/control/collect data. In such cases GSM network coupled with GPRS/CSD service can provide a very reliable wireless solution.  Teltonika WirelessCom/G10 is ready-to-go solution for such situations. It acts as a transparent RS232 port. Thus you would be able to see your devices as directly connected to the computer, no matter how far you are from your devices.
	


    
          
    Provides transparent GPRS/CSD connection
          
    Receive SMS alerts when exceptions occur in device
          
    No drivers required, hence works with any device/machine/equipment/computer
          
    simple and informative configuration menu
          
    Configurable through any terminal software
          
    Hardware reset from DTR pin (optional)
          
    Device is remotely configurable through GPRS/CSD/SMS
          
    Access only through authorised phone numbers , Up to 5 configurable authorised phone numbers 
          
    Auto PIN feature, no need to enter SIM card PIN after restart, Password protected configuration 
          
    Supports various data formats, Firmware update possibility, CHAP/PAP authentication supported
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Portable Devices, 
                    
                        Security

                        
          
    

    
       Contents
        
            Wireless COM/G10, AC/DC adapter, RS232 serial cable, External GSM antenna, CD with User Manual, Leaflet "Quick Start Guide".

title: RN-240F MICROCHIP, BLUETOOTH MODULE V2.1, CLASS 1, 464KBPS
RM024-S50-C-01 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, RF MODULE, RAMP, 2.4GHZ, SMT, UFL CONN
overview:
This module is designed to provide robust wireless communications for any number of applications requiring a wireless transport for serial data. The RAMP (Range Amplified MultiPoint) module feature a Frequency Hopping Spread Spectrum (FHSS) protocol for excellent interference and multipath immunity. Server/Client architecture allows for more than 16 million clients to be addressed and communicating within the network. The RM024-S50-C-01 is based on Laird Technologies LT2510 core technology, enhanced with a new RF front end for improved sleep, improved link budget and a switchable antenna output.
	


    
          
    Retries and acknowledgements
          
    Configurable network parameters
          
    Multiple generic I/O
          
    280 kbps or 500 kbps RF data stream
          
    Idle current draw of 9.5 mA, sleep current of 50 µA
          
    Software selectable interface baud rates from 1200 bps to 460.8 kbps
          
    Upgradable FW through serial port
          
    Low cost, low power, and small size
          
    Ideal for high volume, portable, and battery powered applications
          
    Qualified for Industrial temperatures
          
    
    
    
          
    Advanced configuration available using AT commands
          
    Easy to use Configuration and Test Utility software
          
    u.FL antenna
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: RM024-S10-M-20 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, RF Transceiver Module, 0.01W, 2.4-2.4835Ghz
RM024-S10-C-20 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, RF Transceiver Module, 18Dbm, 2.4835 GHz
overview:
The RM024-S10-C-20 is a SMT ISM-band multipoint Wireless Module built on the core technology and RF expertise of Laird's seven generations of frequency hopping spread spectrum (FHSS) devices. An improved RF frontend and a long list of configurable options yields the best of both worlds and very low power consumption and extremely long range. It excels in serial cable replacement scenarios, signage, agricultural applications and more. It provides the most reliable wireless link in the ISM band with several inbuilt mechanisms to reject interference, boost throughput and achieve unparalleled range. It is suitable for use with serial cable replacement and digital signage/display applications.
	


    
          
    Improved RF frontend
          
    2.4GHz FHSS radio, 280 or 500kbps data rate
          
    Optional external antenna and range of 2.5miles (4km)
          
    Unique server/client implementation
          
    Fully configurable with a maximum network size of 16 million devices
          
    Robust interference avoidance due to FHSS implementation
          
    Strong immunity to interference and multipath signals
          
    Access to the laird configuration utility
          
    Complete software utility for configuration and testing
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Automation & Process Control, 
                    
                        Wireless

overview:

The card is based on TI's Tag-it TM Smart Label technology and allows interoperability of products from multiple manufacturers. With a user memory of 2K bits organised in 64 blocks the 13.56MHz card enables advanced solutions in a variety of markets. This card can be easily customised and personalised using standard thermo transfer printers. In application where the card needs to be used with a clip, we recommend a pouch since punching a hole would destroy the product. In addition to the functionality defined in the ISO/IEC 15693 standard, the Vicinity Card Transponder also supports an extended set of command options, providing more system flexibility.

title: RFM95W-915S2 HOPERF, RF TRANSCEIVER MODULE, 915MHZ, 13DBM
overview:
The RFM95W-915S2 from Hoperf is a Lora™ RFM95W transceiver module at 915MHz band in SMD package. It feature LoRa™ long range modem that provides ultra long range spread spectrum communication and high interference immunity whilst minimising current consumption. Using patented LoRa™ modulation technique RFM95W can achieve a sensitivity of over -148dBm. The high sensitivity combined with the integrated +20dBm power amplifier yields industry leading link budget making it optimal for any application requiring range or robustness. LoRa™ also provides significant advantages in both blocking and selectivity over conventional modulation techniques, solving the traditional design compromise between range, interference immunity and energy consumption. Device also support high performance (G)FSK modes for systems including WMBus, IEEE802.15.4g. The RFM95W deliver exceptional phase noise, selectivity, receiver linearity and IIP3 for significantly lower current consumption t

    Programmable bit rate up to 300Kbps, 127dB dynamic range RSSI

    Low RX current of 10.3mA, 200nA register retention
          
    FSK, GFSK, MSK, GMSK, LoRa™ and OOK modulation

title: V2DIP2-48 FTDI, USB Interface, USB Host Interface, VNC2-48Q, SPI, UART, 5 V
overview:
V2DIP2-48 is a 48pin VNC2 based development modules with two USB connectors. The module is targeted for prototyping with the VNC2 and for application integration to enable USB capability within a finished product design. The VNC2 is the second of FTDI's Vinculum family of Embedded dual USB host controller devices. The VNC2 device provides USB Host interfacing capability for a variety of different USB device classes including support for BOMS, Printer, HID. For mass storage devices such as USB Flash drives, VNC2 also transparently handles the FAT file structure. Communication with non USB devices such as a low cost microcontroller is accomplished via either UART, SPI or parallel FIFO interfaces. The VNC2 provides a new cost effective solution for providing USB Host capability into products that previously did not have the hardware resources available. The VNC2 supports the capability to enable customers to develop custom firmware using the Vinculum II development software tool suite.
	


    
          
    Uses FTDI's VNC2-48Q embedded USB host controller IC device
          
    Two USB 'A' type socket to interface with USB peripheral devices
          
    Jumper selectable UART, parallel FIFO with or SPI MCU interfaces
          
    UART, parallel FIFO with and SPI interfaces can be programmed to a choice of available I/O pins
          
    Single 5V supply input from DIL connectors or 5V supplied via USB VBUS slave interface or debugger
          
    All VNC2 signals available on 0.6" wide. 0.1" pitch DIL male connectors
          
    Power and traffic indicator LED's
          
    Debugger interface pin available on DIL pins or via 6way male header
          
    Firmware upgrades via UART or debugger interface pin header
          
    Development tool supports compiler, linker and debugger tools complete within an IDE
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Portable Devices, 
                    
                        Medical, 
                    
                        Automation & Process Control

title: UP501 FASTRAX, GPS MODULE, MTK3329, PATCH ANT
overview:
The UP501 is a GPS receiver module with embedded GPS antenna. It enables high performance navigation in the most stringent applications and solid fix even in harsh GPS visibility environments. It is ideally suited for navigation systems, asset tracking devices and battery operated consumer products. The UP501 is also an ideal receiver for GPS mouse applications, due to its compact design and easy interfacing. Extremely high acquisition sensitivity enables fast position fix in harsh urban canyons or blocking environments, eliminating the need for an external antenna. An internal backup battery (optional) allows very fast TTFF even when the module has been completely powered off by the host system. This enables extremely efficient customizable power save modes without compromising TTFF performance. Space and costs are reduced due to the cutting edge technology in the UP501 receiver. The embedded GPS antenna and optional on board backup battery allow easy integration to host systems.
	


    
          
    Embedded 18mm patch antenna
          
    Low power consumption
          
    Ultra high sensitivity of -165dBm
          
    Configurable fix update rate up to 10Hz

    Flash memory

TXL2-433-9 RADIOMETRIX, RADIO MODEM, 433.925MHZ, 9.6KBPS
overview:
TXL2-433-9 is a UHF multichannel transparent data link Transmitter, operating on European 433MHz ISM band. This module will take care of preamble, synchronisation, bit balancing and error checking along with automatic noise squelching. TXL2-433-9 is compatible with RXL2-433-9 . The TXL2/RXL2 pair provides a one-way radio link. Provided no 2 devices attempt to transmit simultaneously no further restrictions on data transmission need be made. Includes all transmit timing, valid data identification and datastream buffering is conducted by the units. synchronisation and framing words in the packet prevent the receiver outputting garbage in the absence of wanted RF signal or presence of interference. For multiple radio systems a TXL2/RXL2 can be set to 1 of 8 unique addresses and having unique addresses, TXL2/RXL2 operated on one of 5 pre-set frequencies in the 433MHz band. These frequencies are non-overlapping and SIMultaneous operation of TXL2/RXL2 pairs in different channel.

title: RF650-868 RF SOLUTIONS, RF MOD, TXRX, FSK, 868MHZ, 100KBPS
overview:
RF650-868 is a Smart Radio Transceiver Module operates at 868MHz. It provides a reliable wireless communications for the transfer of data at Gaussian Frequency Shift Keying (GFSK), Manchester encoded, RF data rates of up to 100kbps. Their unique features of narrow band operation and user channel selection combined with excellent interference rejection make them an ideal choice for next generation application. The transceivers have the functions of a complete radio modem and simply require CMOS/TTL data at the transmit input and the corresponding transceiver(s) output the same data. Preamble and CRC are automatically generated and added to the RF transmission. This module operate with user selectable channels. The RF650-868 can use any channel in 100kHz steps. The module use a crystal controlled design which provides narrow band performance and is far superior to other wideband 'SAW' based designs.
	


    
          
    Smart Radio Transceiver Module, 868MHz
          
    Intelligent modem RF Transceiver
          
    Operates up to 250 meters range
          
    Selectable 'Narrowband' RF channels
          
    Crystal controlled RF design
          
    Serial data interface with handshake
          
    Host data rates up to 38,400 Baud
          
    Very stable operating frequency
          
    Low profile ceramic DIL package
          
    Small size and low power requirements

title: RF600T RF SOLUTIONS, RF Serial Comms Controller, DIP18
overview:
RF600T is a Transceiver IC 18pin PDIP Package, It provides a simple interface between TTL level asynchronous serial data sources and standard transceiver RF modules with minimal interface required. The device allows for either broadcast or addressed point to point modes of operation and is simple to use with minimum interface requirements. RF600T performs all the necessary data manipulation and encryption required by the Radio module to achieve a reliable radio link whilst providing a simple data interface to the users controller. The device has been designed to obtain the maximum range from the Radio medium using automatic data packet generation with 'Manchester' encoding and CRC based error checking. In addition operates in addressed mode, Automatically retries ensuring that the host is informed of successful or failed data packet delivery. RF600T uses control lines to handle the flow of data to and from the host and incorporates a 190 byte data buffer.
	


    
          
    18 pin DIP/SOIC package
          
    Operate with 2 digital telemetry lines (addressed mode only)
          
    Asynchronous serial host interface
          
    Manchester modulation

title: RCM120 ENOCEAN, RADIO MODULE, RX, 868.3MHZ, WHIP ANT
overview:
RCM120 is a multifunctional EnOcean receiver module used to receive and to process telegrams generated, transmitted by EnOcean radio transmitters. This module can be easily integrated into control and switching units for the implementation of different application specific system solutions. RCM120 has logic output signals controlled by EnOcean PTM piezo switches, tubular motor control (up/down with slat acting, 1 or 2 motors) or push button (pressed/released). The RCM modules are part of a powerful RF system solution from EnOcean for operation and control application. The RCM modules operate together with the following further EnOcean components such as PTM (battery less radio switches), STM (battery less radio sensors), CTM (remote control) and TCM (bi-directional IT interface).
	


    
          
    Basic signal output function "pushbutton" of 1 channel
          
    Basic signal output function "tubular motor control" (UP/DOWN with slat acting): 1 or 2 channel
          
    Easy to operate
          
    CE certified and conformed by R&TTE EU-Directive on radio equipment
          
    Pre-installed 9 cm whip antenna, external 50 Ohm antenna mountable
          
    6 inputs for set up operating and learning modes
          
    4 outputs, their function depends on the selected operation mode
          
    RSSI output
          
    Receiver frequency range up to 868.3MHz , channel bandwidth is 280kHz , sensitivity is -95dBm
          
    5VDC ± 5 % / 29mA maximum current, without output load

title: RC2500HP-RC232 RADIOCRAFTS, RF MOD, TXRX, GFSK / MSK, WHIP ANT
overview:
The RC2500HP-RC232 is a 2.45GHz high power multichannel RF transceiver module. It is a compact surface mounted module for multichannel GFSK/MSK operation in the 2.45GHz ISM band. The module is completely shielded and precertified for operation under the European radio regulations for license free use and complies with FCC (US), WPC (India) and ARIB (Japan) regulations. The module contains a communication controller with embedded RC232 protocol software, a high performance RF transceiver, LNA and PA and an internal voltage regulator. This module offers a buffered packet radio in the RC232 embedded protocol. Using the buffered packet radio mode, all data to be sent is stored in the module before they are transmitted by the RF circuitry. The RF module can be set in SLEEP mode in order to reduce the power consumption.
	


    
          
    Multichannel GFSK and MSK
          
    Compact shielded module for SMD mounting
          
    Embedded RF protocol (RC232)
          
    Up to 1018byte data buffer
          
    83 channels at 2.400GHz to 2.483GHz
          
    Buffered mode
          
    2.4KBd to 230.4KBd UART baud rate
          
    1.2Kbit/s to 100Kb/s on air RF data rate
          
    Wide supply voltage range from 2.7V to 3.6V
          
    Small size (12.7mm x 25.4mm x 3.3mm)
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        Automotive

                        
          
    

Footnotes
Noisy external circuitry may under certain scenarios affect the transmitted signal on RC2500-RC232 module so precaution should be taken during the operation.

Warnings
ESD sensitive device, take proper precaution while handling the device.

title: RC1280 RADIOCRAFTS, RF MODULE, TXRX, FSK, UART, WHIP ANT
overview:
The RC1280 is a 868MHz to 870MHz narrow band multichannel RF transceiver module. This is a compact surface mounted high performance module for 25KHz narrow band FSK operation with embedded protocol. The module is completely shielded and precertified for operation under the European and US radio regulations for license free use. When used with quarter wave antennas a line of sight range of 2Km to 4Km can be achieved at 433MHz. The module contains a communication controller with embedded RC232 protocol software, a narrow band high performance RF transceiver and an internal voltage regulator. This module offers a buffered packet radio as well as an unbuffered transparent mode in the RC232 embedded protocol. Using the buffered packet radio mode, all data to be sent is stored in the module before they are transmitted by the RF circuitry. The module can be set in SLEEP mode or OFF mode in order to reduce the power consumption.
	


    
          
    Smallest in the world (12.7mm x 25.4mm x 3.5mm)
          
    Very low current consumption, 3nA OFF mode
          
    Embedded RC232 protocol
          
    Addressing and error check
          
    128byte data buffer and 80 channels
          
    Simple UART interface for easy RS232/RS422/RS485 wire replacement
          
    Compact shielded module for SMD mounting
          
    No external components
          
    No configuration required for single channel use
          
    Conforms with EU R&TTE directive (EN 300 220, EN 301 489, EN 60950) for 25KHz
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        Automotive

                        
          
    

Footnotes
When turning the module OFF by setting ON/OFF low, or switching VCC off, great care should be taken to ensure proper power on reset (POR).

Warnings
ESD sensitive device, take proper precaution while handling the device.

overview:
R7G-434-075 is an 434.075MHz FM narrow band SIL receiver. The R7G genesis modules represent the latest generation of narrow band transmitters. They retain the same industry standard footprints and are fully compatible with the T7 and R7 modules to enable incorporation into both new and existing designs. The improved sensitivity of the R7G enables a range of up to 1Km when used with the T7G modules. These narrow band UHF radio modules provide a very high RF performance for general purpose applications. The transmitter modules have a power output of up to 25mW. When combined with a very high receiver sensitivity these modules obtain a very high performance of range and reliability within the 433MHz band.

title: R001 WIRELESSTHINGS, XRF Wireless UART Serial Data Module, Radio Transceiver, 868/915Mhz, IEEE 802.15.4e, 2v-3.6v
overview:
The R001 is a XRF Wireless UART Serial Data Module has been designed to be very easy to use, offer unmatched value, exceptionally high performance, long range and with high levels of security. It appears as transparent serial, what you send, is what you receive and all the error checking, encoding, packetisation, CRC's are all done for you. It supports serial 2 wire serial updating for XRF firmware versions without a hardware programmer. The module can be loaded with personalities to turn it into a fully fledged wireless sensor. The module can be utilised as a combined 8051 micro and RF solution, this can be programmed using the free kick start version of IAR's C compiler and some open source C compilers.
	


    
          
    Build prototypes in minutes and hours, requires no complex programming
          
    Fits the XBee style connector, so is often a drop in replacement
          
    Whip antenna can be replaced with a straight or right angled
          
    RP-SMA for easy connection to external antennas to achieve greater distances
          
    128-bit AES encryption for high security
          
    Ultra low sleeping power consumption 0.2ua makes battery powering a reality
          
    Based on the Texas Instruments CC1110 combined 8051 micro and RF transceiver
          
    Firmware upgradable by 2 wire serial
          
    AT Commands to set firmware features
          
    Familiar XBee sized layout for easy connection to many existing systems
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        RF Communications

overview:

It's backwards compatible with the Q2686, and forwards compatible with 3G Q26 Extreme, which all run embedded M2M applications on an programmable ARM9 32bit processor at 104MHz. title: PTM 210U ENOCEAN, Pushbutton Transmitter Module, (40 mm x 40 mm x 11.2 mm), 902.875 Mhz
overview:
The PTM 210U is a Pushbutton RF Transmitter Module enables the implementation of wireless remote controls without batteries. Power is provided by a built-in electro-dynamic power generator. A common electro-dynamic energy transducer is actuated by a bow, which can be pushed from outside the module on the left or right by an appropriate pushbutton or switch rocker. When the energy bow is pushed down, electrical energy is created and a RF telegram is transmitted including a 32-bit module ID. Releasing the energy bow generates different telegram data, so every PTM telegram contains the information that the bow was pressed or released. In addition, the radio telegram transmits the operating status of 4 contact nipples when activating the bow. This enables the identification of up to 2 appropriate switch rockers or up to 4 single pushbuttons. Long or short pushbutton operation (the time between pushing and releasing the push button) can be easily detected by the receiver.
	


    
          
    Power generation by rocker operating electro-dynamic power generator
          
    Integrated PCB antenna
          
    902.875MHz Frequency band
          
    125kbps Data rate
          
    2 With 4 action states each (upper/lower pushbutton is pressed/released) channels
          
    1.8mm/typ. 8N Energy bow travel/operating force at room temperature
          
    -25 to +65°C Operating temperature
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        RF Communications

title: PRM241 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, RF MOD, TXRX, 900MHZ, CHIP ANT, PLUG
overview:
PRM241 is a 915MHz RF Module high power pluggable with integrated antenna. Based on proprietary FlexRF technology, this globally accepted module will exceed most OEM application and performance requirements. Embedded with robust server client protocol, the LT1110 permits an unlimited number of clients to synchronize to a single server for low latency communications. The server and all clients in a network can communicate with any radio in range via either addressed or broadcast packets. The configuration and test software allows OEMs to design and test networks to suit their applications. The enhanced API commands provide packet routing control and network intelligence. With its field proven proprietary FHSS RF protocol and increased penetration at 915MHz, the LT1110 rejects RF noise, excels in multipath scenarios, allows for co located systems, and provides an extremely reliable communication link.
	


    
          
    Very robust in the presence of interference
          
    915MHz for improved RF penetration
          
    High throughput
          
    Ultra low power consumption
          
    Long range capability
          
    Integrated battery monitor, temperature sensor, GPIOs and ADC
          
    Simple integration
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: MRF24J40MAT-I/RM MICROCHIP, MODULE, RF MODULE, 2.4 GHZ IEEE 802.15.4
MRF24J40MB-I/RM MICROCHIP, RF MODULE, TXRX, 250KBPS, PCB ANT
overview:
The MRF24J40MB is +20 dBm 2.4 GHz IEEE Std. 802.15.4™ compliant Transceiver Module, surface mount module with integrated crystal, internal voltage regulator, matching circuitry, Power Amplifier, Low Noise Amplifier and PCB antenna. The MRF24J40MB module operates in the non-licensed 2.4 GHz frequency band. The integrated module design frees the integrator from extensive RF and antenna design, and regulatory compliance testing, allowing quicker time to market. The MRF24J40MB module is compatible with Microchip's ZigBee®, MiWi™ and MiWi P2P software stacks. Each software stack is available as a free download, including source code, from the Microchip web site. The module interfaces to many popular Microchip PIC® microcontrollers via a 4-wire serial SPI interface, interrupt, wake, Reset, power and ground, The MRF24J40MB has an integrated PCB antenna, the MRF24J40MB is a surface mountable module
	


    
          
    IEEE Std. 802.15.4™ Compliant RF Transceiver
          
    Data Rate: 250 kbps
          
    Supports ZigBee®, MiWi™, MiWi P2P and Proprietary Wireless Networking Protocols
          
    Integrated Low Noise Amplifier, Power amplifier and PCB Antenna
          
    Compatible with Microchip microcontroller families
          
    Simple, Four-Wire SPI Interface
          
    ISM Band 2.405-2.475 GHz Operation
          
    Typical Sensitivity of -102 dBm with -23 dBm Maximum Input Level
          
    Typical Output Power of +20 dBm with 56 dB TX Power Control Range
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics

title: MPP300200SG-01 LANTRONIX, MODULE, MATCHPORT B/G PRO, 802.11
overview:
MPP300200SG-01 is an MatchPort b/g Pro wireless device server. The most secure, deployment ready Wi-Fi networking and web server module. MatchPort b/g Pro is a programmable device server that delivers Wi-Fi networking with the highest levels of security to virtually any electronic product. It provides affordable connectivity in the same compact, single socket form factor as other MatchPort modules, enabling OEMs to add Wi-Fi or wired Ethernet networking to their products on a single PCB design. Featuring the Lantronix evolution OS operating system, MatchPort's integrated CGI-capable web server transforms a standalone device into a networked product that can be managed remotely via a standard web browser. CGI capability enables users to remotely monitor and collect information from the device in real-time and send the information to dynamic web pages. MatchPort b/g Pro goes far beyond compliance with the popular 802.11i, WPA and WPA2 wireless security specifications.
	


    
          
    Adds Wi-Fi to devices with the highest WPA2/802.11i security and authentication protocols
          
    Lantronix SmartRoam technology provides seamless mobile connectivity and improved reliability
          
    Includes full TCP/IP stack, CGI, AJAX web server and windows deployment software
          
    Low power consumption mode option
          
    Powerful applications customization platform with 32 Bit 159 MIPS (Dhrystone 2.1) Processor.
          
    Channel frequency range of 2.412 to 2.484GHz
          
    Output power of 14dBm +2.0dBM/-1.5dBm
          
    Maximum receive sensitivity of -91dBm at 1Mbps
          
    Operating range Up to 328 feet indoors (100m)
          
    Modulation techniques are OFDM, DSSS, CCK, DQPSK, DBPSK, 64 QAM, 16 QAM
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        System Monitoring

                        
          
    

    
       Contents
        
            MatchPort b/g Pro 802.11 wireless device server sample. One (6 inch) antenna cable U.FL to R-SMA (p/n 500-180-R-ACC). One MatchPort b/g enclosed. Free 30-day secure com port Redirector evaluation license.

title: MP5360M NANOTRON TECHNOLOGIES, RF MODULE, TXRX, NANOPAN 5360, CSS
overview:
The MP5360M is a nanoPAN 5360 RF Module based on Nanotron's patented chirp spread spectrum (CSS) transmission technology and provides a long range of up to 900m in free space and typically 60m indoors (at 1Mbps and 8dBm output power). The network is extremely robust against disturbances such as noise and multipath fading. Due to its primarily analogue signal processing and the robustness of the chirp signal, nanoNET has extremely low power consumption per successfully transmitted bit. It contains the complete RF part of a nanoNET network node and provides an asymmetrical 50-ohm antenna port. The data rate is selectable between 500kbps, 1Mbps and 2Mbps.
	


    
          
    Operating worldwide in the 2.45GHz ISM band
          
    64MHz Effective chirp bandwidth
          
    SPI interface to external µc (up to 16MHz SPI clock)
          
    2.4 to 3.6V Supply voltage
          
    35mA (RX) Current consumption
          
    78mA (TX) Maximum output power
          
    TX Power adjustment in 19 steps
          
    -40 to +85°C Operating temperature
          
    4 Channel digital I/O
          
    Small metal housing
          
    
    
    
          
    6dBm Maximum output power
          
    ISM band pass filter for maximum robustness
          
    High speed, low power module
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        RF Communications

title: MP1002000G-01 LANTRONIX, MODULE, SERIAL TO WIFI, WEB SERVER
overview:
MP1002000G-01 is an MatchPort b/g AES bulk pack embedded device server. It enables to build wireless networking into virtually any electronic device with a serial interface. With this full-featured, turnkey embedded device server module, products can be wirelessly accessed and controlled over the Internet. It enables future proofing of designs with a choice of flexible media independent 802.11 b/g or Ethernet networking products. It provides affordable connectivity in the same compact, single-socket form factor as other MatchPort modules, enabling OEMs to add WiFi or wired Ethernet networking to their products on a single PCB design. It takes the complexity out of RF design and embedded Ethernet networking, enabling user to focus on products.
	


    
          
    Extremely affordable embedded 802.11 b/g wireless networking
          
    Common platform form factor for a family of wired and wireless modules
          
    Bulletproof security with IEEE 802.11i-PSK,WPA-PSK, TKIP
          
    Full TCP/IP stack, Web server and Windows deployment software
          
    Up to 230 Kbps data rate
          
    FCC Class B, UL and EN EMC and safety compliant
          
    Optional 256bit AES end-to-end encryption
          
    Protocols Supported are ARP, UDP, TCP, Telnet, ICMP,SNMP, DHCP,BOOTP, Auto IP,HTTP,SMTP,TFTP
          
    Lantronix DSTni-EX x86 CPU, on-chip 256KB static SRAM, 2,048KB Flash, 16KB Boot ROM, 5 GPIO
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        System Monitoring, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: MP1001000G-01 LANTRONIX, MODULE, SERIAL TO WIFI, WEB SERVER
overview:
MatchPort b/g is a dedicated co-processor module that manages wireless and network activity, permitting the device's host microprocessor to function at maximum efficiency. Using a dual processor design. It enables 802.11 wireless connectivity and web services on any device with a serial interface on its host microcontroller. Powered by a Lantronix DSTni™ x86 class processor SoC with 256 KB of on-chip SRAM, it also includes 2MB of Flash memory for web page storage and firmware. it is designed without an attached antenna, It includes user controlled intelligent power management option to shut the radio off during periods of inactivity minimizing unnecessary current consumption. With this full-featured, turnkey embedded device server module your products can be wirelessly accessed and controlled over the Internet. With IEEE 802.11i-PSK (AES-CCMP) or WPA-PSK (TKIP) security, MatchPort b/g offers the highest levels of wireless encryption.
	


    
          
    Extremely affordable embedded 802.11 b/g wireless networking
          
    Wired Ethernet-to-wireless bridging
          
    Common platform form factor for a family of wired and wireless modules
          
    Bulletproof security with IEEE 802.11i-PSK,WPA-PSK, TKIP
          
    Optional 256-bit AES end-to-end encryption
          
    Full TCP/IP stack, web server and Windows deployment software
          
    Two serial channels, up to 921 Kbps data rate
          
    FCC Class B, UL and EN EMC and safety-compliant
          
    Email notification of configurable alarms and events
          
    SNMP monitoring
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        System Monitoring,

title: MOD-RFID125-BOX OLIMEX, USB RFID Reader Module   125Khz Tags, With Emulation of Keyboard and RS232
overview:
MOD-RFID125-BOX is an RFID station, able to read Manchester-encoded 64bit EM4102 tags with 64 periods of carrier frequency per data bit. The complexity of RFID tag detection, verification and decoding are handled by MOD-RFID125-BOX. The user is given the 40bit ID of the transponder tag. MOD-RFID125-BOX supports three distinctive modes of operation. It is easily switched by a single button press. It can emulate USB HID keyboard and input the read TAG ID directly to any windows application including the venerable notepad or it can emulate USB CDC serial port for easy access from custom user applications using standard code for COM port access.
	


    
          
    Supports Manchester-encoded 64bit EM4102 RFID tags
          
    Base RFID frequency 125kHz
          
    USB port connection to PC;
          
    Standard 5V UART 9600,8N1 connection to user microcontroller boards;
          
    Three modes of operation, easily changed by pressing the button
          
    simple command-line interface in USB CDC and UART modes
          
    Two LEDs indicating device status and tag presence
          
    Support for continuous and periodic RF scanning to better suit user power requirements
          
    General practice for working with ESD should be applied when working with this board
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        RF Communications

                        
          
    

Warnings
The board must not be subject to high electrostatic potentials.

title: MOD-RFID125 OLIMEX, MOD, RFID READER, 125KHZ, USB, RS232
overview:
MOD-RFID125 is an RFID station, able to read Manchester-encoded 64-bit EM4102 tags with 64 periods of carrier frequency per data bit. All the complexity of RFID tag detection, verification and decoding are handled by MOD-RFID125. After it strips the header and the checksums user is given the 40-bit ID of the transponder tag. MOD-RFID125 supports three distinctive modes of operation, easily switched by a single button press. It can emulate USB HID keyboard and input the read TAG ID directly to any Windows application, including the venerable Notepad. Or it can emulate USB CDC serial port for easy access from custom user applications using standard code for COM port access. The third option allows access from any standard 5V UART, allowing easy integration with existing microcontroller applications. Software needed for USB HID keyboard mode.
	


    
          
    Base RFID frequency 125kHz
          
    Supports Manchester-encoded 64-bit EM4102 RFID tags
          
    USB port connection to PC
          
    Three modes of operation, easily changed by pressing the button
          
    USB HID keyboard emulation mode
          
    USB CDC serial port emulation mode
          
    Simple command-line interface in USB CDC and UART modes
          
    Two LEDs indicating device status and tag presence
          
    Support for continuous and periodic RF scanning
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Multimedia

title: MGM111A256V2 SILICON LABS, Zigbee Networking Module, 250Kbpz
overview:
The MGM111A256V2 from Silicon Labs is a MGM111 Mighty Gecko module with integrated chip antenna. It is a fully-integrated, pre-certified module, enabling rapid development of wireless mesh networking solutions. Based on the Silicon Labs EFR32 Mighty Gecko SoC, the MGM111 combines an energy- efficient, multi-protocol wireless SoC with a proven antenna design and industry leading wireless software stacks. This integration accelerates time to market and saves months of engineering effort and development costs. The fully certified module integrates all components (crystals, RF passives and antenna) required for a system-level implementation of ZigBee and Thread mesh networks. At +10dBm this module meets the WW regulatory requirements for IEEE 802.15.4 2.4GHz used in both ZigBee and Thread networks.
	


    
          
    TX power up to +10dBm, RX sensitivity down to -99dBm, up to 109dBm link budget
          
    Wide supply voltage range of 1.85V to 3.8V
          
    32bit ARM Cortex M4 at 40MHz, 256KB flash, 32KB SRAM MCU
          
    Autonomous hardware crypto accelerator and random number generator
          
    Provides rapid time to market with onboard stack, antenna and regulatory certifications
          
    Supported by Silicon Labs reliable, secure and flexible mesh protocol stacks
          
    Uses same development tools as the Mighty Gecko ICs, simplicity studio, energy monitor, packet trace
          
    Can support SoC or network co-processor architectures
          
    Dimension is 12.9mm x 15mm x 2.2mm
          
    Operating temperature range from -40°C to +85°C
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Portable Devices, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: MGA-645T6-BLKG BROADCOM LIMITED, AMP, LOW NOISE, GAAS, SMD
overview:
MGA-645T6-BLKG is an economical, easy-to-use GaAs MMIC low noise amplifier (LNA) with bypass/ shutdown mode. The LNA has low noise and high linearity achieved through the use of Avago Technologies proprietary 0.5um GaAs Enhancement mode pHEMT process. The bypass/shutdown mode enables the LNA to be bypassed during high input signal power and reduce current consumption. It is housed in a low profile 2 x 1.3 x 0.4mm 6-pin ultra thin package. The compact footprint and low profile coupled with low noise, high linearity make the MGA-645T6 an ideal choice as a low noise amplifier for mobile receiver in the WiMax, WLAN(802.11b/g), WiBro and DMB application.
	


    
          
    2.0 x 1.3 x 0.4mm3 6-lead ultra thin package
          
    Low bias current
          
    simple matching network
          
    1.5GHz - 3GHz operating range
          
    Adjustable bias current
          
    Low noise figure
          
    Bypass/shutdown mode using a single pin
          
    Low current consumption in bypass mode is <100uA
          
    Fully matched to 50ohm in bypass mode

title: MGA-632P8-BLKG BROADCOM LIMITED, Gallium Arsenide Low Noise and High Linearity Amplifier in a 8-TSLP Package
overview:
MGA-632P8-BLKG is an economical, easy-to-use GaAs MMIC low noise amplifier (LNA) with active bias and comes in antistatic bag. The LNA has low noise with excellent input return loss and high linearity achieved through the use of Avago Technologies' proprietary 0.5um GaAs Enhancement-mode pHEMT process. The LNA has an extra feature that allows a designer to adjust supply current and gain externally. Due to the high isolation between the input and output, gain can be adjusted independently through a resistor in series with a blocking capacitor from the output pin to FB1 pin, without affecting the noise figure. It is housed in a miniature 2.0 x 2.0 x 0.75mm3 8-pin thin small leadless package (TSLP) package. The compact footprint and low profile coupled with low noise, high gain, excellent input return loss and high linearity make the MGA-632P8 an ideal choice as an LNA for cellular infrastructure for GSM, CDMA, W-CDMA and TD-SCDMA application.
	


    
          
    Low noise figure
          
    Good input return loss
          
    High linearity performance
          
    High Isolation
          
    Externally adjustable supply current range is 40-80mA
          
    Externally adjustable gain is 15-20dB
          
    GaAs E-pHEMT technology
          
    Low cost small package size: 2.0x2.0x0.75mm3
          
    Excellent uniformity in product specifications

                        RF Communications

title: MDL-S2E TEXAS INSTRUMENTS, MODULE, SERIAL TO ENET, 230.4KBPS
overview:
MDL-S2E is a tiny-footprint Stellaris Serial-to-Ethernet Module which offers a complete, ready-to-implement solution designed to add web connectivity to any serial device. The most common application for the MDL-S2E is for augmenting legacy products that only contain a serial port for a configuration or control interface. In addition, newer computers, especially laptop computers, do not necessarily have serial ports and a serial connection is limited by cable length (typically 10 m). Simply installing a Stellaris Serial-to-Ethernet Module into the legacy serial device provides many benefits including no major board redesign or software changes, easy sharing on a network other than Ethernet, tiny form-factor for unobtrusive implementation and 10-meter maximum cable length for serial connections is no longer a limitation.

    10/100Mbit Ethernet port
          
    Auto MDI/MDIX cross-over correction
          
    Traffic and link indicators Serial ports
          
    UART ports include RTS/CTS for flow control
          
    UART0 has RS-232 levels, transceiver runs at up to 230.4Kbaud
          
    UART1 has CMOS/TTL levels, can run at 1.0Mbaud
          
    JTAG port pads for factory programming
          
    Telnet client for Ethernet based serial port extender

overview:
The MC75i module offers high-speed data rates for world-wide GSM networks based on EDGE standards. Providing 236kbps in both up and down link, the MC75i opens the path to application with high-volume data transfers. optimised for the usage in industrial computing application, the MC75i offers a Radio Interface Layer (RIL) driver for Microsoft Windows Mobile 6.1 based devices. EDGE, short for Enhanced Data rates for GSM Evolution, is the fastest transmission standard in GSM networks. The MC75i lets you apply this technology wherever you wish to transmit certain data. Along side this core technology, the MC75i comes with a TCP/IP stack, serial and USB ports and a RIL driver for Microsoft Windows Mobile based devices.

title: MAX6369KA+T MAXIM INTEGRATED PRODUCTS, USB Interface, 2.5 V, 5.5 V
overview:
The MAX6369KA+T is a pin-selectable Watchdog Timer for critical µP and microcontroller (µC) monitoring. The MAX6369 is pin-selectable watchdog timer that supervises microprocessor (µP) activity and signal when a system is operating improperly. During normal operation, the microprocessor should repeatedly toggle the watchdog input (WDI) before the selected watchdog timeout period elapses to demonstrate that the system is processing code properly. If the µP does not provide a valid watchdog input transition before the timeout period expires, the supervisor asserts a watchdog (active-low WDO) output to signal that the system is not executing the desired instructions within the expected time frame. The watchdog output pulse can be used to reset the µP or interrupt the system to warn of processing errors. The MAX6369 is flexible watchdog timer supervisors that can increase system reliability through notification of code execution errors.
	


    
          
    Pin-selectable watchdog timeout periods
          
    Pin-selectable watchdog start-up delay periods
          
    Ability to change watchdog timing characteristics without power cycling
          
    Open-drain or push-pull pulsed active-low watchdog output
          
    Watchdog timer disable feature
          
    8µA Low supply current
          
    No external components required
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Computers & Computer Peripherals, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Automotive, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

TCM515Z ENOCEAN, WIRELESS TRANSCEIVER MOD, 2.4GHZ
overview:
The TCM515Z from Enocean is a 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 transceiver. It enables the realization of transparent transceiver gateways and for EnOcean systems communicating based on the 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 radio standard. TCM 515Z receives and transmits radio telegrams based on a whip antenna connected to the host PCB. TCM 515Z forwards received 2.4 GHz IEEE 802.15.4 radio telegrams to an externally connected host processor or host PC via the ESP3 interface. IEEE 802.15.4 messages received from an external host via the ESP3 interface will be transmitted by TCM 515Z as 2.4 GHz radio telegrams. The ESP3 interface of transceiver provides the option to select a higher ESP3 interface speed (460.800 Bit per second). TCM 515Z is implemented as 31 pin reflow solderable module in an optimized form factor to enable size constrained applications.

title: USB-RS232-PCBA FTDI, USB Module, USB to RS232 UART Serial Converter
overview:
The USB-RS232-PCB is a USB to RS232 level serial UART converter PCB incorporating FTDI's FT232RQ USB to Serial UART interface IC device which handles all the USB signalling and protocols. The PCB provides a fast, simple way to connect devices with a RS232 level serial interface to USB. Each device contains a small internal electronic circuit board, utilising the FT232R plus a USB type-A connector. The integrated electronics also include an RS232 level shifter plus Tx and Rx LEDs which give a visual indication of UART traffic. The PCB is USB powered and USB 2.0 full speed compatible. Each PCB supports a data transfer rate up to 1 Mbaud and supports the FTDIChip-ID, with a unique USB serial number programmed into the FT232R. This feature can be used to create a security or password protected file transfer access using the PCB.
	


    
          
    USB-RS232-PCB provides a USB to RS232 Serial UART interface.
          
    Entire USB protocol handled by the electronics on the PCB.
          
    EIA/TIA-232 and V.28/V.24 communication interface with low power requirements
          
    UART interface support for 7 or 8 data bits
          
    Fully assisted hardware (RTS#/CTS#) or X-On / X-Off software handshaking
          
    Data transfer rates up to 1 Mbaud
          
    Internal EEPROM with user writeable area
          
    Support for FT232R FTDIChip-ID™ feature for improved security
          
    PCB is USB Powered - no external supply required
          
    Low USB bandwidth consumption

title: KBR38A-USB2 NORITAKE ITRON, USB Interface, 4.75 V, 5.25 V
overview:
KBR38A-USB2 is an Infrared and VFD/LCD display serial interface and PC Keyboard controller via USB. This compact USB interface module has been designed to interface to 7806A, KTW200 and K610A suffix VFD modules. It can be used for other modules and applications with an adaptor cable. It uses standard windows drivers to operate as a COM port, keyboard, mouse and a generic printer. The KBR38A-USB2 incorporates SPI and Asynchronous serial interfaces for controlling displays and other peripherals through the USB port of a PC. The USB port can also supply up to 450mA at 5VDC to power the display. The IR interface provides set up and PC keyboard emulation. The KBR38A-USB3 can also emulate a generic printer for use with existing print routines in PC software. The kit version includes a KBC56A remote control and USB cable.
	


    
          
    Serial SPI and sync interfaces
          
    RS232/485 transmit option
          
    Power and data transfer from USB port 
          
    IR keyboard interface
          
    Ideal for development/testing
          
    External 5V supply option
          
    IR Interface of 38kHz RC5 system
          
    RS232 and RS485 can transmit up to 2 meters

                        Consumer Electronics,

title: KBR38A-PS2 NORITAKE ITRON, MOD, IR RECEIVER, RS232, RS485, I2C
overview:
KBR38A-PS2 is an PC-PS2 keyboard intelligent serial interface infrared receiver module. The KBR38A-PS2 includes a 600mm PC interface cable, the module plugs into a PS2 interface cable included to allow PC keyboard emulation using the KBC56A keyboard. The IR Keyboard has proved to be a most versatile and cost effective solution to implement at a system or CPU level. Each key is independently transmitted allowing flexibility in the receiver to implement functionality to suit the application. Create your own IR receiver or choose one of the modules to convert the RC5 IR codes into ASCII+ characters to easily interface to your system. Configuration is set by the KBC56A and saved in the CPU's internal EEPROM. The LED indicates caps lock and flashes on key pressed. A raw data selection allows many IR remotes to be used.
	


    
          
    PS2 IR keyboard interface
          
    Includes PS2 cable
          
    Power supply of 5VDC @ 13mA
          
    PC Interface is 6 way SIL
          
    IR interface of 38kHz RC5 System

The modules remove the need for expensive and lengthy development of custom RF board designs and test suites. They use JN5148 wireless microcontroller to provide a comprehensive solution with large memory, high CPU and radio performance and all RF components are included. title: PRM211 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, RF MOD, TXRX, 900MHZ, CHIP ANT, SMT
overview:
PRM211 is a low power surface mount 915MHz RF Module with integrated antenna. Based on proprietary FlexRF technology, this globally accepted module will exceed most OEM application and performance requirements. Embedded with robust server client protocol, the LT1110 permits an unlimited number of clients to synchronize to a single server for low latency communications. The server and all clients in a network can communicate with any radio in range via either addressed or broadcast packets. The configuration and test software allows OEMs to design and test networks to suit their applications. The enhanced API commands provide packet routing control and network intelligence. With its field proven proprietary FHSS RF protocol and increased penetration at 915MHz, the LT1110 rejects RF noise, excels in multipath scenarios, allows for co located systems, and provides an extremely reliable communication link.
	


    
          
    Very robust in the presence of interference
          
    915MHz for improved RF penetration
          
    High throughput
          
    Ultra low power consumption
          
    Long range capability
          
    Miniature SMT form factor
          
    Integrated battery monitor, temperature sensor, GPIOs and ADC
          
    Simple integration
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications

                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

overview:
The SPBT2632C1A. AT2 is an easy to use, class 1 Bluetooth V3.0 module. This module enables electronic devices with wireless connectivity, not requiring any RF experience or expertise, for integration into the final product. The SPBT2632C1A. AT2 module, being a certified solution, optimizes the time to market of the final application. It is designed for maximum performance in a minimal space including fast speed UART and 16 general purpose I/O lines, several serial interface options and up to 560Kbps transmission speed with SPP service active, 250Kbps with iAP service active. An optimized design allows the integration of a Bluetooth modem, antenna and low power oscillator for enabling low power mode capability in the minimum possible size. This module provides fully embedded, ready to use Bluetooth wireless technology. The SPBT2532C1A. AT2 provides communication with Android, smart phone and Apple iOS Bluetooth enabled devices.

title: SMARTALPHA-868 RF SOLUTIONS, SMARTALPHA Radio Modem, 19200bps Data Rates, 879.5 Mhz
overview:
The SMARTALPHA Radio Modem module provides a simple interface wireless communications module for the transfer of data at of up to 19200bps. Its unique features of narrow band operation and user channel selection combined with excellent interference rejection make them an ideal choice for next generation applications. The transceivers have the functions of a complete radio modem and simply require CMOS/TTL data at the transmit input and the corresponding transceiver(s) output the same data. Preamble and CRC are automatically generated and added to the RF signal. Possible applications include one-to-one and multi-node wireless links in applications including car and building security, EPOS, inventory tracking, remote industrial process monitoring and computer networking. Because of their small size and low power requirements, both modules are ideal for use in portable, battery-powered applications such as hand-held terminals.
	


    
          
    Intelligent RF Modem Module with up to 300m range
          
    RF Data Rates to 19200bps
          
    Selectable 'Narrowband' RF Channels
          
    Crystal Controlled RF Design
          
    Serial Data Interface with Handshake
          
    Host Data Rates up to 38,400 Baud
          
    Very Stable Operating Frequency
          
    Low Profile Ceramic DIL Package
          
    Operates from -20°C to +70°C
          
    Evaluation Board for Rapid Development and software configurable

overview:
RTX-MID-3V is a RF digital data transceiver working on the ISM free license band of 433.92MHz, half-duplex, ASK modulated and fast switch time between transmitter and receiver. It's ideal for low cost solutions, battery supplied and small size to hand held terminals. Max speed rate is 10Kbit/sec and it's compatible with RS232 standard at 9600 bps (TTL levels) and not requiring any balancing of data. The device can work in compliance with HCS Microchip data frame. All transceiver features can be handled by 4 lines such as RX/TX, ENABLE, DATA IN, DATA OUT. This mini ASK transceiver module with high sensitivity and power down functionality is Ideal for a 2 way radio system needing to save space and battery life. The module is compliant to EN300 220 and EN300 489 rules.

Max speed rate is 10Kbit/sec and it's compatible with RS232 standard at 9600 bps (TTL levels) and not requiring any balancing of data. The device can work in compliance with HCS Microchip data frame. All transceiver features can be handled by 4 lines such as RX/TX, ENABLE, DATA IN, DATA OUT. This mini ASK transceiver module with high sensitivity and power down functionality is Ideal for a 2 way radio system needing to save space and battery life. The module is compliant to EN300 220 and EN300 489 rules.

title: RPM2A-433-17 RADIOMETRIX, MODEM, PACKET, 433.92MHZ, 17KBPS
overview:
RPM2A-433-17 is a UHF low cost intelligent Radio Packet Modem that enables a two way radio network/link to be SIMply implemented between a number of digital devices. It is a self contained Radio Packet Modem module that requires only a simple antenna, 5V supply and a serial I/O port on a host microcontroller or PC. The module provides all the RF circuits and processor intensive low level packet formatting and packet recovery functions required to inter-connect any number of devices with serial port in a radio network. The RPM2A uses addressable data packets with error checking, packet acknowledgements and retransmissions to achieve a reliable transparent wireless data link. Built for ease of use and rapid installation, the serial interface ensures direct connection to microprocessors or to RS232 port via RS232 driver while remote configuration enables post installation setup of the modem.
	


    
          
    Addressable point-to-point, point-to-multipoint and broadcast modes
          
    Inverted RS232 interface at 5V CMOS level
          
    DTE speed 600-115200bps, low operating current
          
    Overall throughput of 17kbps with ACK, 28kbps without ACK
          
    15mA during data streaming at maximum rate
          
    Flow control hardware (CTS), None0
          
    Available on 433.92MHz or 434.42MHz
          
    Usable range up to 300m
          
    Built-in command line configuration, RF link diagnostics
          
    Auto standby mode conforms to European ETSI EN 300 220-3 and EN 301 489-3

overview:
The RN2483-I/RM101 is a low-power long range LoRa technology transceiver module. The RN2483 low-power long range LoRa technology transceiver module provides an easy to use, low-power solution for long range wireless data transmission. The advanced command interface offers rapid time to market. The RN2483 module complies with the LoRaWAN Class A protocol specifications. It integrates RF, a baseband controller, command Application Programming Interface (API) processor, making it a complete long range Solution. The RN2483 module is suitable for simple long range sensor applications with external host MCU. It features on-board LoRaWAN protocol stack, ASCII command interface over UART, compact form factor, castellated SMT pads for easy and reliable PCB mounting. Typical applications include automated meter reading, home and building automation, wireless alarm and security systems, industrial monitoring and control, machine to machine and internet of things.

overview:
The RN2483-I/RM095 is a 433/868MHz low-power long range fully-certified Transceiver Module based on wireless LoRa™ technology. The RN2483 utilizes unique spread spectrum modulation within the sub-GHz band to enable long range, low power and high network capacity. The module is embedded LoRaWAN™ Class-A protocol enables seamless connectivity to any LoRaWAN compliant network infrastructure, whether public or privately deployed. The module is specifically designed for ease of use, which shortens development time and speeds time to market. LoRa technology is ideal for battery-operated sensors and low power applications. It is the first LoRa module to pass LoRa Alliance Certification testing. It is certified to the LoRaWAN 1.0 specification, ensuring that designers can quickly and easily integrate their end devices into any LoRaWAN network.

title: RN-41-SM MICROCHIP, MODULE, BLUETOOTH CLASS1 UART SOCKET
overview:
RN-41-SM is a though hole, low power and highly flexible Bluetooth socket module. This module supports SPP/DUN and HCI Bluetooth interface protocols, is simple to design in and fully certified. With its high performance on chip antenna and support for Bluetooth Enhanced Data Rate (EDR), the RN-41 delivers up to 3Mbps data rate for distances to 100M. The RN41 is perfect for battery powered applications and by default is ready to use in the SPP (Serial Port Profile) configuration. It uses only 250µA in sleep mode while still being discoverable and connectable. Multiple low power modes available allow you to dial in the lowest power profile for your application. The RN-41 socket module is the perfect method for adding Bluetooth wireless capability to existing products without redesign, saving you significant time and money.

title: OVAL-24SW-CHIP-SMA TALON COMMUNICATIONS, THREAD/ZIGBEE IOT MODULE, OVAL
overview:
The OVAL-24SW-CHIP-SMA from Talon Communications is an OVAL Sierra mangOH IoT ZigBee/Thread module with chip antenna and SMA connector. The mangOH form factor is an ultra-low power extremely high performance IEEE 802.15.4 compliant, FCC/IC/CE certified 2.4GHz RF module with a 100mW PA/LNA for extended range operations. The micro form factor module includes a dual antenna design to support receiver diversity systems to maximize indoor RF performance. It is based on Freescale MKW22D512V fourth-generation Thread/ZigBee Pro/IP platform which incorporates a low power 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 compliant RF with Kinetis mixed signal 50MHz, 32bit ARM Cortex M4 MCU, hardware acceleration for IEEE 802.15.4 MAC and AES security and a full set of MCU peripherals. The mangOH IoT connector is an open interface standard from Sierra Wireless to simplify product development with a single interface for connectivity and sensor module technology.
	


    
          
    20dBm (100mW) nominal transmit power
          
    Superior sensitivity -110dBm typical
          
    Small QSFP+ 45mm x 22.3mm x 3.7mm form factor

    Freescale Thread, BeeStack Pro, SynkroRF or SMAC
          
    15 selectable IEEE 802.15.4 RF channels, extensive low power modes
          
    USB 2.0 communication to mangOH

title: NRX2-434.650-10 RADIOMETRIX, RF MOD, RX, FM, 434.650MHZ, 10KBPS
overview:
NRX2-434.650-10 is an UHF narrow band FM receiver working at 434.650MHz frequency. The NTX2 transmitter and NRX2 receiver offer a low power, reliable data link in a Radiometrix SIL standard pin out and foot print. This makes the NTX2/NRX2 pair ideally suited to those low power applications where existing single frequency wideband UHF modules have insufficient range. NTX2 HP (25mW) variant can be used in applications where greater radiated power is desired. NTX2 & NRX2 modules combine effective screening with internal filtering to minimise spurious radiation and susceptibility thereby ensuring EMC compliance. They are particularly suitable for point to point and point to multipoint wireless links where longer ranges are required at low data rates.
	


    
          
    Double conversion FM superhet
          
    SAW band pass filter, image rejection: 50dB
          
    Data bit rate: 10kbps max.
          
    Receiver sensitivity: -118dBm (for 12dB SINAD) and -112dBm (for 1ppm BER)
          
    Local Oscillator (LO) re-radiation: <-60dBm
          
    Conforms to ETSI EN 300 220-3 (radio) and EN 301 489-3 (EMC)
          
    Usable range over 500m
          
    25kHz Channel spacing
          
    Longer range compared to Wide Band FM modules

overview:
MT5600SMI-32.R2-SP is an embedded analogue modem with V.92bis serial data and Fax, it operates at 5V. The Multi-Tech SocketModem embedded modem creates communication ready devices by integrating data/fax modem functionality into a single, Universal Socket design. The SocketModem embedded modem utilises a space efficient (1" × 2.5") design that allows OEMs to integrate a wide range of modem functions and speeds into any product platform. The complete ready to integrate modem dramatically reduces development time and costs for system designers. The SocketModem embedded modem complies with telecom requirements globally and can be shipped worldwide.
	


    
          
    Interchangeable communications devices
          
    Quick to market
          
    Global approvals
          
    Easy migration to future networks
          
    Complete data/fax modem solution
          
    Universal Socket connectivity
          
    Intelligent DAA technology detects line status
          
    U.S. Caller ID reporting
          
    2 wire leased line operation

title: MRF24J40MC-I/RM MICROCHIP, Transceiver Module, 2.4Ghz, IEEE 802.15.4, 12
overview:
The MRF24J40MC-I/RM is a 2.4GHz, IEEE 802.15.4 RF transceiver module with PA/LNA and external antenna connector intended for longer range applications. This module has an integrated crystal, internal voltage regulator, matching circuitry, power amplifier and low noise amplifier (LNA) with 50ohm external antenna connector. The MRF24J40MA module operates in the non licensed 2.4GHz frequency band and is FCC, IC and ETSI compliant. It is compatible with Microchip's ZigBee, MiWi and MiWi P2P software stacks. Each software stack is available as a free download, including source code from the Microchip.
	


    
          
    2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 transceiver module
          
    Simple four wire SPI interface to PIC microcontroller
          
    Integrated PA/LNA with transmitter power +20dBm to +23dBm , receiver sensitivity -108dBm
          
    Hardware CSMA-CA mechanism and automatic ACK response
          
    Hardware security engine (AES128)
          
    Automatic packet retransmit capable
          
    Independent beacon, transmit and GTS FIFO
          
    Supports all CCA modes and RSS/LQI
          
    Supports encryption and decryption for MAC sub layer and upper layer
          
    Small size (22.9mm x 33.0mm) and surface mountable
