title: JN5139-Z01-M00R1T JENNIC, ZIGBEE MODULE, 2.4GHZ, UART, CER ANT
overview:
The JN5139-Z01-M00R1T is zigbee module with integrated antenna belongs to JN5139-xxx-Myy IEEE802.15.4/ZigBee Module family is a range of surface-mount modules that enables users to implement systems using JenNet networking stack with minimum time-to-market and at the lowest cost. They remove the need for expensive and lengthy development of custom RF board designs and test suites. They use JN5139 wireless microcontroller to provide a comprehensive solution with high radio performance and all RF components are included. All that is required to develop and manufacture wireless control or sensing products is to connect a power supply and peripherals such as switches, actuators and sensors which simplifies product development. The JN5139 uses hardware MAC and highly secure AES encryption accelerators for low power and minimum processor overhead. Integrated sleep oscillator and power saving facilities are provided, giving low system power consumption.
	


    
          
    2.4GHz IEEE802.15.4 compliant
          
    2.7-3.6V operation
          
    Sleep current (with active sleep timer) 2.6µA
          
    On-board antenna with receiver sensitivity -96dBm
          
    TX power +2.5dBm, TX current 37mA, RX current 37mA
          
    16MHz 32-bit RISC CPU
          
    4-input 12-bit ADC, 2 11-bit DACs, 2 comparators, temperature sensor
          
    21 GPIO
          
    Micro miniature module solutions
          
    Ready to use in products

IT321 FASTRAX, GPS MODULE, SIRFSTARIII, 20 CH
overview:
The IT321 is a state of the art GPS receiver module based on the SiRFstarIII. GSC3LT single chip combined with SiRF ROM code. This tiny GPS receiver provides low power consumption and very fast time-to-first-fix together with weak signal acquisition and extremely demanding tracking capability to meet even the most stringent performance requirements on the market. Fastrax IT321 is an ideal solution for applications with high performance requirements as well as small space and low power consumption requirements. The Fastrax IT321 GPS receiver has one power supply, ON/OFF-control, 1 UART, 1PPS and 2 configuration I/O's that allow the user to configure which firmware version to use.
	


    
          
    SiRFstarIII single chip
          
    20 channels
          
    Very low power consumption 90mW at 3.3V
          
    One power supply, no battery back-up
          
    ON/OFF control
          
    Ultra high sensitivity of -159dBm
          
    ROM based firmware
          
    Very small form factor of 10.4 x 14.0 x 2.3mm

title: ISBN 0-9537231-0-0 RF SOLUTIONS, BOOK, INTRODUCTION TO LOW PWR RADIO
overview:
Aimed at the practical engineer, this book concentrates on discussing theoretical matters in an easy to understand manner, allowing system design decisions to be made which will result in functional and reliable designs with low power radio. Subjects covered include: the basic principles of radio wave propagation, modulation and reception, investigation into the methods to encode and decode data. Hints and tips are given as to the best techniques for different application. Practical radio data systems are covered including design of 'aerial' and 'PCB layout', selection of various low power radio data modules and review of encoding techniques.
	
    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless

title: HIRK-433F RF SOLUTIONS, RF MODULE, RECEIVER, FM, 433MHZ
overview:
HIRK-433F is an Low power Rx decoder FM 433MHz. A range of miniature single in line (SIL) hybrid modules providing complete four channel radio receiver/decoder systems available in either AM or FM. When used with the 110-AM or 120-FM series pocket keyfobs, A complete remote telemetry system is obtained with up to 150 meters range. The module consists of a front end super-heterodyne or super-regen RF receiver with an embedded microcontroller decoding a highly secure Keeloq protocol signal. The module has an easy-to-use 'LEARN' facility and is capable of learning up to 50 unique keyfob encoders. The module requires a 5V power supply and provides a direct LED drive showing data reception and four digital data outputs. The outputs may be programmed for momentary or latching configuration. The modules have flash re-programmability feature to enable field re-programming of the controller.
	


    
          
    Low power FM 433MHz Rx decoder
          
    Advanced Keeloq decoding
          
    Advanced laser trimmed ceramic module
          
    AM range up to 100 meters
          
    FM range up to 150 meters
          
    Easy learn transmitter feature
          
    Outputs, momentary or latching & serial data
          
    Direct led drive shows data reception
          
    Flash re-programmable
          
    HIR6 low power version (<1mA)
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        RF Communications

title: GW-357-3 SILICON LABS, Zigbee to Ethernet Gateway, ETRX357-LRS Module
overview:
The GW-357-30 is a ZigBee Gateway Module provides the perfect transport mechanism allowing you to access your ZigBee sensor networks implementing control either via the cloud or locally using a tablet or cell phone. Network managers now have the flexibility to set standard parameters to automate their network whilst maintaining the ability to over-ride or update these configurations remotely. With secure industrial standards such as HTTPS, SSSL and AES128 you can be sure that your system and data are safe. It is also ideal as a consumer access device for ZigBee smart energy and home automation deployments permitting access to data and remote device control to the home owner.
	


    
          
    Less than 1W power consumption
          
    Powered by micro USB connector
          
    Optional 802.3af compliant Power over Ethernet
          
    Backup battery for RTC
          
    100Mbps Ethernet, 10Mbps backward compatible
          
    Optional RS232 interface
          
    Optional RS485 interface
          
    SD Card interface for data storage
          
    Internal memory for configuration data storage
          
    IP20 Protection rating
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Commercial, 
                    
                        Lighting, 
                    
                        Medical, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: GSM0308-71 ENFORA, MOD, GSM / GPRS, QUAD BAND, UART
overview:
GSM0308-71 is an Enfora Enabler IIIG Quad-Band GSM/GPRS module with micro-coax RF connector with on-board SIM holder. The Enabler III is a certified quad band OEM module family that packs complete GSM/GPRS/EDGE functionality into a compact footprint. The embedded software environment enables development of mobile connectivity, device intelligence and location aware by utilising the built-in program rules engine, network router and control and automation capabilities. With power consumption of <2.5mA the Enabler III significantly enhances longer battery life. To accelerate deployment, use Enfora's services gateway to quickly build links from your asset tracking devices to your existing enterprise applications and services. The services gateway provides a complete view of your devices, enabling proactive asset management. It also supports popular enterprise software such as MS SQL Server, MySQL and Oracle.
	


    
          
    utilises leading-edge GSM/GPRS/EDGE silicon solutions from Texas Instruments
          
    BGA and multi pin connector forms
          
    Supports voice, SMS, Circuit switched data, packet data class 10
          
    TCP/IP software stack
          
    utilise Enfora's Services Gateway to quickly link to existing applications & services
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Wireless

overview:
The LMX9838SB/NOPB Bluetooth serial port module is a fully integrated Bluetooth 2.0 baseband controller.2.4 GHz radio, crystal, antenna, LDO and discreets; combined to form a complete small form factor (10mm x 17mm x 2.0mm) Bluetooth node. All hardware and firmware is included to provide a complete solution from antenna through the complete lower and upper layers of the Bluetooth stack, up to the application including the Generic Access Profile (GAP), the Service Discovery Application Profile (SDAP), and the Serial Port Profile (SPP). Based on CompactRISC 16bit processor architecture and Digital Smart Radio technology, the LMX9838 is optimized to handle the data and link management processing requirements of a Bluetooth node.

    Advanced audio interface for external PCM codec
          
    Baseband and link management processors based on CompactRISC Core
          
    Full Radio path integrated including antenna
          
    Embedded ROM and patch RAM memory

It supports up to150Mbps high-speed wireless network connections and is designed to provide excellent performance with low power consumption. It is designed to be a highly competitive module that offers superior performance, better power management applications above its nearest competitors. The single input/single output (SISO) technology improves effective throughput and range over existing 802.11 b/g products.
	


    
          
    Operates in 2.4GHz frequency bands
          
    BPSK, QPSK, 16 QAM and 64 QAM Modulation schemes
          
    WEP, TKIP and AES, WPA, WPA2 Hardware encryption schemes
          
    Realtek RTL 8188CUS IC UFL receptacle
          
    3.3 or 5VDC Input voltage
          
    RF output by chip antenna (type-1)
          
    RF connector (type-2)
          
    RF pad on module (type-3)
          
    RF output on half-hole pin (type-4)
          
    WPS or PDN control function on half-hole pin 6
          
    
    
    
          
    Support LED function when choose WPS option
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: LM816-0649 LM TECHNOLOGIES, WIFI USB ADAPTER, 802.11B/G/N, 2.4GHZ
ERIC4 LPRS, easy Radio Intelligent Controller Radio Transceiver Module, 433 Mhz
overview:
The easy Radio Intelligent Controller (eRIC) radio transceiver module is based on the Texas Instruments CC430F5137 System-on-Chip device to provide an intelligent radio sub-system that combines a high performance RF transceiver, RF band pass filters (BPF), an MSP430 microcontroller, 32Kb flash memory, non-volatile flash storage, temperature sensor, and a low drop voltage regulator. The device operates on the International licence exempt Industrial, Scientific and Medical (ISM) radio bands. The compact form factor, surface mount packaging and external antenna connector simplify product design and manufacture and provide for flexible placement of the module within an end product.
	


    
          
    Low power operation
          
    Configurable and programmable user I/O
          
    AES 128 bit data encryption
          
    Built in temperature sensor
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: ETRX2 TELEGESIS, ZIGBEE MODULE, EM250, MESH, CHIP ANT
overview:
The ETRX2 modules are a low power 2.4GHz ISM band transceiver with Integrated ceramic antenna, based upon the ember EM250 single chip ZigBee / IEEE802.15.4 solution and EmberZNet 2.xx meshing technology. Designed for integration into any device without the need for RF expertise the ETRX2 enables the user to add powerful wireless networking capability to their products and bring them quickly to market. The ETRX2-PA offers boosted output power whilst being a drop in replacement for the standard ETRX2. Care was taken to retain the low deep sleep current to make this module ideally suited for battery operated end devices with the lowest transmit current in its class.
	


    
          
    Small form factor, SMT module 37.5 x 20.5 x 3.2 mm
          
    Optional board-to-board or board-to-cable connector
          
    Integrated ceramic antenna
          
    XAP2b microcontroller with non intrusive debug interface (SIF)
          
    128k flash and 5kbytes of SRAM
          
    UART interface with DMA, hardware I2C and SPI accessible with custom firmware
          
    Can act as ZigBee end device, router or coordinator
          
    12 general-purpose I/O lines and 2 analogue inputs
          
    Supports 4 different power modes for extended battery life
          
    Hardware supported encryption (AES-128)
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        RF Communications

title: ERA400TS LPRS, ISM Radio UK/European Transmitter Module
overview:
This module includes the ability to change bandwidth of the radio from 19.2KHz down to 12.5KHz, which means narrow-band performance. Internal temperature measurement ensures less than 1.5KHz frequency drift from ambient 20°C, over a range of -40°C to +85°C, as well as providing a usable thermometer for the connected application accurate to within 1°C. Modes of transmission include a protocol with 16-bit encryption and anti-cross talk software, plus raw data modes where users can use self-coding system which can be set to interface to any other raw data module on ISM bands in both FSK and ASM modulation.
	


    
          
    Temporary channel/power level selection
          
    Free flash firmware upgrades
          
    Temperature compensation
          
    Crystal controlled synthesiser
          
    Temperature sensor usable by host
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        RF Communications

ENW89818C2JF PANASONIC ELECTRONIC COMPONENTS, BLUETOOTH MOD, PAN1315, CC2560, HCI
overview:
PAN1325 Host Controlled Interface (HCI) Bluetooth RF module brings Texas Instrument's seventh generation Bluetooth core integrated circuit, the CC2560, to an easy to use module format. title: ENW89815C3KF PANASONIC ELECTRONIC COMPONENTS, BLUETOOTH MOD, PAN1455, BC06, SPP
overview:
PAN1455/1555 is a short-range class 2 module for implementing Bluetooth functionality into various electronic devices.  The module consists of three major parts; a baseband controller, a EEPROM memory and a radio that operates in the license-free 2.45 GHz ISM band. The module is listed as a Bluetooth End Product (EPL).  Communication between the module and the host controller is carried out normally via UART. Other interfaces are available.
	


    
          
    PAN1455, 256kByte Flash Memory, without Antenna
          
    Complete Bluetooth 2.0 + EDR solution
          
    13.5 x 18.75 x 2.85mm
          
    SPP Software
          
    3 UART, USB, I2C and SPI Interface
          
    3 Channel ADC and 1 Channel DAC
          
    Full product qualification (Bluetooth, CE, FCC, IC)
          
    CSR BlueCore6 - ROM inside
          
    Cortex-M3 ST32F103 core for embedded Profiles or application software
          
    Fast Connection Setup
          
    
    
    
          
    Complete Co-location and Co-existence with IEEE 802.11 (AWMA, AFH and SFH)
          
    Built-in shielding to be compliant to FCC
          
    RF output power class 2 with power control
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Automation & Process Control, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Sensing & Instrumentation, 
                    
                        RF Communications

overview:
The PAN1323 series triple mode RF module with embedded antenna. The PAN1323 series provides easily integrated Bluetooth Version 4.0 and ANT connectivity into new and current designs by removing RF design and certification barriers from the development of the application. Gain unprecedented access using this three mode gateway module that can connect 14 Million ANT nodes to over 3 Billion Bluetooth nodes. Use Bluetooth EDR to manage large data requirements while taking advantage of extraordinary battery life using ultra-low power network technology found in Bluetooth Low Energy and ANT for small data loads.
	


    
          
    A single module for three standards; Bluetooth Classic, Bluetooth Low Energy and ANT™
          
    Fully Certified, Bluetooth v4.0, FCC, CE and IC
          
    Bluetooth low energy average power consumption is about 1 uA
          
    Cost effective and flexible HCI interface
          
    Easily Integrates to Texas Instruments' MSP430 and Stellaris ARM7 Controllers
          
    Extraordinary range with 10 dbm of Tx power
          
    Supports all Bluetooth profiles

title: ENW-89835A3KF PANASONIC ELECTRONIC COMPONENTS, RF MOD, TXRX, BLUETOOTH, PAN1721-BR
overview:
The PAN1721 is a cost-effective, ultra low-power, system-on-chip (SoC) for Bluetooth Low Energy applications. The module includes an eight channel, twelve bit analogue-to-digital converter, 19 GPIOs plus battery and temperature sensors. A single device for both BLE master or slave nodes. The PAN1721 combines an excellent RF transceiver with a high performance low power 8051 microcontroller, in-system programmable flash memory, 8-KB RAM, and many other powerful supporting features and peripherals. The PAN1721 is an ideal choice for applications where battery life is a critical application requirement, using only 500 nA in sleep mode. Short transition times between operating modes-3 uS Wake-Up - and power efficient hardware further reduce current consumption.
	


    
          
    Supports user developed applications
          
    256K Flash, 8K RAM
          
    Supports 1 Mbps data rate
          
    Eight Channel 12-Bit ADC
          
    19 GPIOs
          
    Battery Monitor and Temperature Sensor
          
    Certifications: Bluetooth, FCC, IC and CE
          
    BlueRadios Stack
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        Medical, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking,

overview:
PAN1720/21 Bluetooth low energy single-mode module has been specially developed for applications which communicate with dual or single mode Bluetooth low energy devices like mobile phones, PDA´s, Laptops etc.  It is very easy to expand your personal area network with this module, using existing gateways. The included Bluetooth low energy stack is currently supporting the proximity and battery profile. The user specific application can be written on top of the Bluetooth Stack. The communication between stack and application is handled via vendor specific HCI-commands. The PAN1720(21)-Module is manufactured in a very small 15.6 x 8.7 x 1.9 mm³ SMD package with shielded case and will be qualified according to the Bluetooth 4.0 standard.

overview:
The XB24CZ7PIT-004 from Digi International is a through hole mount, standard XBee® S2C ZigBee RF module with PCB antenna for OEM. Embedded ZigBee module provides OEMs with a simple way to integrate mesh technology into their application. It is ideal for applications in the energy and controls markets where manufacturing efficiencies are critical. The Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) provides a high-speed interface and optimizes integration with embedded microcontrollers, lowering development costs and reducing time to market. Digi's ZigBee compatible module is based on the Ember EM357 system on chip (SoC) radio ICs from SiliconLabs, utilizing 32bit ARM Cortex™ M3 processor. FCC, IC (North America), ETSI (Europe), RCM (Australia and New Zealand) regulatory approvals.

overview:
The BGM11S22F256GA-V2 from Silicon Labs is a BGM11S Blue Gecko Bluetooth® low energy SiP module with built-in antenna. It is targeted for applications where ultra-small size, reliable high performance RF, low power consumption and easy application development are key requirements. At 6.5 x 6.5 x 1.4mm the BGM11S module fits applications where size is a constraint. BGM11S also integrates a high performance, ultra robust antenna which requires minimal PCB, plastic and metal clearance. The total PCB area required by BGM11S is only 51mm². It has Bluetooth®, CE, full FCC, Japan and South-Korea certifications. The BGM11S also integrates a Bluetooth® 4.2 low energy compliant Bluetooth® stack and it can also run end user applications on-board or alternatively used as a network co-processor over one of the host interfaces. This module can be used in a wide variety of applications including wearables, IoT end devices and gateways, beacons, smart phone, tablet and PC accessories.

title: RN1723-I/RM100 MICROCHIP, Wireless LAN Module, 802.11 b/g, 2.4GHz IEEE Standard, 14 General Purpose Input/Output
overview:
The RN1723-I/RM100 is a 2.4GHz IEEE standard 802.11b/g Wireless LAN Module that is footprint compatible with the RN171 Wi-Fi module. The RN1723 is a full-featured 802.11 b/g surface mount module with an impressive 4µA sleep mode and a new power-saving DOZE mode. The RN1723 is extremely power efficient, making it ideal for a vast range of applications that require many years of battery life. It offers advanced SSL/TLS security that runs on an external PIC32 MCU enabling highly secure client/server communication. It is configured via simple ASCII commands for ease of development and quick time to market. It can independently maintain a low-power wireless network connection. Ultra-low power usage and flexible power management maximize the module lifetime in battery-operated devices. A wide operating temperature range allows use in indoor and outdoor environments. When operating in Sleep mode, the module minimizes battery usage while still being able to respond to certain events.
	


    
          
    Eight analog sensor inputs
          
    Integrated crystal, internal voltage regulator, matching circuitry, power amplifier
          
    Configured using simple ASCII commands
          
    Ultralow power for years of battery life
          
    Hardware interfaces - UART and SPI slave
          
    Supports SoftAP and Infrastructure networking modes
          
    RF pad for external antenna
          
    User programmable GPIO and ADCs
          
    Real-time clock for time-stamping, auto-sleep and auto-wakeup modes
          
    Run directly from batteries or regulated power supplies
          
    
    
    
          
    ASCII interface for ease of development
          
    Over the air firmware upgrade

    Secure Wi-Fi authentication schemes (WEP/WPA/WPA2)

    -40 to 85°C Operating temperature range

title: GPS-610F RF SOLUTIONS, GPS MODULE, RECEIVER, 1610MHZ, 65 CH
overview:
GPS-610F is an low power, High performance and low cost 65 channel GPS engine board. The GPS610F module is small, single-board, 65 parallel-channels receiver intended for original equipment manufacturer (OEM) products. The receiver continuously tracks all satellites in view and provides accurate satellite positioning data. The GPS610F is optimised for application requiring good performance, low cost and maximum flexibility; suitable for a wide range of OEM configurations including handhelds, asset tracking, marine and vehicle navigation products. Its 65 parallel channels provide fast satellite signal acquisition and short startup time. Acquisition sensitivity of 148 dm and tracking sensitivity of 161dBm offers good navigation performance even in urban canyons having limited sky view.

    Maximum update rate 10Hz
          
    Tracking current ~23mA

The AirLink GL6100 provides a highly extendable platform for the creation of a wide range of M2M solutions, with versions supporting quad band (850/900/1850/1900) and more.

title: GFDNN3M GIC, MEMORY MODULE, GENIE NX
XPC10010MB-01 LANTRONIX, ETHERNET, 115.2KBPS, 10BASE-T/100BASE-TX
overview:
The XPC10010MB-01 is a xPico Device Server Module designed for robust operation and with support of Modbus, the chip-sized xPico™ IAP module provides simplicity and flexibility making it the easiest and fastest industrial network-enabling module on the market. xPico IAP is an extremely compact networking solution that enables Ethernet connectivity on virtually any device with a serial interface. The included industry-proven Lantronix device server application with full IP stack and Modbus Protocol support allows seamless remote access to device data, simplifying design integration while providing robust connectivity. As the smallest embedded device server in the world, xPico IAP can be utilized in designs typically intended for chip solutions. A key difference with the xPico IAP is that there is virtually no need to write a single line of code, translating to a much lower development cost and faster time-to-market.
	


    
          
    Chip-sized Footprint
          
    Complete device server application with full IP stack
          
    Modbus TCP, ASCII, RTU support
          
    Serial port supporting up to 115.2kbps
          
    -40 to +85°C Extended temperature
          
    Two serial CMOS ports
          
    300 to 115.2kbps for Modbus enabled serial port
          
    DTR/DCD, RTS/CTS (Port 1 only) Control signals
          
    Flow control XON/XOFF
          
    8 Programmable I/O pins
          
    
    
    
          
    Modbus can only be operated on one serial port at a time

title: DC-ME-01T-S DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Digi Connect ME Secure Network Device Server Module
overview:
The Digi Connect ME is a secure device server module that delivers complete and versatile embedded IPv6-ready network connectivity and strong standards-based encryption services such as SSL/SSH. Built on leading Digi 32-bit NET+ARM technology, the Digi Connect ME is cost effective and easy to use in existing and new product designs, while powerful enough to meet future product performance needs. The connector-style module is pin-compatible and interchangeable with the Digi Connect Wi-ME, providing a direct migration path to a wireless solution without the traditional complexities of hardware and software integration work. This is available pre-loaded with Digi plug-and-play firmware, which eliminates software development efforts by providing powerful and configurable IPv4/IPv6 device server functionality, including an easy-to-use web user interface and security features. Target applications include retail systems, security control, medical devices and building/industrial automation.
	


    
          
    Highly integrated 32-bit network co-processor module
          
    2/4 MB Flash and 8MB RAM
          
    High-speed serial interface with up to 230 kbps throughput
          
    5 shared GPIO port options
          
    10/100 Mbit Ethernet or 802.11b WLAN with WPA2/802.11i
          
    Fully pre-certified radio reduces overall design cost/risk and time-to-market
          
    Industrial operating temp and FCC Class B low-emission design
          
    ThreadX®-based NET+OS® software development platform
          
    Digi plug-and-play firmware option eliminates software development effort
          
    Digi's own ARM processor and WLAN technology for true long-term product availability

title: XB24-API-001 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Module, Xbee, 802.15.4, PCB Antenna
overview:
XB24-API-001 is a XBee 802.15.4 low-power module w/ PCB antenna. This XBee RF Module is engineered to meet IEEE 802.15.4 standards and support the unique needs of low-cost, low-power wireless sensor networks. The module requires minimal power and provide reliable delivery of data between devices and operates within the ISM 2.4GHz frequency band and are pin-for pin compatible with each other.XBee multipoint RF modules are ideal for applications requiring low latency and predictable communication timing. Providing quick, robust communication in point to point, peer to peer and multipoint/ star configurations, XBee multipoint products enable robust end-point connectivity with ease. Whether deployed as a pure cable replacement for simple serial communication, or as part of a more complex huband-spoke network of sensors, XBee multipoint RF modules maximize wireless performance and ease of development.
	


    
          
    Long range data integrity
          
    Advanced networking & security
          
    Low power XBee: TX current: 45mA(at 3.3V), RX current: 50mA (at 3.3V)
          
    Easy to use, no configuration necessary for out-of box RF communications, AT and API command modes
          
    Indoor/Urban: up to 100' (30m), outdoor line-of-sight: up to 300' (100m)
          
    Transmit power: 1mW (0dBm), receiver sensitivity: -92dBm
          
    RF data rate: 250,000bps
          
    Works in ISM (Industrial, Scientific & Medical) 2.4GHz frequency band

title: SIP-005AYS001 SAMSUNG ARTIK, WIRELESS MODULE, ARM CORTEX-A7, 1GHZ
overview:
The SIP-005AYS001 from Samsung Artik is an ARTIK™ 520 IoT module. It offers target devices a great combination of computing power and storage capacity for its size. Multiple wireless options include Wi-Fi®, Bluetooth® 4.1, Bluetooth Smart, ZigBee® and Thread. ARTIK™ 520 module is a highly integrated system-in-module that utilizes a dual core ARM® Cortex®-A7 processor packaged DRAM and flash memories, secure element and wide range of wireless communication options such as 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth® 4.1, Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and 802.15.4/ZigBee® communications all into a 30 x 25mm footprint. The many standard digital control interfaces support external sensors and higher performance peripherals to expand the module capabilities. With the combination of Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and ZigBee the ARTIK 520 module is the perfect choice for home automation and home hub devices while also supporting a rich UI/UX capability with the camera and display options.
	


    
          
    Ideal balance of power and performance for gateways, display based applications
          
    Power efficient dual ARM® Cortex®-A7 at 1GHz with Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, ZigBee, Thread
          
    Leverages Samsung ePoP technology to offer small footprint modules (30mm X 25mm)
          
    512MB LPDDR3 DRAM, 4GB flash (eMMC), Mali™-400Pe core GPU
          
    Enterprise class security with hardware secure element and secure OS
          
    Fedora Linux® package with connectivity, graphics, power management and security libraries
          
    Trustonic TEE (NDA not required), secure point to point authentication and data transfer
          
    IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac WLAN, BT BLE Bluetooth®, Zigbee IEEE802.15.4
          
    PMIC block provides all power of ARTIK™ 520 module by using onboard bucks and LDO's
          
    GPIO, I2C, SPI, UART, SDIO, USB 2.0, JTAG and analogue input
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Security

title: RN131C/RM MICROCHIP, Wireless LAN Module, 802.11 b/g, Ultra-Low Power Embedded TCP/IP Solution, Commercial
overview:
RN131C/RM is a ultra low power WiFi 802.11 b/g surface mount module with on board antenna and U. FL connector. The WiFi module incorporates a 2.4GHz radio, processor, TCP/IP stack, real time clock, crypto accelerator, power management, and analog sensor interfaces. The module is preloaded with software to simplify integration and minimize application development. In the simplest configuration, the hardware requires only four connections (PWR, TX, RX, and GND) to create a wireless data connection. Additionally, the sensor interface provides temperature, audio, motion, acceleration, and other analog data without requiring additional hardware. The module is programmed and controlled with a simple ASCII command language. Once the module is set up, it can scan to find an access point, associate, authenticate, and connect over any WiFi network.
	


    
          
    Ultra low power with 4uA sleep, 40mA Rx, 210mA Tx
          
    High throughput, 1Mbps sustained data rate with TCP/IP and WPA2
          
    Small, compact surface mount module
          
    On board ceramic chip antenna and U. FL connector for external antenna
          
    UART hardware interface
          
    10 general purpose digital I/O pins, 8 analog sensor interfaces
          
    Real time clock for wakeup and time stamping
          
    Accepts 3.3V regulated or 2V to 3V battery
          
    On board ECOS -OS, TCP/IP stacks
          
    Commercial grade temperature (0°C to 70°C)

title: PEM1205 INFOMART IT SOLUTIONS, Power Over Ethernet PD Module, 12.95W, 5V
overview:
PEM1205 is a power extraction module, has complete compliance with the IEEE 802.3af Power-Over-Ethernet (PoE) standard, and it's designed to extract power from CAT5 Ethernet cable when sourced by a IEEE 802.3af compliant Power Sourcing Equipment (PSE). With the increasing demand for Green Power IEEE has emphasized the need for power rightsizing. The PEM1205 Powered Device (PD) module provides full PoE signature and programmable power classification for granular power management. Its high efficiency DC/DC converter provides a well regulated low noise and low ripple output with in built overload and output short circuit protection. The PEM1205 provides a quick, easy, and low cost method for Ethernet equipment manufacturers to PoE enable their equipment.
	


    
          
    Fully IEEE 802.3af compliant
          
    12.95W output load
          
    IEEE power class programmable (Green)
          
    1500V DC isolation (Input to Output)
          
    5V DC output voltage model
          
    Compact package minimum PCB footprint
          
    Minimal external components required
          
    Overload and short circuit protection
          
    Wide input voltage (36Vdc to 57Vdc)
          
    Low output ripple and noise, low cost
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Power Management, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        System Monitoring

                        
          
    

Warnings
ESD sensitive device, take proper precaution while handling the device.

title: BGM123N256V2 SILICON LABS, Blue Gecko Bluetooth® v4.2 Module, 2.4GHz, 1MBPS, 200M, RF Pin Antenna, +3dBm
overview:
The BGM123N256V1 from Silicon Labs is a BGM123 Blue Gecko Bluetooth SiP module. The BGM123 Blue Gecko Bluetooth SiP module family is targeted for applications where ultra-small size, reliable high performance RF, low-power consumption and easy application development are key requirements. At 6.5mm x 6.5mm x 1.4mm the BGM123 module fits applications where size is a constraint. BGM123 integrates a high performance, ultra robust antenna which requires minimal PCB, plastic and metal clearance. The total PCB area required by BGM123 is only 51mm². It also integrates a Bluetooth 4.2 compliant Bluetooth stack and it can also run end user applications on-board or alternatively used as a network co-processor over one of the host interfaces.

Access your data and devices from anywhere wired or wireless. Lantronix® industry-proven device server application and protocol stacks enables seamless remote access to device data, simplifying design integration, all while providing robust connectivity - including the ability to access data from any mobile device, including smart phones and tablets. It is extremely compact, low power networking solution that enables wireless LAN connectivity on virtually any solution with a SPI, USB (device) or serial interface.

title: XB2B-WFWT-001 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Module, Xbee 2.4Ghz WiFi, Wire Antenna
overview:
XBee Wi-Fi embedded RF module provides simple serial to IEEE 802.11 connectivity. By bridging the low power/low cost requirements of wireless device networking with the proven infrastructure of 802.11, the XBee Wi-Fi creates new wireless opportunities for energy management, process and factory automation, wireless sensor networks, intelligent asset management and more. Featuring easy provisioning methods and native Device Cloud by Etherios™ connectivity, XBee Wi-Fi modules give developers the fastest IPto- device and device to cloud capability possible. Focused on the rigorous requirements of these wireless device networks, the module gives developers IP to device and device to cloud capability. XBee modules offer developers tremendous flexibility and are available in surface mount and through-hole form factors. The XBee Wi-Fi shares a common footprint with other XBee modules. This allows different XBee technologies to be drop-in replacements for each other.
	


    
          
    Native Device Cloud integration for data acquisition and device management
          
    Hardware and software complete module easily joins existing 802.11 b/g/n (Wi-Fi) infrastructures

ENOCEAN PI 315 ENOCEAN, MOD, SOC GATEWAY TRX, 8051 MCU, 315MHZ
overview:
The ENOCEAN PI 315 transceiver module quickly transform Raspberry Pi into a wireless gateway. It connects energy harvesting wireless devices with Raspberry Pi to help automate networks and automation systems at home or in the workplace. It enables Raspberry Pi to communicate with thermostats and switches to control systems such as temperature and lighting. This module features a SMD mountable radio transmitter module enabling the realization of gateways for EnOcean 315MHz radio systems. EnOcean Pi also features EnOcean's smart ACK controller functionality. Radio messages can be sent transparently through the serial interface in both directions to and from the Pi. It can act as postmaster for up to 20 bidirectional sensors using smart ACK technology.

title: XBP24CZ7SIT-004 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, RF TRANSCEIVER MODULE, 2.4GHZ, -101DBM
overview:
The XBP24CZ7SIT-004 from Digi International is a through hole mount, standard XBee-PRO® S2C ZigBee RF module with RPSMA connector for OEM. Embedded ZigBee module provides OEMs with a simple way to integrate mesh technology into their application. It is ideal for applications in the energy and controls markets where manufacturing efficiencies are critical. The Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) provides a high-speed interface and optimizes integration with embedded microcontrollers, lowering development costs and reducing time to market. Digi's ZigBee compatible module is based on the Ember EM357 system on chip (SoC) radio ICs from SiliconLabs, utilizing 32bit ARM Cortex™ M3 processor. FCC, IC (North America), RCM (Australia and New Zealand) regulatory approvals.

    Transmit power is 63mW (+18dBm)
          
    Receiver sensitivity is -101dBm

title: ATWINC1500-MR210PA MICROCHIP, IoT Module, Optimised for Low Power IoT Applications, Small Form Factor, Wireless LAN , SPI, UART
overview:
The ATWINC1500-MR210PA is a certified module with ATWINC1500A-MU chip and PCB antenna. The ATWINC1500A is a single chip IEEE 802.11 b/g/n Radio/Baseband/MAC network controller optimized for low power applications. It supports single stream 1x1 802.11n mode providing up to 72Mbps PHY throughput and features fully integrated power amplifier, LNA, switch and power management. The ATWINC1500A also features an onchip microcontroller and integrated flash memory for system software. Implemented in 65nm CMOS technology, the ATWINC1500A offers very low power consumption while simultaneously providing high performance and minimal bill of materials. It supports 2, 3 and 4 wire Bluetooth coexistence protocols. The ATWINC1500A provides multiple peripheral interfaces including UART, SPI, I2C and SDIO. The only external clock source needed for the ATWINC1500A is a high speed crystal or oscillator with a wide range of reference clock frequencies supported (12-40MHz).
	


    
          
    IEEE 802.11 b/g/n (1x1) for up to 72Mbps
          
    Single spatial stream in 2.4GHz ISM band

    Advanced carrier and timing synchronization
          
    Wi-Fi Direct and Soft AP support
          
    Supports IEEE 802.11 WEP, WPA, WPA2 security
          
    Supports China WAPI security

    Onchip network stack to offload MCU

overview:
The BGM111A256V2 from Silicon Labs is a 2.4GHz blue gecko BGM111 Bluetooth smart module. The module integrates next generation wireless SoC with a complete Bluetooth smart software stack and antenna to provide a complete, pre-certified plug and play Bluetooth smart solution. It is targeted for Bluetooth low energy applications where reliable RF, low power consumption and easy application development are key requirements. At +8dBm TX power, BGM111 is ideal for applications requiring short and medium range Bluetooth connectivity. The BGM111 integrates all of the necessary elements required for a Bluetooth application such as Bluetooth low energy radio, software stack, GATT-based profiles and it can also host end user applications which mean no external microcontroller is required in size, price or power constrained devices. It is used in IoT sensors and end devices, commercial, retail, health, wellness, smart phone, tablet and PC accessories.

title: XB24CZ7UIS-004 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, RF TRANSCEIVER MODULE, 2.4GHZ, -102DBM
overview:
The XB24CZ7UIS-004 from Digi International is a surface mount, standard XBee® S2C ZigBee RF module with U.FL connector for OEM. Embedded ZigBee module provides OEMs with a simple way to integrate mesh technology into their application. It is ideal for applications in the energy and controls markets where manufacturing efficiencies are critical. The Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) provides a high-speed interface and optimizes integration with embedded microcontrollers, lowering development costs and reducing time to market. Digi's ZigBee compatible module is based on the Ember EM357 system on chip (SoC) radio ICs from SiliconLabs, utilizing 32bit ARM Cortex™ M3 processor. FCC, IC (North America), ETSI (Europe), RCM (Australia and New Zealand) regulatory approvals.
	


    
          
    RF 250Kbps, serial up to 1Mbps data rate
          
    Firmware upgrades via UART, SPI or over the air (OTA)
          
    Indoor/urban range up to 200ft (60m), outdoor/RF line of sight range up to 4000ft (1200m)
          
    Transmit power is 3.1mW (+5dBm) / 6.3mW (+8dBm) boost mode
          
    Receiver sensitivity is -100dBm / -102dBm boost mode
          
    ISM 2.4GHz frequency band, DSSS (direct sequence spread spectrum) interference immunity
          
    (4) 10bit ADC inputs, 15 digital I/O, 128bit AES encryption
          
    Operating temperature range from -40°C to +85°C, supply voltage from 2.1V to 3.6V
          
    Dimension is 0.866inch x 1.33inch x 0.120inch (2.199cm x 3.4cm x 0.305cm)
          
    Transmit and receive current is 33mA at 3.3VDC/45mA boost mode and 28mA at 3.3VDC/31mA boost mode
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: XB24CAPIT-001 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, RF TRANSCEIVER MODULE, 2.4GHZ, -102DBM
overview:
The XB24CAPIT-001 from DIGI International is an XBee 802.15.4 through-hole module with PCB antenna. It provides OEMs with a common footprint shared by multiple platforms including multipoint and ZigBee/mesh topologies and both 2.4GHz and 900MHz solutions. OEMs deploying the XBee can substitute one XBee for another, depending upon dynamic application needs with minimal development, reduced risk and shorter time to market. This RF module is ideal for applications requiring low latency and predictable communication timing. Providing quick, robust communication in point to point, peer to peer and multipoint/star configurations, XBee 802.15.4 products enable robust end point connectivity with ease. The module seamlessly interfaces with compatible gateways, device adapters and range extenders, providing developers with true beyond the horizon connectivity. It has -40°C to 85°C temperature range, S2C hardware, (4) 10bit ADC inputs, 0.960 x 1.087inch dimension, 2.1V to 3.6V supply voltage.
	


    
          
    Low cost, easy to deploy modules provide critical end point connectivity to devices and sensors
          
    Built with SiliconLabs EM357 SoC, point to multipoint network topology, ISM 2.4GHz frequency band
          
    FCC, IC (North America), ETSI (Europe) approved
          
    Provides an upgrade path to DigiMesh® or ZigBee® mesh protocols if desired
          
    Simple, out of the box RF communications, no configuration needed
          
    UART, SPI serial data interface, data rate is RF 250Kbps, serial up to 1Mbps
          
    200ft (60m) indoor/urban range, 4000ft (1200m) outdoor/RF line of sight range
          
    3.1mW (+5dbm)/6.3mw (+8dbm) boost mode transmit power, 16 channel
          
    128bit AES encryption, receiver sensitivity (1% per) is -100dBm/-102dBm boost mode
          
    API or AT commands, local or over-the-air (OTA) configuration method
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications

title: HL6528RD-G SIERRA WIRELESS, Compact, Flexible, and Future Proof 2G Essential Module
overview:
The HL6528RD-G is an AirPrime HL series embedded module. It is the smallest, scalable, flexible solution in a compact and easy-to-integrate form factor. This compact form factor, network scalability and ready-to-use firmware upgrades make these module ideal for industrial M2M solution designs where size and deployment longevity are important considerations. The AirPrime HL6528RD embedded module is a quad-band, industrial grade modules that provide voice and data connectivity on GSM and GPRS networks. The HL6528RDx-G also provides a high-performance GNSS receiver. This module is designed for automotive markets and any other market with similar quality and life-time support requirements.

title: BGM121A256V2 SILICON LABS, BLUETOOTH SIP MODULE, 2.4GHZ, 200M
overview:
The BGM121A256V2 from Silicon Labs is a blue Gecko BGM121 Bluetooth SiP module integrated with built-in antenna. This module is targeted for applications where ultra small size, reliable high performance RF, low power consumption and easy application development are key requirements. At 6.5mm x 6.5mm x 1.4mm the BGM121 module fits applications where size is a constraint. It also integrates a high performance, ultra robust antenna which requires minimal PCB, plastic and metal clearance. The total PCB area required by module is only 51mm². It integrates a Bluetooth 4.2 compliant Bluetooth stack and it can also run end user applications on-board or alternatively used as a network co-processor over one of the host interfaces. It can be used in wide variety of applications wearables, IoT end devices and gateways, health, sports and wellness devices, industrial, home and building automation, beacons, Smart phone, tablet and PC accessories.
	


    
          
    Low power wireless system-on-chip, 2.4GHz radio operation, 256KB flash memory and 32KB RAM
          
    32bit ARM Cortex -M4 core at 38.4MHz, TX power up to 8dBm
          
    RX sensitivity is -90dBm (high receiver performance) and range up to 200meter
          
    Low energy consumption
          
    1.85V to 3.8V single power supply, 2.4V to 3.8V when using DC-DC, integrated DC-DC converter
          
    Autonomous hardware crypto accelerator and random number generator
          
    30 GPIO pins, 8-Ch DMA controller, 12-ch peripheral reflex system, 2 x 16bit timer/counter
          
    Support for internet security, general purpose CRC and random number generator
          
    Wide operating temperature range from -40°C to +85°C

title: VDRIVE2 FTDI, USB Interface, Data Collection, Monitoring, Remote Control, Sensor Networks, USB, 4.75 V, 5.25 V
overview:
VDrive2 is a USB Flash Drive interface module, possibly the easiest solution for adding a USB Flash Drive interface to an existing product. The module features a USB connector interface connected to VNC1L USB Host controller. The module provides a simple 4 signal interface supporting easy connectivity to an external device via UART or SPI. The connector interface also features +5V and ground connections. USB interfacing is carried out using the Vinculum VDAP firmware. The VDrive2 ideal for evaluation and development of VNC1L designs. Further with its neat enclosure and attractive quantity discount pricing the module is ideal for incorporation into finished product designs. The Vinculum VNC1L is the first of FTDI's Vinculum family of Embedded SoC USB host controller integrated circuit devices. Able to handle the USB Host Interface and data transfer functions but owing to the inbuilt MCU and embedded Flash memory, Vinculum can encapsulate the USB device classes as well.
	


    
          
    Uses F.T.D.I.'s VNC1L embedded USB host controller I.C. device
          
    USB A' type socket to connect USB Flash disk
          
    Traffic indicator LED
          
    2mm (0.08") pitch 8 pin connector
          
    8-way header interconnect cable provided
          
    Only four signals to connect, excluding power and ground
          
    Jumper selectable UART or SPI interfaces
          
    Single 5V supply input, uses Vinculum VDAP firmware and command set
          
    Enclosure with snap in place clips allows for easy front panel mounting
          
    VDrive2 is a Pb -free, RoHS complaint development module
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Portable Devices, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        System Monitoring, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics

title: AMS002/S SILICON LABS, Bluetooth® Low Energy v4.1 Module, 2.4GHz to 2.5GHz
overview:
The AMS002 is an ultra low cost BLE module with TruConnect preinstalled. The TruConnect is an easy to use ACKme's configurable Bluetooth Low Energy application. The AMS002 'Bobcat LP' module is a fully certified small form factor Bluetooth Low Energy (Bluetooth SMART) module perfectly suited to battery powered operation for medium to high volume applications. This module provides an integrated Bluetooth Low Energy stack (4.1), support for secure over the air (OTA) software update using industry standard AES128 security. It includes an onboard PCB style antenna all in a physical footprint of 17.6mm x 11.4mm x 2.3mm. TruConnect enables module control and configuration via a serial interface. It virtually eliminates difficult and time consuming software development effort and vastly reduces product development cycles.

title: PTM 210 ENOCEAN, Switch Module, Pushbutton, Multi Channel
overview:
The PTM 210 is a push button multi channel switch module. This miniaturized batteryless switch module which allows the realization of very slim on wall mountable rocker switches or remote controls. The actuating force is around 7N only over a travel of 1.8mm. Optionally, one or two switch rockers or up to four push buttons can be realized. The radio transmitter module PTM 210 enables the implementation of wireless remote controls without batteries. Power is provided by a built in electro dynamic power generator. The PTM 210 pushbutton transmitter is self powered (no batteries) and therefore maintenance free. They can be used in hermetically sealed systems or in remote (not easily accessible) locations.
	


    
          
    Power generation by rocker operating electro dynamic power generator
          
    Integrated PCB antenna
          
    Frequency: 868MHz
          
    Data rate of 125Kbps
          
    Transmission range up to 300m free field, typ. 30 =m indoor
          
    Module dimensions (inclusive rotation axis and energy bow) 40.0mm x 40.0mm x 11.2mm
          
    Two channels with two pushbuttons per channel
          
    5dBm conducted output power

title: MRF24WB0MA/RM MICROCHIP, Wi-Fi Radio Transceiver Module, PCB Antenna, Matching Circuitry, TCP/IP Protocol Stack
overview:
MRF24WB0MA is an agency certified IEEE 802.11 Wi-Fi radio transceiver module. The MRF24WB0MA has an integrated PCB antenna, matching circuitry and supports Wi-Fi with the free TCP/IP protocol stack. The MRF24WB0MA/MB are low-power, 2.4GHz, IEEE Std. 802.11 compliant, surface mount modules with all associated RF components crystal oscillator, bypass and bias passives with integrated MAC, baseband, RF and power amplifier and built-in hardware support for AES and TKIP (WEP, WPA, WPA2 security). The integrated module design frees the designer from RF and antenna design tasks and regulatory compliance testing, ultimately providing quicker time to market. The MRF24WB0MA module is approved for use with the integrated PCB meander antenna. The MRF24WB0MA module connects to hundreds of PIC microcontrollers via a 4-wire SPI interface and is an ideal solution for low-power, low data-rate Wi-Fi sensor networks, home automation, building automation and consumer application.

title: MC7455 SIERRA WIRELESS, AirPrime PCI Express High Speed Connectivity Mini Card, Wireless LTE-Advanced and UMTS Based Modem
overview:
The MC7455 is an AirPrime PCI Express high speed connectivity in a mini card which is compact, lightweight, wireless LTE-Advanced and UMTS based modem. It provides LTE-FDD, LTE-TDD, DC-HSPA+, HSPA+, HSDPA, HSUPA, WCDMA and GNSS connectivity for networking and M2M applications over several radio frequency bands and supports 3G roaming. It is regulatory approved by FCC, IC, CE, NCC, GCF, PTCRB standards and AT&T, verizon, sprint, vodafone approved. This module supports 4G LTE B1-B5, B7, B12, B13, B20, B25, B26, B29, B30, B41 frequency bands and 3G WCDMA B1, B2, B3, B4, B5, B8 frequency bands and 3G TD-SCDMA B39 frequency bands in north america and EMEA regions.

title: RN171-I/RM MICROCHIP, Wireless LAN Module, 802.11 b/g, 2.4 GHz, Drop-in Wi-Fi Solution, On-board TCP/IP stack
overview:
RN171-I/RM is a complete, standalone TCP/IP wireless networking module. With its small form factor and extremely low power consumption, the RN-171 is perfect for mobile wireless applications. It incorporates a 2.4GHz radio, 32bit SPARC processor, TCP/IP stack, real time clock, crypto accelerator, power management, and analog sensor interfaces. The module is preloaded with firmware to simplify integration and minimize application development. In the simplest configuration, the hardware only requires four connections (PWR, TX, RX, and GND) to create a wireless data connection. Additionally, the analog sensor inputs can connect to a variety of sensors such as temperature, audio, motion, and acceleration. The ability to go into deep sleep mode and automatically scan and associate to an access point when awake makes the RN-171 suitable for roaming applications. The RN-171 also includes a built in HTML client to post serial UART data or sensor data to a web server automatically.
	


    
          
    FCC/CE/IC certified 2.4GHz IEEE 802.11b/g transceiver
          
    Configurable transmit power 0dBm to 10dBm
          
    RF pad connector for antennas
          
    Certified antennas: chip antenna, 4inch dipole, PCB trace, and wire antenna
          
    Ultra low power: 4uA sleep, 38mA Rx, 120mA Tx at 0dBm
          
    8Mbit flash memory and 128KB RAM
          
    10 general purpose digital I/O pins
          
    8 analog sensor interfaces
          
    Real time clock for wakeup and time stamping
          
    Supports ad hoc and infrastructure networks

title: XBP24-AWI-001 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Module, Xbee Pro, 802.15.4, Wire Antenna
overview:
XBP24-AWI-001 is a XBee-PRO 802.15.4 OEM RF modules with attached wire antenna which are embedded solutions providing wireless end-point connectivity to devices. These modules use the IEEE 802.15.4 networking protocol for fast point-to-multipoint or peer-to-peer networking. They are designed for high-throughput applications requiring low latency and predictable communication timing. These RF Modules were engineered to meet IEEE 802.15.4 standards and support the unique needs of low-cost, low-power wireless sensor networks. The modules require minimal power and provide reliable delivery of data between devices. The modules operate within the ISM 2.4 GHz frequency band and are pin-to-pin compatible with each other. XBee modules are ideal for low-power, low-cost applications. XBee-PRO modules are power-amplified versions of XBee modules for extended-range applications. These modules are easy-to-use, share a common footprint, and are fully interoperable with other XBee products.

title: USB-COM485-PLUS-1 FTDI, Adapter Board, FTDI Chip, Single Channel USB to RS485 Communication Device
overview:
The USB-COM485-PLUS1 module is a single channel USB to RS485 communication device. The integrated electronics of the USB-COM485-PLUS1 utilise the FTDI FT232R and includes RS485 level shifters plus Power/TXD/RXD LEDs to provide a visual indication of data traffic through the module. The module uses a standard USB-B device connector for connection to an upstream host or hub port. RS485-level signals are available on an industry-standard DE-9P connector. The maximum RS485-level data rate is 3Mbps. Pin 9 of the DE-9P connector can provide +5V DC at 250mA. The USB-COM485-Plus1 module requires USB device drivers, which are used to make the USB-COM485-Plus1 appear as a Virtual COM Port (VCP). This allows existing serial communications software such as HyperTerminal to exchange data through the USB-COM485-Plus1 to a legacy RS485 peripheral device.
	


    
          
    Adds one RS-485 serial port by connecting to USB
          
    Easy plug & play installation and RS-485 device connection
          
    Works with USB 1.1 & 2.0 Host and Hub ports
          
    Industry standard FTDI chip set & device drivers for maximum compatibility

title: UM232H FTDI, Development Module, Single Channel USB to Serial Port Hi-Speed FT232H Interface Bridge
overview:
The UM232H is a USB-to-serial/FIFO development module in the FTDI product range which utilises the FT232H USB Hi-Speed (480Mb/s) single-port bridge chip to handle the USB signalling and protocols. It is ideal for development purposes to quickly prove functionality of adding USB to a target design. The UM232H is a module designed to plug into a standard 0.6" wide 28 pin DIP socket. The FT232H is a single channel USB 2.0 Hi-Speed (480Mb/s) to Serial/FIFO IC. It can be configured in a variety of serial or parallel interfaces, such as UART, FIFO or FTDI's MPSSE mode which can be configured to JTAG, SPI and I2C interfaces. The UM232H development module requires USB device drivers, available free, There is the Virtual Com Port driver which allows the UM232H to appear as a serial port allowing legacy applications for serial ports to function over USB. Supported platforms includes current Microsoft® Windows® operating systems, Linux®, Mac OS® and Microsoft Windows CE® version 4.2 onwards.
	


    
          
    Based on the Single chip USB Hi-Speed FT232H device
          
    USB 2.0 Hi-Speed (480Mbps) and Full Speed (12Mbps) compatible
          
    Entire USB protocol handled on the chip
          
    USB bus or self powered options
          
    Asynchronous UART transfer data rate up to 12Mbaud
          
    UART interface support for 7 or 8 data bits
          
    Fully assisted hardware or X-On / X-Off software handshaking
          
    Auto-transmit buffer control for RS485 applications
          
    1kByte receive and transmit buffers for high data throughput
          
    Integrated 3.3V level converter for USB I/O
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Wireless,

title: USB-COM232-PLUS-2 FTDI, Adapter Board, FTDI Chip, USB to Dual Channel RS232
overview:
The USB-COM232-PLUS2 module is a USB to dual channel RS232 communications module. The module is based on the FTDI FT2232H (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed device) and includes level shifters to support full RS232 level signalling. Power/TXD/RXD LEDs to provide a visual indication of data traffic through the module. The module uses a standard USB miniB device connector for connection to an upstream host or hub port. RS232-level signals, including modem handshake signals, are available on an industry-standard DE-9P connector. The maximum RS232-level data rate is 1Mbps. The USB-COM232-PLUS2 module requires USB device drivers, which are used to make the USB-COM232-PLUS2 appear as two Virtual COM Port (VCP). This allows existing serial communications software such as HyperTerminal to exchange data through the USB-COM232-PLUS2 to a legacy RS232 peripheral device.
	


    
          
    Adds two RS-232 serial ports by connecting to USB
          
    Easy plug & play installation and RS-232 device connection
          
    Provide USB2.0 Hi-Speed(480Mbps) interface and works with USB 1.1 & 2.0 Host and Hub ports
          
    Industry Standard FTDI chip set & device drivers for maximum compatibility
          
    Microsoft Windows WHQL-certified, Mac OS X, Linux and Windows CE device drivers
          
    Installs as two standard Windows COM ports
          
    Supports Windows Server 2008, 2003, Vista, XP 2000, Linux, Mac OS X
          
    FIFO with 4K byte transmit buffer, 4K byte receive buffer
          
    RS-232 data signals: TxD, RxD, RTS, CTS, DTR, DSR, DCD, RI, GND. Serial port speed up to 1Mbps
          
    Powered by USB port. No external power adapter required

title: RF600E RF SOLUTIONS, Encoder IC, Automatic Battery Level Monitor, 8 Pin DIP package
overview:
RF600E is a encoder I/Cs with 8pin PDIP package. They have been designed to achieve the maximum possible range from any radio/infrared transmitter receiver set. The RF600E is a simple device to use. It requires only the addition of input switches and RF circuitry for use as the transmitter in the end application. Transmission is automatic without user intervention. Optimum range of data transmission is dependent on many factors including RF Power output, receiver sensitivity, antenna efficiency, local environmental conditions and any local Interference data type which is being transmitted. The RF600E chipset use a fully balanced Manchester encoded data protocol designed for optimum use of the radio transmission path.
	


    
          
    Encoder IC's with 8pin PDIP package
          
    Highly secure Keeloq protocol
          
    Automatic battery level monitor
          
    Fully balanced Manchester encoded data protocol is designed for optimum use of radio transmission
          
    Unprecedented level of security , prevents copying or grabbing whist
          
    Compatible with RF solutions systems

                        Automotive, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics

title: BT800 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, Bluetooth® v4.0 Class 1 USB HCI Module
overview:
The BT800 provides exceptionally low power consumption with outstanding range. Supporting the latest Bluetooth v4.0 Specification with EDR (Enhanced Data Rate), the module enables OEMs to accelerate their development time for leveraging either Classic Bluetooth or Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) into their operating system based devices. The module presents an HCI interface and has native support for Windows and Linux Bluetooth software stacks. The BT800 device is fully qualified by the Bluetooth SIG. This also allows designers to integrate their existing pre-approved Bluetooth Host and Profile subsystem stacks to gain a Bluetooth END product approval for their products.

title: UM245R FTDI, USB Interface, FT245R, USB, 3.3 V, 5.25 V
overview:
The UM245R module is a USB - Parallel FIFO interface (TTL) development module for the FT245R IC device. The compact module is designed to fit a 24 pin DIP socket which provides access to all FIFO interface and control pins (TXE#, RXF#, RD#, WR) on the FT245R device. The UM245R can be configured as either USB bus-powered or self-powered and also supports 5V or 3V level interface. Voltage levels set via onboard jumpers. The UM245R supports data transfers at up to 1 MegaByte per second. The UM245R plugs into a standard 24 pin 0.6in wide DIP socket.
	


    
          
    Single chip USB to UART synchronous serial data transfer interface
          
    Entire USB protocol handled on the chip - No USB-specific firmware programming required
          
    Simple interface to MCU / PLD / FPGA logic with 4-wire handshake interface
          
    Data transfer rate to 1 Megabyte / second - D2XX Direct Drivers
          
    Data transfer rate to 300 kilobyte / second - VCP Drivers.
          
    FTDI's royalty-free VCP,D2XX drivers eliminates requirement for USB driver developments.
          
    FIFO with receive and transmit buffers for high data throughput
          
    Integrated 1024bit internal EEPROM for storing USBVID, PID, serial num, product description strings
          
    Device supplied pre-programmed with unique USB serial number
          
    Support for bus powered, self powered and high-power bus powered USB configurations

title: AMS001/S SILICON LABS, Ultra Low Power Bluetooth® v4.1 Module, 2.4GHz to 2.5GHz
overview:
The AMS001 is an ultra low power BLE module with TruConnect preinstalled. The TruConnect is an easy to use ACKme's configurable Bluetooth Low Energy application. The AMS001 'Bobcat LP' module is a fully certified small form factor Bluetooth Low Energy (Bluetooth SMART) module perfectly suited to battery powered operation for medium to high volume applications. This module provides an integrated Bluetooth Low Energy stack (4.1), support for secure over the air (OTA) software update using industry standard AES128 security. It has an onboard PCB style antenna all in a physical footprint of 17.6mm x 11.4mm x 2.3mm. TruConnect enables module control and configuration via a serial interface. It virtually eliminates difficult and time consuming software development effort and vastly reduces product development cycles.

    ARM Cortex-M3 based microprocessor core
          
    Integrated SPI serial flash supports firmware updates and multiple onboard applications
          
    Programmable RF transmit power control
          
    Operation directly from a battery or mains supply
          
    Active receive of 12.8mA and active transmit of 10.8mA current consumption
          
    ADC channels, USART, SPI, I2C, GPIO and PWM channels
          
    Multiple services including ACKme TruConnect, Beacon, iBeacon

    Easily integrates into existing or new products using TruConnect

overview:
BRBLU03-101A0-02 is a EZURiO range of Professional Bluetooth products and is the world's first Bluetooth USB adapter that has been designed specifically to deliver the high data rates of modern technology. Designed with the most advanced Bluetooth features in a product that has been engineered to ensure the highest quality and reliability. This is a professional product designed for system critical use where robustness and reliability are critical. Power is a key performance indicator. The EZURiO professional range has a highly optimised radio that works at an extended range at around 10% of the power consumption of other Bluetooth solutions. This unprecedented power control ensures that user products work for longer. The USB adapter contains a fully compliant Bluetooth HCI interface enabling it to run with any approved Bluetooth protocol stack. With Microsoft Windows XP SP2 and Windows CE this is truly plug and play.

title: SPWF04SC STMICROELECTRONICS, Wi-Fi Module, SPWF04SC 2.4 GHz IEEE 802.11 b/g/n Transceiver, U.Fl. Connector
overview:
The SPWF04SC from STMicroelectronics is a WiFi module with U.FL connector. This is ready-to-use Wi-Fi module conceived for Internet of Things (IoT) applications. The module integrates a Cortex-M4-based STM32 microcontroller and a powerful Wi-Fi transceiver, compliant with IEEE 802.11 b/g/n standard for the 2.4GHz band. The module is cloud compatible thanks to the complete protocol package, which includes application and security layers. It can operate in serial-to-Wi-Fi and standalone mode with customer applications developed in the subsystem based on the MicroPython environment. The SPWF04SA module is configured with a highly-efficient, an external U.FL antenna connector and certified FCC/IC and CE. The module supports WPA2-personal and WPA2-enterprise security and WPS (Wi-Fi protected setup).
	


    
          
    2.4GHz IEEE 802.11 b/g/n transceiver, integrated TCP/IP protocol stack
          
    High performance STM32F439-ARM Cortex -M4, 256KB SRAM, 2MB embedded high speed flash memory

    Station, IBSS and miniAP system modes (supporting up to 5 stations)
          
    Fast Wi-Fi re-association after reset & secure firmware and FileSystem updates Over The Air (OTA)
          
    AT command set interface through UART, single voltage supply (3.3V typical)
          
    UART and SPI interface to host system, 19 configurable GPIOs, SPI interface with simple protocol
          
    18.3dBm at 1Mbps DSSS, 13.7dBm at 54Mbps OFDM TX power
          
    RX sensitivity -96.0dBm at 1Mbps DSSS, -74.5dBm at 54Mbps OFDM
          
    Small form facto of 26.92mm x 15.24mm x 2.35mm

The new GE863-GPS is the smallest GSM/GPRS module in the market integrating full 20 channel GPS functionality. It combines the high performance from Telit's proven GSM/GPRS core technology with the latest SiRFstarIII high sensitivity single-chip GPS receiver. The Ball-Grid-Array (BGA) package allows the end application to have a very low profile and small overall dimensions, making it possible for the design of extremely compact location based services solutions. title: FM-TX2-433 RF SOLUTIONS, RF MODULE, TRANSMITTER, FM, 433MHZ
overview:
FM-TX2-433 is an TX2 transmitter module is a two stage SAW controlled FM transmitter operating between 2V and 6V and is available in 433.92MHz and 418.00MHz versions. The TX2 data link modules are a miniature PCB mounting UHF radio transmitter and receiver pair which enable the simple implementation of a data link at up to 40 Kbit/s at distances up to 75 meters on building and 300 meters open ground. These modules combine full screening with extensive internal filtering to ensure EMC compliance by minimising spurious radiations and susceptibilities. The TX2 and RX2 modules will suit one to one and multi node wireless links in application.

    Fully screened

title: FM-RX1-433A RF SOLUTIONS, RF MODULE, RECEIVER, FM, 433MHZ
overview:
FM-RX1-433A is a radio receiver module. This receiver module is a double conversion FM superhet with a data slicer driven by the AF output. Additionally, A fast acting carrier detect signal is a available to indicate to external circuits that a signal is present. This signal is extremely useful when implementing duty cycle power save circuits or to indicate to external logic that a signal is being received. It is internally derived from the degree of noise quieting due to the presence of a received carrier. The receiver is designed to work with the matching transmitter (FMTX). With the addition of simple antenna the pair may be used to transfer serial data up to 200meters. The range of the system depends upon several factors, principally the type of antenna employed and the operating environment.
	


    
          
    Selective double conversion superhet
          
    Low power
          
    Fast enable time
          
    wide supply voltage of 4.5 to 9 volts
          
    analogue & digital output
          
    High data rates (up to 5Kbps)
          
    Carrier detect output
          
    Available as either 418 or 433mhz
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Security, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Industrial

                        
          
    

Warnings
Do not adjust the trimmer. It controls the receive frequency .Set this using RF signal generator.

title: FIREFLY-TX8 RF SOLUTIONS, TRANSMITTER, 8 SWITCH, 433.92MHZ
overview:
FIREFLY-TX8 is an 8 button transmitter stamp with 433.92MHz frequency for radio remote control system up to 100 meters. Installation simply requires connections to power supply and the output relay screw terminals. The output relays are activated by the button pressed on the transmitter encoder. It is housed in a rugged IP68 weatherproof enclosure, The receiver has the capacity to learn up to 15 transmitter button pairings. These are memorised even if the power is removed. Each individual switch on each of the transmitters may be paired with any or all of the receiver relay outputs. The decoder is supplied in an IP68 rated enclosure with Cable Gland and wall mounting lugs.

title: EZ80F915005MODG ZILOG, ETHERNET MOD, EZ80F91, 100 BASE-T
overview:
EZ80F915005MODG is an eZ80F91 mini Enet module. Zilog's eZ80F91 mini Enet module is a compact, High-performance Ethernet module specially designed for the rapid development and deployment of embedded systems requiring control and Internet/Intranet connectivity. This expandable module is powered by Zilog's latest power-efficient, high-speed, optimised pipeline architecture eZ80F91 microcontroller. It is a high-speed single-cycle instruction fetch microcontroller which can operate with a clock speed of 50MHz. It can operate in Z80 compatible addressing mode (64 KB) or full 24-bit addressing mode (16 MB).

title: EURIDT4936 AVONWOOD, RFID TAG, PERSONNEL, TRANSMIT ONLY
overview:
EURIDT4936 is an transmit only personnel tag. The active tag is designed to be worn using a lanyard, necklace or clipped to clothing for personnel application or can be fixed to assets using a permanent adhesive. With a footprint of a standard credit card, the Eureka-iD personnel tag/secure card is housed in a lightweight ultrasonically sealed ABS plastic enclosure to provide protection from adverse environmental conditions. The active tag is powered by an internal battery. Operating modes include transmit only at preset intervals and wakeup/transmit. The Eureka-iD personnel tag/secure card has a unique tag identification number and built-in anti-collision allowing multiple tags to be identified simultaneously. The Eureka-iD personnel tag or secure card is a hands free long range active RFID tag generally used for personnel and asset identification, application in industry, commerce and the service sector.
	


    
          
    868MHz of transmit frequency
          
    FSK modulation
          
    125kHz wakeup frequency with OOK modulation
          
    Sensitivity of 1mV RMS
          
    ERP is lesser than 2uW
          
    Data rate of 19,200 baud
          
    Operates up to 100m range
          
    Material is cased with ultrasonically sealed or resin potted (ABS)
          
    Powered by internal lithium coin cell
