title: ETRX2HR-PA TELEGESIS, ZIGBEE MODULE, EM250, U.FL, PWR AMP
overview:
ETRX2HR-PA is an Telegesis wireless mesh networking module with ember ZigBee technology with Hirose U.FL antenna connector. The Telegesis ETRX2-PA module is a power amplified 2.4GHz ISM band transceiver based on the ember EM250 single chip ZigBee/IEEE802.15.4 solution. The ETRX2HR-PA module allows extended range of operation by means of an integrated high efficiency power amplifier inserted in the Tx path. It has been designed to be integrated into any device without the need for RF experience and expertise. The form factor of the ETRX2-PA is identical to the ETRX2, so either module can be used depending on the range requirements of the particular application. Utilising the EmberZNet meshing and self-healing stack, the ETRX2-PA enables you to add powerful wireless networking capability to your products and quickly bring them to market. The module's unique AT-style command line interface allows you to quickly integrate meshing radio technology without complex software engineering
	


    
          
    Small form factor, SMT module 37.5 x 20.5 x 3.2 mm
          
    Optional board-to-board or board-to-cable connector
          
    Hirose UFL coaxial antenna connector
          
    XAP2b microcontroller with non intrusive debug interface (SIF)
          
    128k flash and 5kbytes of SRAM
          
    UART interface with DMA, hardware I2C and SPI accessible with custom firmware
          
    Can act as ZigBee end device, router or coordinator
          
    12 general-purpose I/O lines and 2 analogue inputs
          
    Supports 4 different power modes for extended battery life
          
    Hardware supported encryption (AES-128)

                        Building Automation,

overview:
The SPSGRF-915 from STMicroelectronics is a sub-GHz 915MHz low power programmable RF transceiver module. The SPSGRF-915 is easy to use, low power sub-GHz module based on the SPIRIT1 RF transceiver, operating respectively in the 915MHz ISM band. The module provides a complete RF platform in a tiny form factor. The SPSGRF series enables wireless connectivity in electronic devices, requiring no RF experience or expertise for integration into the final product. As an FCC, IC and CE certified solution, the SPSGRF series optimizes the time to market of end applications. The SPSGRF-915 is an FCC certified module (FCC ID:S9NSPSGRF) and IC certified (IC 8976CSPSGRF). title: EM7430 SIERRA WIRELESS, AirPrime EM7430 PCI Express M.2 Module, Lightweight, Wireless LTE-Advanced and UMTS Based Modem
overview:
The EM7430 is a compact, lightweight, wireless LTE advanced and UMTS based modem. The AirPrime EM7430 PCI Express M.2 module provides LTE-FDD, LTE-TDD, DC-HSPA+, HSPA+, HSDPA, HSUPA, WCDMA, TD-SCDMA and GNSS connectivity for networking and M2M applications over several radio frequency bands and supports 3G roaming. The PCI Express M.2 form factor allows easy integration into smaller and thinner devices. The EM7430 module variants allow device manufacturers to store up to three different firmware variants onboard while other variants have the same functionality via host download, simplifying logistics and supply chain management. It supports 4G global networks including LTE advanced with automatic fallback to 3G and 2G networks depending on the module variant. GNSS tracking allows locate, monitor and deploy location based applications and services with module variants supporting GPS, GLONASS, Beidou and Galileo satellite systems.
	


    
          
    High speed connectivity in future proof form factor and supports latest 4G and 3G networks in APAC
          
    Deploy on the world's fastest LTE networks and enable location based services
          
    B1, B3, B5, B7, B8, B18, B19, B21, B28, B38, B41 (4G LTB1) and B39 (TD-SCDMA) frequency bands
          
    B1, B5, B6, B8, B9, B19 (3G UMTS/HSPA+) frequency bands and GNSS disable
          
    1.8V CPU performance I/O voltage, 42mm x 30mm x 2.3mm dimension and -40°C to +85°C temperature range
          
    Smaller and thinner, enhanced pin functionality and incorporates cloud connected solutions
          
    Peak download rate of 300Mbps and peak upload rate of 50Mbps
          
    CE, GCF, JRF/JPA, NCC regulatory and docomo, telstra, planned (KDDI, softbank) carriers
          
    Flash LED, output wake-on WAN, on/off, reset, PCM/I2S audio & SIM Interface 1.8V/3V

title: XBP24CZ7UIT-004 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, RF TRANSCEIVER MODULE, 2.4GHZ, -101DBM
overview:
The XBP24CZ7UIT-004 from Digi International is a through hole mount, standard XBee-PRO® S2C ZigBee RF module with U.FL connector for OEM. Embedded ZigBee module provides OEMs with a simple way to integrate mesh technology into their application. It is ideal for applications in the energy and controls markets where manufacturing efficiencies are critical. The Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) provides a high-speed interface and optimizes integration with embedded microcontrollers, lowering development costs and reducing time to market. Digi's ZigBee compatible module is based on the Ember EM357 system on chip (SoC) radio ICs from SiliconLabs, utilizing 32bit ARM Cortex™ M3 processor. FCC, IC (North America), RCM (Australia and New Zealand) regulatory approvals.

    Firmware upgrades via UART, SPI or over the air (OTA)

    Transmit power is 63mW (+18dBm)
          
    Receiver sensitivity is -101dBm
          
    ISM 2.4GHz frequency band, DSSS (direct sequence spread spectrum) interference immunity

overview:
The XBP24CAUIT-001 from Digi International is a through hole mount XBee-PRO 802.15.4 module with U.FL connector for OEM. It is a low-cost, easy-to-deploy module provides critical end-point connectivity to devices and sensors. Ideal for applications requiring low latency and predictable communication timing. Providing quick, robust communication in point-to-point, peer-to-peer and multipoint/star configurations, XBee 802.15.4 product enables robust end-point connectivity with ease. XBee 802.15.4 module seamlessly interfaces with compatible gateways, device adapters and range extenders, providing developers with true beyond-the-horizon connectivity. The XBee S2C 802.15.4 module is built with the SiliconLabs EM357 SoC and offers improved power consumption, support for over-the-air firmware updates and provides an upgrade path to DigiMesh® or ZigBee® mesh protocols if desired. title: PTM535Z ENOCEAN, PUSH BUTTON TRANSMITTER MOD, 2.4GHZ
overview:
The PTM535Z from Enocean is a 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 miniswitch transmitter. It enables the realization of energy harvesting wireless switches for Enocean systems communicating based on 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 radio standard. The PTM535Z is primarily intended for operation in conjunction with the Enocean ECO 200 or ECO 250 energy harvesters. ECO 200 or ECO 250 can be either mechanically connected using two contact pairs or wired to electrical interface of PTM535Z. Upon detection of an energy pulse from ECO 200 or ECO 250 harvester, PTM535Z will determine polarity of energy pulse, status of on-board meander contact and status of input signals IN1 and IN2. The status of these items will be reported as 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 radio telegram. Both secure and non-secure transmission is supported. It contains a learn button (LRN) to send dedicated commissioning telegrams and to change the radio channel. PTM535Z is mechanically compatible with the outline of existing PTM 33x modules.
	


    
          
    R&TTE (Europe) / FCC (US) / IC (Canada) radio certification
          
    Integrated PCB antenna, external 50 ohm whip antenna (optional)
          
    2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 radio standard/ 250Kbps bit rate
          
    IEEE 802.15.4 radio channel 11 to 26 (default: radio channel 11)
          
    AES128 authentication with sequence code
          
    2dBm transmit power (typ, at 25°C)
          
    ECO 200 or ECO 250 Kinetic energy harvester power supply
          
    2 pairs of contacts harvester interface, 5 pins (solderable) external interface
          
    6 zero ohm resistor footprints (on-board) configuration interface
          
    26.2mm (±0.3) x 21.15mm (±0.3) module dimension, -25°C to 65°C operating temperature range

title: MGM111A256V1 SILICON LABS, Zigbee Networking Module, 250Kbpz
overview:
The MGM111A256V1 from Silicon Labs is a MGM111 Mighty Gecko module with integrated chip antenna. It is a fully-integrated, pre-certified module, enabling rapid development of wireless mesh networking solutions. Based on the Silicon Labs EFR32 Mighty Gecko SoC, the MGM111 combines an energy- efficient, multi-protocol wireless SoC with a proven antenna design and industry leading wireless software stacks. This integration accelerates time to market and saves months of engineering effort and development costs. The fully certified module integrates all components (crystals, RF passives and antenna) required for a system-level implementation of ZigBee and Thread mesh networks. At +10dBm this module meets the WW regulatory requirements for IEEE 802.15.4 2.4GHz used in both ZigBee and Thread networks.

overview:
The XBP24CAUIS-001 from Digi International is a surface mount XBee-PRO 802.15.4 module with U.FL connector for OEM. It is a low-cost, easy-to-deploy module provides critical end-point connectivity to devices and sensors. Ideal for applications requiring low latency and predictable communication timing. Providing quick, robust communication in point-to-point, peer-to-peer and multipoint/star configurations, XBee 802.15.4 product enables robust end-point connectivity with ease. XBee 802.15.4 module seamlessly interfaces with compatible gateways, device adapters and range extenders, providing developers with true beyond-the-horizon connectivity. The XBee S2C 802.15.4 module is built with the SiliconLabs EM357 SoC and offers improved power consumption, support for over-the-air firmware updates and provides an upgrade path to DigiMesh® or ZigBee® mesh protocols if desired. overview:
The SPSGRFC-915 from STMicroelectronics is a sub-1GHz programmable transceiver module. It is an easy to use transceiver certified module with many programmable features. The module provides a complete RF platform in a tiny form factor. The SPSGRFC RF module is CE, FCC and IC certified and integrates wireless connectivity in target electronic devices without requiring particular RF experience or expertise. This certified solution optimizes the time to market of final applications. The module is designed for maximum performance in a minimal space with 4 programmable I/O pins and an SPI serial interface. The SPSGRFC is pin to pin and firmware compatible with SPSGRF family applications. Typical application includes AMR (automatic meter reading), WSN (wireless sensor network), industrial monitoring and control, wireless fire and security alarm systems, point to point wireless link, 6LoWPAN MESH network and wireless M-Bus protocol stack.

title: XB8-DMRS-002 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Module, Mesh SMT Xbee 868LP, RF Pad
overview:
The XBee 868LP module was designed to provide a high performance, low power module at an extremely competitive price point. The XBee 868LP module can run either a proprietary DigiMesh® or point to multipoint networking protocol utilising a low power energy micro microcontroller and an Analog Devices ADF7023 transceiver, which offers industry leading interference blocking. The XBee 868LP operates between 863-870 MHz, making it deployable in several regions throughout the world including approved European countries and India by utilising a software selectable channel masking feature. The XBee 868LP is also the industry's first RF module using 868MHz and surrounding frequencies for LBT + AFA (Listen Before Talk and Adaptive Frequency Agility). This virtually eliminates interference by listening to the radio environment before any transmission starts, and automatically shifting to a new channel when interference is detected.
	
    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications

title: UMFT234XD-NC FTDI, USB Interface, FT234XD, UART, USB, 3.3 V
overview:
The UMFT234XD-NC is a Breakout Module utilizes FTDI's FT234XDIC to convert USB to UART. The breakout module is a breakout board that converts USB 2.0 full-speed to UART. This module do not have a USB connector, instead, the modules plug directly into the USB host connector and the pads of the PCB makes electrical contact with the electrical contacts of the USB connector. The UART interface operates at +3.3V voltage levels, however all I/Os are 5V tolerant. The Breakout modules provide the simplest development hardware for the FT-X series of devices. To reduce cost the USB interconnect is simply tracking on the PCB which plugs directly into the USB host socket. The interface connector is a standard 0.1-inch pitch socket. The module is ready to use when plugged in to enable instant development work to begin.

    3.3V power out limited to 50mA and 5V with as safety fuse

overview:
The PAN1721 is a cost-effective, ultra low-power, system-on-chip (SoC) for Bluetooth Low Energy applications. The module includes an eight channel, twelve bit analogue-to-digital converter, 19 GPIOs plus battery and temperature sensors. A single device for both BLE master or slave nodes. The PAN1721 combines an excellent RF transceiver with a high performance low power 8051 microcontroller, in-system programmable flash memory, 8-KB RAM, and many other powerful supporting features and peripherals. The PAN1721 is an ideal choice for applications where battery life is a critical application requirement, using only 500 nA in sleep mode. Short transition times between operating modes-3 uS Wake-Up - and power efficient hardware further reduce current consumption.

title: UD1100002-01 LANTRONIX, Single Port Serial to Ethernet External Device Server
overview:
The UDS1100 one-port device server enables users to connect, manage and control just about any piece of equipment with a serial port from virtually anywhere over Ethernet or the Internet in a matter of minutes. This single-port external device server is a quick, simple and inexpensive way to bring the advantages of remote management to equipment not currently connected to a network. Available in one and two-port models, and equipped with flexible power options including PoE, the UDS makes it simple to network-enable equipment without changing the way you work. Supplied with Lantronix TruPort COM Port Redirector software, UDS creates a fully transparent serial connection to existing PC-based software applications. Using a method called serial tunnelling, the UDS1100 encapsulates serial data into packets and transports it over Ethernet. The built-in web server enables users to access and configure the UDS1100 from a standard web browser.
	


    
          
    Access, monitor and control equipment over Ethernet
          
    Replace dedicated PCs and/or modem lines with fast and reliable Ethernet networking
          
    Configure quickly and easily via HTTP, DHCP, Telnet, serial or Lantronix DeviceInstaller™ utility
          
    Supports RS232, RS422 and RS485 communications
          
    Power over Ethernet (PoE) model available
          
    Environmentally-friendly RoHS and WEEE compliant
          
    Features TruPort® Com port control technology
          
    Meets the newest UL 864 9th Edition standards
          
    Small enough to place almost anywhere
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Security

                        
          
    

    
       Contents
        
            UDS1100 one-port device server, 100-240 VAC International power supply with regional adapters, Six foot DB9F to DB25M serial cable (P/N 500-163-R), CD Includes User Guide and Software utilities (Device Installer and Com Port Redirector), Quick Start Guide.

title: RM186-SM-01 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, LoRa + Bluetooth® Module, LPWAN EIoT Applications, 863 to 870Mhz, 50KBPS
overview:
The RM186-SM-01 is an intelligent LoRa/BLE module (868MHz LoRa for Europe) featuring smartBASIC. The RM1186 module offers a powerful, convenient solution for long-range Enterprise IoT (EIoT) deployments. Laird innovatively combines Bluetooth v4.0 with LoRaWAN, the emerging standard in Low Power Wide Area Networks (LPWAN) into one module. RM186 module aggregate and transmit data from Bluetooth Smart (BLE) devices and sensors over LoRa to gateways as far as 15Km (approximately 10miles) away. This bridges the personal area network to the wide area network in a unique way. The RM186 is LoRa Alliance and Bluetooth SIG certified and fully interoperable with any LoRaWAN adherent gateway.

    Maximum transmission power of 14dBm ERP, receiver sensitivity up to -135dBm

    UART (4), GPIO (14 max), SPI (3), 12C (2), ADC (4) host interfaces, 128bit AES encryption

title: DB9-USB-M FTDI, USB Interface, Industrial, Home Projects, DB9 form factor, USB, 4.25 V, 5.25 V
overview:
DB9-USB-M is a male connector version of the RS232 to USB2.0 interface. The DB9-USB-RS232 modules are designed to directly replace an existing DB9. The industry accepted name for a DE9 connector, (male or female) RS232 connection with a drop-in USB replacement connection. The modules will replace (pin-for-pin) a male or female DB9 RS232 connector with a USB mini-B connector. The application PCB containing the existing DB9 RS232 connector does not require any modification, only the replacement of the D-type connector with the appropriate DB9-USB-RS232 module. A male DB9 should be replaced by a male DB9-USB-RS232-M and a female DB9 should be replaced by a female DB9-USB-RS232-F. The modules contain all necessary electronics to convert between USB and RS232.
	


    
          
    Adds one USB serial port by connecting to the RS232 DB9 footprint of a device
          
    Easy placement for an standard Male and Female RS232 DB9 footprint of a device
          
    Works with USB 1.1 & 2.0 Host and Hub ports
          
    Industry Standard FTDI chip set & device drivers for maximum compatibility
          
    Microsoft Windows WHQL-certified, Mac OS X, Linux and Windows CE device drivers
          
    Installs as a standard Windows COM port
          
    Supports Windows Server 2008, 2003, Vista, XP 2000, Linux, Mac OS X
          
    Transmit buffer is 128 byte and Receive buffer is 256 byte
          
    RS-232 data signals: TxD, RxD, RTS, CTS, DSR, DTR, DCD, RI, GND
          
    Powered by USB port. No external power adapter required
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Industrial

title: MRF24WG0MA-I/RM MICROCHIP, Module, Wi-Fi Transmitter, PCB Antenna, 2.483 GHz
overview:
MRF24WG0MA-I/RM is an agency certified IEEE 802.11 b/g WiFi radio transceiver module. The MRF24WG0MA has an integrated PCB antenna, matching circuitry, and supports WiFi with the free TCP/IP protocol stack. The MRF24WG0MA module connects to hundreds of PIC microcontrollers via a 4 wire SPI interface. The MRF24WG0MA is a low power, 2.4GHz, IEEE 802.11-compliant, surface mount modules with all associated RF components like crystal oscillator, bypass and bias passives with integrated MAC, baseband, RF and power amplifier, and built in hardware support for AES, and TKIP (WEP, WPA, WPA2 security). The modules also provide acceleration for hosts running WPA-EAP application security. The integrated module design frees the designer from RF and antenna design tasks and regulatory compliance testing, ultimately providing quicker time to market. The MRF24WG0MA module is approved for use with the integrated PCB meander antenna.
	


    
          
    IEEE 802.11 b/g WiFi transceiver module
          
    WiFi direct, SoftAP
          
    Compatible with IEEE 802.11b/g/n networks
          
    Small size

title: BL620-SA LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, Single Mode Bluetooth® BLE Module Featuring smartBASIC (Internal Antenna)
overview:
The BL620-SA is a Central-mode BLE Radio Module features smartBASIC (internal antenna), makes it easy to add single-mode Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), also known as Bluetooth Smart™, to small, portable, power conscious devices, including those powered by AAA or coin cell batteries. The unique feature of this module is smartBASIC, an event driven programming language that enables standalone operation of the module. smartBASIC on BL620 enables wireless connections to peripheral devices that are in turn connected to sensors so that the data can be collected via GATT operations. smartBASIC has been proven to speed time to market and significantly simplifies BLE integration for embedded devices.

title: FM-RRFQ1-433 RF SOLUTIONS, SIL FM Receiver Module 433.92 Mhz
overview:
FM-RRFQ1-433 is an 433.92MHz FM receiver hybrid module, These miniature RF modules provide a cost effective high performance FM radio data link at 433.92MHz. Manufactured using laser trimmed thick film ceramic hybrid, the modules exhibit extremely stable electronic characteristics over an industrial temperature range. Manufacture on a ceramic substrate provides a very reliable operation over a wide temperature range. This transmitter and receiver pair enables the simple implementation of a data link at up to 4.8Kbit/s at distances up to 75 meters on building and 250 meters on open ground. These modules will suit one to one and multi node wireless links in application including car and building security, EPOS and inventory tracking, remote industrial process monitoring and computer networking. Because of their small size and low power requirements, both modules are ideal for use in portable, battery powered application such as hand held terminals.

    Transmit range up to 250m
          
    Miniature packages
          
    Data rate up to 9.6Kbps
          
    No adjustable components

    Standby mode (max 100nA)
          
    PLL XTAL design
          
    CMOS/TTL output
          
    RSSI output

overview:
The ZETA-433 is a FM Transceiver Module optimised for 433MHz frequency band can transmit/receive at up to 500kbps over a range up to 2000m. Operating between 1.8 to 3.6V, the module monitors its battery voltage and can sleep with very low standby current. The module can wake intermittently and provide direct control outputs to a microcontroller making it ideally suited to battery applications. These modules will suit one-to-one or multi-node wireless links in applications including car and building security, POS and inventory tracking, remote process monitoring. It is suitable for use with telemetry, keyless entry, health monitors, door and gate access applications.

title: SPSGRFC-868 STMICROELECTRONICS, RF TRANSCEIVERS, 500KBPS, 868MHZ
overview:
The SPSGRFC-868 from STMicroelectronics is a sub-1GHz programmable transceiver module. It is an easy to use transceiver certified module with many programmable features. The module provides a complete RF platform in a tiny form factor. The SPSGRFC RF module is CE, FCC and IC certified and integrates wireless connectivity in target electronic devices without requiring particular RF experience or expertise. This certified solution optimizes the time to market of final applications. The module is designed for maximum performance in a minimal space with 4 programmable I/O pins and an SPI serial interface. The SPSGRFC is pin to pin and firmware compatible with SPSGRF family applications. Typical application includes AMR (automatic meter reading), WSN (wireless sensor network), industrial monitoring and control, wireless fire and security alarm systems, point to point wireless link, 6LoWPAN MESH network and wireless M-Bus protocol stack.
	


    
          
    868MHz for externally tuned antenna, 863MHz to 870MHz RF frequency bandwidth
          
    Supply current of 22mA (operating mode Tx, +11.6dBm, 2-FSK, 433MHz)

    2-FSK, GFSK, MSK, GMSK, OOK, ASK modulation schemes
          
    Air data rate from 1 to 500Kbps, receiver sensitivity of -118dBm
          
    On-board U.FL connector for external antenna
          
    Supply voltage range from 1.8V to 3.6V, operating temperature range from -40°C to 85°C
          
    Programmable RF output power up to +11.6dBm, dimensions of 11.5mm x 13.5mm x 2mm

overview:
This module features an embedded microcontroller, Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR stack, serial port profile (SPP), AT command set API and antenna. This cost engineered solution is based on a single chip solution that integrates an ARM7TDMI processor with a Bluetooth controller. The BT 2.1 + EDR stack provides secure, reliable, high speed data connections using Secure Simple Paring (SSP) eliminating manual password creation. Embedded serial port profile (SPP) frees application resources while the AT command set API creates a simple firmware interface using modem commands. An onboard antenna does away with 2.4GHz RF circuit complexity.

title: ATSAMB11-MR210CA MICROCHIP, Bluetooth® SMART System on a Chip Ultra Low Power v4.1 Module, 3.6V, 26Mhz
overview:
The ATSAMB11-MR210CA is an ultra low power Bluetooth SMART (BLE 4.1) module with integrated MCU, transceiver, modem, MAC, PA, TR switch and power management unit. It is a standalone Cortex - M0 applications processor with embedded flash memory & BLE connectivity. Qualified bluetooth smart protocol stack is stored in dedicated ROM, firmware includes L2CAP service layer protocols, security manager, attribute protocol (ATT), generic attribute profile (GATT) & generic access profile (GAP). Additionally, application profiles such as proximity, thermometer, heart rate, blood pressure and many others are supported and included in protocol stack. This module contains all circuitry required including a ceramic high gain antenna, 26MHz crystal and PMU circuitry. The customer simply needs to place module on the board, provide power and a 32KHz real time clock or crystal. It complies with Bluetooth V4.1, ETSI EN 300 328 and EN 300 440 Class 2, FCC CFR47 Part 15, ARIB STD-T66 and TELEC stan
	


    
          
    Bluetooth certification, QD ID controller and QD ID host

    ARM Cortex-M0 32bit processor, 4-channel DMA controller, single wire debug (SWD) interface
          
    Watch dog timer, brown out detector and power on reset
          
    128KB each embedded RAM & ROM, 256KB flash & hardware security accelerators such as AES-128, SHA-256
          
    Integrated 26MHz oscillator, 26MHz crystal oscillator and fully integrated sleep oscillator

    2 x SPI (master/slave), 2 x I2C (master/slave), 2 x UART, 1 x SPI flash

title: XBP24-AUI-001 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Module, Xbee Pro, 802.15.4, U.Fl Connector
overview:
XBP24-AUI-001 is XBee-PRO 802.15.4 OEM RF modules with U.FL antenna connector which are embedded solutions providing wireless end-point connectivity to devices. These modules use the IEEE 802.15.4 networking protocol for fast point-to-multipoint or peer-to-peer networking. They are designed for high-throughput applications requiring low latency and predictable communication timing. The RF Modules were engineered to meet IEEE 802.15.4 standards and support the unique needs of low-cost, low-power wireless sensor networks. The modules require minimal power and provide reliable delivery of data between devices. The modules operate within the ISM 2.4 GHz frequency band and are pin-for-pin compatible with each other. XBee modules are ideal for low-power, low-cost applications. XBee-PRO modules are power-amplified versions of XBee modules for extended-range applications. Part of the XBee family of RF products, these modules are easy-to-use, share a common footprint.

    Frequency band: 2.4000 - 2.4835 GHz
          
    Receiver sensitivity: -100 dBm (all variants)

overview:
ETRX2HR is an Telegesis wireless mesh networking module with ember ZigBee technology with hirose U.FL antenna connector. These modules are a low power 2.4GHz ISM band transceiver, based upon the Ember EM250 single chip ZigBee / IEEE802.15.4 solution and EmberZNet 2.xx meshing technology. Designed for integration into any device without the need for RF expertise the ETRX2 enables the user to add powerful wireless networking capability to their products and bring them quickly to market. The ETRX2-PA offers boosted output power whilst being a drop in replacement for the standard ETRX2. Care was taken to retain the low deep sleep current to make this module ideally suited for battery operated end devices with the lowest transmit current in its class.

overview:
ETRX2-PA is an Telegesis wireless mesh networking module with ember ZigBee technology with Integrated ceramic antenna. The Telegesis ETRX2-PA module is a power amplified 2.4GHz ISM band transceiver based on the ember EM250 single chip ZigBee/IEEE802.15.4 solution. The ETRX2-PA module allows extended range of operation by means of an integrated high efficiency power amplifier inserted in the Tx path. It has been designed to be integrated into any device without the need for RF experience and expertise. The form factor of the ETRX2-PA is identical to the ETRX2, so either module can be used depending on the range requirements of the particular application. utilising the EmberZNet meshing and self-healing stack, the ETRX2-PA enables you to add powerful wireless networking capability to your products and quickly bring them to market. overview:

Designed to meet the needs of developers who wish to add robust, short range Bluetooth data connectivity to their products. overview:

Based on the market-leading Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR) BC04 chipset, the BT740-SA module provide exceptionally low power consumption with outstanding Class 1 range via 18 dBm of transmit power. A broad range of Bluetooth profiles such as Serial Port Profile (SPP) and other vital features make the modules superior to other Bluetooth modules. Another integration advantage is the inclusion of a complete Bluetooth protocol stack with support for multi-point connections and numerous Bluetooth profiles, including Serial Port Profile (SPP), Human Interface Device profile (HID), and Health Device Profile (HDP). An integrated AT command processor interfaces to the host system over a serial port using an extensive range of AT commands. The AT command set abstracts the Bluetooth protocol from the host application, saving many months of programming and integration time.

title: BT121-A-V1 SILICON LABS, Bluetooth Smart Ready Module, for both Bluetooth Smart & Classic Connectivity Applications
overview:
The BT121-A-V1 is a Bluetooth Smart Ready Module with an integrated antenna targeted for applications that require both Bluetooth smart and classic connectivity. It can connect to legacy devices that only support Bluetooth SPP or Apple® iAP2 profiles as well to devices that support Bluetooth smart. BT121 integrates a high performance Bluetooth radio, a low power ARM Cortex micro-controller and Bluegiga Bluetooth Smart Ready stack software marking it extremely easy-to-use as no RF or Bluetooth software development is needed. BT121 can be used as a modem together with a separate host MCU, but applications can also be embedded into the built-in ARM® Cortex® MCU with the Bluegiga BGScript™ scripting language.

overview:
The BL600-ST module makes it easy to add single-mode Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), or Bluetooth Smart™, to small, portable, power-conscious devices. The fully approved, programmable module feature Laird's innovative, event-driven smart BASIC programming language, which significantly simplifies BLE integration. The module incorporates all the hardware and firmware required to support development of BLE applications. What makes the module unique is smartBASIC, an event-driven programming language that enables standalone operation of the module whereby sensors can be attached via any of the interfaces without the need for an external processor.

overview:
BISMS02BI-NA is a Embedded Bluetooth AT Module with U.FL connector designed for applications that demand a robust and reliable Bluetooth connection. This product is designed with solder connections that allow it to be mounted directly onto a main PCB. The integrated high performance, multilayer ceramic antenna is highly resistant to de-tuning, allowing great flexibility in positioning. As well as incorporating a fully approved Bluetooth protocol stack, the module includes a comprehensive AT style interface that dramatically reduces the development time of applications from months to days. The Terminal Control Center software that allows simple configuration of the adapter for rapid product development. Combined with the AT style interface, the development time required to add wireless connectivity is reduced from months to days.

title: BIM3B-869.85-64 RADIOMETRIX, Wide Band FM Radio, 869 Mhz / 915 Mhz
overview:
BIM3B-869.85-64 is an 869.85MHz wide band FM radio transceiver with 5mW. The BiM3B radio transceiver module is an enhanced high power replacement for the European version BiM3A-869-64. Two frequency variants are available in the European unlicensed band. One with 5mW RF power with no duty cycle restriction other with 25mW RF power with 1% duty cycle restriction. The BiM3B suited to battery-powered portable and handheld equipment requiring a high degree of miniaturisation. The small footprint of 33 x 23mm and low profile of 5mm facilitate convenient integration onto a motherboard. The raw data rate capability of 64kbps supports high data throughput in 'streaming' applications or alternatively allows efficient airtime utilisation in multi-node scanning networks.
	


    
          
    Complies with European harmonised standards EN 300 220 and EN 301 489
          
    869.85MHz 5mW 100% duty cycle
          
    RF power output +7dBm (5mW) on 869.85MHz
          
    Data rates up to 64kbps
          
    Crystal controlled PLL FM circuitry for both Tx and Rx
          
    SAW front end filter and full screening
          
    Receiver sensitivity of -101dBm for 1ppm BER (64kbps) -104dBm for 1ppm BER (10kbps)
          
    analogue and digital baseband
          
    Usable range up to 300 meters external, 75 meters in building
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications

                        RF Communications,

title: ATWINC1510-MR210PB1952 MICROCHIP, SMARTCONNECT IOT MOD, 2.472GHZ, 18.5DBM
overview:
The ATWINC1510-MR210PB1952 from Microchip is an IEEE 802.11 b/g/n SmartConnect IoT module. It is a 28 pin certified module with ATWINC1510B chip (8MB flash) and PCB printed antenna. This low power consumption IoT (Internet of Things) module is specifically optimized for low power IoT applications. The module integrates power amplifier, LNA, switch, power management and printed antenna resulting in a small form factor (21.7 x 14.7 x 2.1mm) design. With seamless roaming capabilities and advanced security, it could be interoperable with various vendors 802.11 b/g/n access points in wireless LAN. The module provides SPI ports to interface with host controller. Superior MAC throughput via hardware accelerated two level A-MSDU/A-MPDU frame aggregation and block acknowledgment. RF performance guaranteed at room temperature of 25°C with a 2-3db change at boundary conditions. It also has Wi-Fi alliance certifications for connectivity and optimizations.
	


    
          
    IEEE 802.11 b/g/n 20MHz (1x1) solution, single spatial stream in 2.4GHz ISM band
          
    Integrated transmit/receive switch, fast boot options, on-chip network stack to offload MCU
          
    Superior sensitivity and range via advanced PHY signal processing
          
    FCC, IC, CE regulatory certification, advanced carrier and timing synchronization
          
    Advanced equalization and channel estimation, no OTA/with shield, Wi-Fi direct and soft-AP support
          
    Power save modes (4µA power down mode typical at 3.3V I/O), 3V to 4.2V VBATT voltage
          
    Supports IEEE 802.11 WEP, WPA, WPA2 security and -40°C to +85°C operating temperature
          
    On-chip memory management engine to reduce host load, built-in 26MHz crystal
          
    2.7V to 3.6V I/O operating voltage, Wi-Fi alliance certifications for connectivity and optimizations
          
    Integrated flash memory for system software
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

overview:
The SPBT3.0DP2 from STMicroelectronics is a Class 2 OEM Bluetooth antenna module. This Bluetooth technology class2 -iAP2 surface mount PCB module is easy-to-use Bluetooth module that is compliant with Bluetooth v3.0. The module has among the smallest form factors available in a complete Class 2 RF platform. The SPBT3.0DP2 enables electronic devices with wireless connectivity, requiring no RF experience or expertise to integrate into the final product. As a certified solution, the SPBT3.0DP2 module optimizes time-to-market for end-applications. The module is designed for maximum performance in a minimal space including high speed UART and 8 general purpose I/O lines and up to 800Kbps transmission speed with SPP service active and 250Kbps with iAP2 service active.

title: RN41-I/RM630 MICROCHIP, Class 1 Bluetooth® v2.1 Module + EDR, SPP Profile, 2.4GHz, 3MBPS
overview:
The RN41-I/RM630 from Microchip is a Bluetooth data module with firmware version 6.30. The RN41 is a small form factor, low power, simple to integrate Class 1 Bluetooth radio for OEMs adding wireless capability to their products. The RN41 is perfect for battery powered applications and by default is ready to use in the SPP (Serial Port Profile) configuration. It uses only 250µA in sleep mode while still being discoverable and connectable. Multiple low power modes available allow you to dial in the lowest power profile for own application. The RN41 supports multiple Bluetooth profiles, is fully certified and is simple to design in, making it a complete embedded Bluetooth solution.

    Onboard embedded Bluetooth stack (no host processor required)

title: MGM12P02F1024GA-V2 SILICON LABS, MULTIPROTOCOL WIRELESS MESH MOD, 250KBPS
overview:
The MGM12P02F1024GA-V2 from Silicon Labs is a MGM12P Mighty Gecko multi protocol wireless mesh module. The EFR32MG12 mesh module is a fully integrated, certified module, enabling rapid development of wireless mesh networking solution. Based on the Silicon Labs EFR32MG12 Mighty Gecko SoC, the MGM12P combines an energy efficient, multi protocol wireless SoC with a proven RF/antenna design and industry leading wireless software stacks. The integration accelerates time to market and saves months of engineering efforts and development cost. In addition, common software and development tools enable seamless migration from a module to discrete SoC based design when the time right. MGM12P can be used in a wide variety of applications including IoT multi protocol devices, connected home, health and wellness. It supports Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), ZigBee®, thread and proprietary protocols. It features 2 x 32bit timer/counter, 2 x 16bit timer/counter, 8 channel DMA controller.
	


    
          
    High performance 32bit 40MHz ARM Cortex®-M4 with DSP instruction and floating-point unit
          
    1MB of flash, 256KB of RAM, 2.5GHz radio opertaion, +10dBm maximum TX power, antenna
          
    Pin compatible with MGM111 module, dimension is 12.9mm x 17.8mm x 2.3mm (W x L x H)
          
    12 channel peripheral reflex system, low energy sensor, multichannel capacitive sense interface
          
    Autonomous hardware crypto accelerator and true random number generator
          
    General purpose CRC, true random number generator, SAR ADC, 2 x ACMP, 3 op-amp, IDAC
          
    Robust peripheral set and up to 25 GPIO, 1.8V to 3.8V power supply, -40°C to 85°C temperature range
          
    Hardware cryptographic acceleration for AES 128/256, SHA-1, SHA-2 (SHA-224 and SHA-256) and ECC
          
    2 x UART/SPI/SmartCard (ISO 7816)/IrDA/I2S), low energy UART (LEUART™), I2C, 2 x watch dog timer

                        Wireless

title: SPWF01SA.11 STMICROELECTRONICS, Wi-Fi Module, SPWF01SA Integrated Antenna, 1.5 MB of Flash and Wi-Fi Full Stack
overview:
The SPWF01SA.11 from STMicroelectronics is a Wi-Fi module with integrated antenna, 1.5MB of flash and Wi-Fi full stack. The intelligent Wi-Fi module represents a plug-and-play and standalone 802.11 b/g/n solution for easy integration of wireless internet connectivity features into existing or new products. Configured around a single-chip 802.11 transceiver with integrated PA and comprehensive power management subsystem and an STM32 microcontroller with an extensive GPIO suite, it also incorporates timing clocks and voltage regulators. It is integrated with full featured TCP/IP protocol stack with added web server and additional application service capabilities. For secure end to end communication with the cloud, an SSL/TLS stack is embedded in every module with no licensing charge. The SW package includes an AT command layer interface for user-friendly access to stack functionalities via the UART serial port. It is possible to upgrade module firmware via UART and Over The Air (FOTA).
	


    
          
    2.4GHz IEEE 802.11 b/g/n transceiver, STM32 ARM Cortex-M3 with 64KB RAM
          
    WEP/WPA/WPA2 personal security
          
    System modes such as station, IBSS and miniAP, firmware update via UART and over the air (FOTA)
          
    TX power is 18.3dBm at 1Mbps DSSS, 13.7dBm at 54Mbps OFDM
          
    RX sensitivity is -96.0dBm at 1Mbps DSSS, -74.5dBm at 54Mbps OFDM
          
    16 configurable GPIOs available, UART interface to host system, advanced low-power modes
          
    Simple AT command set host interface through UART
          
    Single voltage supply (3.3V typical), surface mount PCB module
          
    Industrial temperature range from -40°C to 85°C, FCC/CE/IC/SRRC certified
          
    Small form factor of 26.92mm x 15.24mm x 2.35mm

title: MGM12P22F1024GA-V2 SILICON LABS, MULTIPROTOCOL WIRELESS MESH MOD, 250KBPS
overview:
The MGM12P22F1024GA-V2 from Silicon Labs is a MGM12P Mighty Gecko multi protocol wireless mesh module. The EFR32MG12 mesh module is a fully integrated, certified module, enabling rapid development of wireless mesh networking solution. Based on the Silicon Labs EFR32MG12 Mighty Gecko SoC, the MGM12P combines an energy efficient, multi protocol wireless SoC with a proven RF/antenna design and industry leading wireless software stacks. The integration accelerates time to market and saves months of engineering efforts and development cost. In addition, common software and development tools enable seamless migration from a module to discrete SoC based design when the time right. MGM12P can be used in a wide variety of applications including IoT multi protocol devices, connected home, health and wellness. It supports Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), ZigBee®, thread and proprietary protocols. It features 2 x 32bit timer/counter, 2 x 16bit timer/counter, 8 channel DMA controller.
	


    
          
    High performance 32bit 40MHz ARM Cortex®-M4 with DSP instruction and floating-point unit
          
    1MB of flash, 256KB of RAM, 2.5GHz radio opertaion, +10dBm maximum TX power, antenna
          
    Pin compatible with MGM111 module, dimension is 12.9mm x 17.8mm x 2.3mm (W x L x H)
          
    12 channel peripheral reflex system, low energy sensor, multichannel capacitive sense interface
          
    Autonomous hardware crypto accelerator and true random number generator
          
    General purpose CRC, true random number generator, SAR ADC, 2 x ACMP, 3 op-amp, IDAC
          
    Robust peripheral set and up to 25 GPIO, 1.8V to 3.8V power supply, -40°C to 85°C temperature range
          
    Hardware cryptographic acceleration for AES 128/256, SHA-1, SHA-2 (SHA-224 and SHA-256) and ECC
          
    2 x UART/SPI/SmartCard (ISO 7816)/IrDA/I2S), low energy UART (LEUART™), I2C, 2 x watch dog timer
          
    Shaped OQPSK, 2-FSK / 4-FSK modulation with fully configurable shaping
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: XB2B-WFUS-001 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Module, Xbee 2.4Ghz SMT WiFi, U.Fl Connector
overview:
XBee Wi-Fi embedded RF module provides simple serial to IEEE 802.11 connectivity. By bridging the low power/low cost requirements of wireless device networking with the proven infrastructure of 802.11, the XBee Wi-Fi creates new wireless opportunities for energy management, process and factory automation, wireless sensor networks, intelligent asset management and more. Featuring easy provisioning methods and native Device Cloud by Etherios™ connectivity, XBee Wi-Fi modules give developers the fastest IPto- device and device to cloud capability possible. Focused on the rigorous requirements of these wireless device networks, the module gives developers IP to device and device to cloud capability. XBee modules offer developers tremendous flexibility and are available in surface mount and through-hole form factors. The XBee Wi-Fi shares a common footprint with other XBee modules. This allows different XBee technologies to be drop-in replacements for each other.
	


    
          
    Native Device Cloud integration for data acquisition and device management
          
    Hardware and software complete module easily joins existing 802.11 b/g/n (Wi-Fi) infrastructures
          
    Common XBee footprint allows OEMs to support a variety of wireless protocols
          
    Flexible SPI and UART serial interfaces
          
    Available in Surface Mount and Through Hole form factors
          
    Support for low power sleeping applications with <6 µA power-down current
          
    Simple provisioning methods including Soft AP and Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS)
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Embedded Design & Development, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: RN171-I/RM481 MICROCHIP, Wireless LAN Module, Transceiver, IEEE 802.11b/g , 2.4 GHz, 14 General Purpose I/O Pins
overview:
The RN171-I/RM481 from Microchip is a 2.4GHz IEEE standard 802.11 b/g Wireless LAN module with firmware version 4.81. The RN171 is a standalone, embedded 802.11 b/g Wireless Local Area Network (WLAN) module. The module incorporates an on-board TCP/IP networking stack, cryptographic accelerator, power management subsystem, real-time clock, versatile sensor interface, 2.4GHz transceiver and RF power amplifier. With the RN171, designers can embed Wi-Fi and networking functionality rapidly into virtually any device. The RN171 provides cost and time-to-market savings as a self-contained internet-enabling solution. The module has been designed to provide designers with a simple Wi-Fi solution that features ease of integration and programming, vastly reduced development time, minimum system cost, long battery life, maximum value in a range of applications.
	


    
          
    Small form factor and ultra low power for battery powered applications
          
    Firmware configurable transmit power range from 0dBm to +12dBm
          
    Hardware interfaces such as UART and SPI slave
          
    Supports SoftAP and infrastructure networking modes
          
    VDD range from 3.0V to 3.7V, temperature range from -40°C to +85°C
          
    RF pad for external antenna, user programmable GPIO & ADCs
          
    Real-time clock for time-stamping, auto-sleep and auto-wakeup modes
          
    Run directly from batteries or regulated power supplies
          
    Configuration over serial or wireless interface using simple ASCII commands
          
    Over the air firmware upgrade, secure Wi-Fi authentication schemes (WEP/WPA/WPA2), TCP/IP stack
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Building Automation

title: RI-I03-114A-01 TEXAS INSTRUMENTS, Tag-it™ HF-I Standard RFID Transponder Inlays Miniature Rectangle, 13.56 Mhz
overview:
The RI-I03-114A-01 Tag-it HF-I standard transponder inlay miniature rectangle consist of 13.56MHz high frequency (HF) transponder. This product offer a user accessible memory of 256bits, organized in eight blocks, and an optimized command set available in five different antenna shapes, with frequency offset for integration into paper, PVC, or other substrates. The Tag-it HF-I standard transponder inlay is manufactured with patented laser tuning process to provide consistent read performance. Prior to delivery, the transponder undergo complete functional and parametric testing, in order to provide the high quality that customers have come to expect. The Tag-it HF-I standard transponder inlay is well suited for a variety of applications.
	


    
          
    ISO/IEC 15693-2, -3; ISO/IEC 18000-3 Compliant
          
    256bit user memory in 8bit × 32bit blocks
          
    Application family identifier (AFI)
          
    Simultaneous identification of tags up to 50 tags per second (reader/antenna dependent)
          
    ASK/FSK transmission principle
          
    User memory lock
          
    Factory memory lock
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Security, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: RF600E-SO RF SOLUTIONS, KEELOQ Encoder IC, Keeloq, 8 Pin, SO-8
overview:
RF600E-SO is a encoder I/Cs with 8pin SO package. They have been designed to achieve the maximum possible range from any radio/infrared transmitter receiver set. The RF600E-SO is a simple device to use, it requires only the addition of input switches and RF circuitry for use as the transmitter in the end application. Transmission is automatic without user intervention. Optimum range of data transmission is dependant on many factors including RF Power output, receiver sensitivity, antenna efficiency, local environmental conditions and any local Interference data type which is being transmitted. The RF600E-SO chipset use a fully balanced Manchester encoded data protocol designed for optimum use of the radio transmission path.
	


    
          
    Encoder IC's with 8pin SO package
          
    Highly secure Keeloq protocol
          
    Automatic battery level monitor
          
    Fully balanced Manchester encoded data protocol is designed for optimum use of radio transmission
          
    Unprecedented level of security , prevents copying or grabbing whist
          
    Compatible with RF Solutions Systems
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Automotive, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics

title: SPWF01SC.11 STMICROELECTRONICS, WI-FI B/G/N INTELLIGENT MODULE, 2.4GHZ
overview:
The SPWF01SC.11 from STMicroelectronics is a Wi-Fi module with integrated U.FL connector, 1.5MB of flash and Wi-Fi full stack. The intelligent Wi-Fi module represents a plug-and-play and standalone 802.11 b/g/n solution for easy integration of wireless internet connectivity features into existing or new products. Configured around a single-chip 802.11 transceiver with integrated PA and comprehensive power management subsystem and an STM32 microcontroller with an extensive GPIO suite, it also incorporates timing clocks and voltage regulators. It is integrated with full featured TCP/IP protocol stack with added web server and additional application service capabilities. For secure end to end communication with the cloud, an SSL/TLS stack is embedded in every module with no licensing charge. The SW package includes an AT command layer interface for user-friendly access to stack functionalities via UART serial port. It is possible to upgrade module firmware via UART and over the air.
	


    
          
    2.4GHz IEEE 802.11 b/g/n transceiver, STM32 ARM Cortex-M3 with 64KB RAM
          
    WEP/WPA/WPA2 personal security
          
    System modes such as station, IBSS and miniAP, firmware update via UART and over the air (FOTA)
          
    TX power is 18.3dBm at 1Mbps DSSS, 13.7dBm at 54Mbps OFDM
          
    RX sensitivity is -96.0dBm at 1Mbps DSSS, -74.5dBm at 54Mbps OFDM
          
    16 configurable GPIOs available, UART interface to host system, advanced low-power modes
          
    Simple AT command set host interface through UART
          
    Single voltage supply (3.3V typical), surface mount PCB module
          
    Industrial temperature range from -40°C to 85°C, FCC/CE/IC/SRRC certified
          
    Small form factor of 26.92mm x 15.24mm x 2.35mm

title: MC7430 SIERRA WIRELESS, AirPrime MC7430 PCI Express Mini Card Wireless LTE-Advanced and UMTS Based Modem
overview:
The MC7430 is an AirPrime PCI express high speed connectivity in a mini card which is compact, lightweight, wireless LTE-Advanced and UMTS based modem. It provides LTE-FDD, LTE-TDD, DC-HSPA+, HSPA+, HSDPA, HSUPA, WCDMA, TD-SCDMA and GNSS connectivity for networking and M2M applications over several radio frequency bands and supports 3G roaming. It is regulatory approved by JRF/JPA, NCC, CE, GCF standards and docomo, telstra, planned KDDI, softbank carrier approved. This module supports 4G LTE B1, B3, B5, B7, B8, B18, B19, B21, B28, B38-B41 frequency bands, 3G WCDMA B1, B5, B6, B8, B9, B19 frequency bands and 3G TD-SCDMA B39 frequency bands in APAC region.
	


    
          
    1.8V CPU performance IO voltage and 1.8V vref
          
    4 GPIO, 1 flash LED output, 2 SIM interface 1.8V or 3V and PCM/I2S audio interface
          
    USB 3.0, USB 2.0 high speed USB interfaces
          
    Main, Aux/GNSS, GNSS antenna connectors
          
    Diversity, MIMO and GNSS bias antenna
          
    GPS, glonass, beidou and galileo satellite systems
          
    Standalone, SUPL 2.0, XTRA 3.0 modes
          
    APIs, AT commands control options, Windows 7, 8.1 and 10 android and Linux drivers
          
    300Mbps peak D/L rate, 50Mbps peak U/L rate and 3G fallback
          
    Dimension of 51mm x 30mm x 2.7mm and temperature range from -40°C to +85°C
          
    
    
    
          
    FW/Application (firmware version): 02.14.03.00

title: 00425-2 KVASER, CAN Interface Module, 1-channel , Kvaser PCIEcan HS
overview:
The 00425-2 is a 1-channel CAN Interface Module connects CAN networks to a PC using the PCI Express X1 bus. The Kvaser PCIEcan board is designed to fit the PCI express bus systems and provides the user with excellent software support through Kvaser CANlib. Fully software compatible with the Kvaser PCIcan boards, i.e. 100% compatible with applications written for the Kvaser PCIcan boards using Kvaser CANlib API.
	


    
          
    High speed CAN
          
    Supports bit rates up to 1Mbps
          
    Fits in PCI express slots
          
    Communicates with the PC through direct I/O
          
    Supports CAN 2.0 A and 2.0 B (active)
          
    DC/DC power supply to galvanically isolated bus drivers
          
    High-speed isolator circuits between CAN circuits and CAN drivers
          
    Fully software compatible with PCIcan and PCIcanx
          
    Quick and easy plug and play installation
          
    Extended temperature range of -40 to +85°C
          
    
    
    
          
    Interfaces the CAN bus with DSUB connector

title: ATSAMR21G18-MR210UA MICROCHIP, Smart Connect Wireless Transceiver Module, 802.15.4, 2.4 GHz
PEM1303 INFOMART IT SOLUTIONS, Power Over Ethernet PD Module, 10W, 3.3V
overview:
PEM1303 is a power extraction module, have complete compliance with the IEEE 802.3af Power-Over-Ethernet (PoE) standard, and is designed to extract power from CAT5 Ethernet cable when sourced by a IEEE 802.3af compliant Power Sourcing Equipment(PSE). With the increasing demand for Green Power IEEE has emphasized the need for power rightsizing. The PEM1303 series Powered Device (PD) modules provides full PoE signature and programmable power classification for granular power management. Its high efficiency DC/DC converter provides a well regulated low noise and low ripple output with in built overload and output short circuit protection. The PEM1303 provides a quick, easy, and low cost method for Ethernet equipment manufacturers to PoE enable their equipment.
	


    
          
    Fully IEEE 802.3af compliant
          
    10W output load
          
    IEEE power class programmable (Green)
          
    1500V DC isolation (Input to Output)
          
    3.3V DC output voltage model
          
    Compact package minimum PCB footprint
          
    Minimal external components required
          
    Overload and short circuit protection
          
    Wide input voltage (36Vdc to 57Vdc)
          
    Low output ripple and noise, low cost
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Power Management, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        System Monitoring

                        
          
    

Warnings
ESD sensitive device, take proper precaution while handling the device.

title: USB-COM485-PLUS-2 FTDI, USB to a Dual Interface RS485 Level Serial UART Adaptor
overview:
The USB-COM485-PLUS2 module is a single USB interface to two independent RS485 ports, communication device. The integrated electronics of the USB-COM485-PLUS2 utilise the FTDI FT2232H (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed device) and includes RS485 level shifters plus Power/TXD/RXD LEDs to provide a visual indication of data traffic through the module. The module uses a standard USB-B device connector for connection to an upstream host or hub port. RS485-level signals are available on an industry-standard DE-9P connector. The maximum RS485-level data rate is 10Mbps. The USB-COM485-PLUS2 module requires USB device drivers, which are used to make the USB-COM485-PLUS2 appear as a Virtual COM Port (VCP). This allows existing serial communications software such as HyperTerminal to exchange data through the USB-COM485-PLUS2 to a legacy RS485 peripheral device.
	


    
          
    Adds dual RS-485 serial port by connecting to a USB 2.0 Hi-Speed interface
          
    Easy plug & play installation and RS-485 device connection
          
    Operates with USB 1.1 & 2.0 Host and Hub ports
          
    Industry standard FTDI chip set & device drivers for maximum compatibility
          
    Microsoft Windows WHQL-certified, Mac OS X, Linux and Windows CE device drivers
          
    Installs as a standard Windows COM port
          
    Supports Windows Server 2008, 2003, Vista, XP, 2000, Windows CE, Linux, Mac OS X
          
    FIFO with 4K byte transmit buffer, 4K byte receive buffer
          
    RS-485 data signals: Data+, Data-, GND. Serial port speed up to 10Mbps
          
    Powered by USB port. No external power adapter required. +5V output available
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications

                        Audio,

title: ERA400TRS LPRS, Easy Radio RF Transceiver Module, 433 Mhz
overview:
This module includes the ability to change bandwidth of the radio from 19.2KHz down to 12.5KHz, which means narrow-band performance. Internal temperature measurement ensures less than 1.5KHz frequency drift from ambient 20°C, over a range of -40°C to +85°C, as well as providing a usable thermometer for the connected application accurate to within 1°C. Modes of transmission include a protocol with 16-bit encryption and anti-cross talk software, plus raw data modes where users can use self-coding system which can be set to interface to any other raw data module on ISM bands in both FSK and ASM modulation.
	


    
          
    Temporary channel/power level selection
          
    Free flash firmware upgrades
          
    Temperature compensation
          
    Crystal controlled synthesiser
          
    Temperature sensor usable by host
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        RF Communications

title: RN42HID-I/RM MICROCHIP, BLUETOOTH MODULE, V2.1, 3MBPS
MRF24WB0MB/RM MICROCHIP, RF Transceiver Radio Module, 802.11B, U.Fl Connection, 2.483 GHz
overview:
MRF24WB0MB/RM is a WiFi radio transceiver module. It is a low power, 2.4GHz, IEEE 802.11 compliant, surface mount module with all associated RF components such as crystal oscillator, bypass and bias passives with integrated MAC, baseband, RF and power amplifier, and built in hardware support for AES, and TKIP (WEP, WPA, WPA2 security). The integrated module design frees the designer from RF and antenna design tasks and regulatory compliance testing, ultimately providing quicker time to market. The MRF24WB0MB has an ultra miniature coaxial connector (U. FL) and is approved for use with a list of pre certified antennas. This module is designed to be used with TCP/IP software stack. Data communications with the MRF24WB0MB is through the SPI interface. The combination of the module and a PIC running the TCP/IP stack results in support for IEEE 802.11 and IP services. This allows the immediate implementation of a wireless web server.
	


    
          
    IEEE 802.11 WiFi transceiver module
          
    Supports low power, low data rate WiFi
          
    Radio regulation certification for United States (FCC), Canada (IC), Europe (ETSI) and Japan (ARIB)
          
    It has an ultra miniature coaxial connector (U. FL)
          
    Simple four wire SPI interface to PIC microcontroller
          
    WEP, WPA-PSK, WPA2-PSK security
          
    36 pin surface mountable module
          
    Compatible with IEEE 802.11b/g/n networks
          
    Serialized unique MAC address
          
    Designed for use with PIC18, PIC24, dsPIC33, and PIC32 MCU's with downloadable TCP/IP stack

RX2A-433-10 RADIOMETRIX, RF Module, Receiver, FM, 433.92 Mhz, 10Kbps
overview:
RX2A-433-10 is a miniature PCB mounting UHF radio data receiver with 433.92MHz frequency. It is an updated version of the Radiometrix RX2 incorporating a received signal strength indicator (RSSI). It allows the simple implementation of data links at speeds up to 10kb/s and distances up to 75meters on building or 300 meters over open ground. The RX2A combines full screening with internal filtering to ensure EMC compliance by minimizing spurious radiation and susceptibility.

title: ZULU-M868 RF SOLUTIONS, Intelligent RF Modem Module, Serial Data Interface with Handshake, RF Data Rates to 56Kbps
overview:
The ZULU-M868 is a 868MHz wireless serial data radio modem module in DIP package. The ZULU modem module is a highly integrated RF modem and intelligent controller with simple interface to achieve a wireless serial data link for data over 2Km range. Range may be further extended with suitable antenna. The user interface is standard RS232 style control operating at low voltage. All RF operation is automatically controlled (with error checking etc) so the Zulu can be treated as a simple communications device. Because of their small size and low power requirements this module is ideal for use in many application.
	


    
          
    Serial data interface with handshake

    Range up to 2Km

title: RN131G-I/RM481 MICROCHIP, Wireless LAN Module, Transceiver, IEEE 802.11b/g , 2.4 GHz, Industrial Temperature
overview:
The RN131G-I/RM481 from Microchip is a standalone, embedded wireless 802.11 b/g networking module with 4.81 firmware version. With its small form factor and extremely low power consumption, the RN-131G-I is perfect for mobile wireless applications such as asset monitoring, GPS tracking and battery sensors. The WiFly module incorporates a 2.4GHz radio, processor, TCP/IP stack, RTC, crypto accelerator, power management and analogue sensor interfaces. It is preloaded with software to simplify integration and minimize application development. In simplest configuration, the hardware requires only four connections (PWR, TX, RX & GND) to create wireless data connection. The sensor interface provides temperature, audio, motion, acceleration and other analogue data without requiring additional hardware. It is programmed and controlled with simple ASCII command language. Once the module is set up, it can scan to find an access point, associate, authenticate and connect over any Wi-Fi network
	


    
          
    Industrial temperature (-30°C to + 85°C ) with chip antenna and U.FL connector
          
    Ultra low power 4µA sleep, 40mA Rx, 210mA Tx, 3V to 3.7V supply voltage
          
    High throughput, 1Mbps sustained data rate with TCP/IP and WPA2
          
    Small, compact surface mount module with 2.402MHz to 2.480MHz frequency range
          
    Onboard ceramic chip antenna and U.FL connector for external antenna
          
    8Mbit flash memory and 128KB RAM, UART hardware interface
          
    10 general purpose digital I/O pins, 8 analogue sensor interfaces
          
    Real-time clock for wake-up and time stamping, accepts 3.3V regulated or 2V to 3V battery
          
    Supports ad hoc and infrastructure networking modes, host data rate up to 1Mbps for the UART
          
    Onboard ECOS -OS, TCP/IP stacks, Wi-Fi alliance certified for WPA2-PSK, FCC/CE/ICS certified

title: RM024-S10-M-30 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, Ramp Wireless Module, 94Dbm, 2.483 GHz
overview:
The RM024-S10-M-30 is a SMT 2.4GHz, 10mW (CE compliant) ISM band multipoint wireless module with chip antenna. It is built on the core technology and RF expertise of Laird's seven generations of frequency hopping spread spectrum (FHSS) devices. An improved RF frontend and a long list of configurable options yields the best of both worlds very low power consumption and extremely long range. The RM024 provides the most reliable wireless link in the ISM band with several inbuilt mechanisms to reject interference, boost throughput and achieve unparalleled range. It provides unique server/client implementation and fully configurable with maximum network size of 16 million devices. Typical applications include serial cable replacement and digital signage/displays. The receiver sensitivity (1% PER) is -95dBm at 280Kbps RF rate, -94dBm at 500Kbps RF rate.
	


    
          
    Industry leading flexibility and performance in M2M
          
    Unparalleled performance in extreme environments
          
    Powerful API for more intelligent network
          
    Personal support from design to manufacture
          
    Optional external antenna and range of 2.5miles (4Km)
          
    Improved RF frontend, 2.4GHz FHSS radio, 280 or 500Kbps data rate & 2400MHz to 2483.5MHz frequency
          
    Hop bin spacing of 900KHz over 79 hops and 1500KHz over 43 hops
          
    MSK modulation and robust interference avoidance due to FHSS implementation
          
    Supply voltage range from 2.3V to 3.6 (±50mV ripple)
          
    Baud rates from 1200bps to 230400bps, non standard baud rates are also supported

title: ATSAMW25H18-MR210PA MICROCHIP, SmartConnect Wi-Fi Module, IEEE 802.11 b/g/n, 2.4GHz, Wi-Fi ATWINC1500 SoC
overview:
The ATSAMW25H18-MR210PA is a SmartConnect Wi-Fi Module based on the industry-leading low power 2.4GHz IEEE® 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi ATWINC1500 SoC (system on chip) combined with the ARM® Cortex®-M0+ based microcontroller technology from Atmel. This turnkey system provides an integrated software solution with application and security protocols such as TLS, integrated network services (TCP/IP stack) which are all available through Atmel Studio 6 integrated development environment (IDE).The Atmel SmartConnect modules offer the ideal solutions for designers seeking to add Wi-Fi connectivity with minimal previous experience in 802.11, IP Stack or RF. Atmel SmartConnect Wi-Fi from Atmel opens the door of the internet of things (IoT) to the vast array of battery-powered devices and applications requiring the integration of WLAN connectivity without compromising on cost or power consumption.

title: FM-RRFQ2-433 TELECONTROLLI, Radio Module, High Performance, FM Receiver, SIL Package, 433MHz
overview:
FM-RRFQ2-433 is an SIL 433.92 MHz FM receiver module. These miniature RF modules provide a cost effective high performance FM radio data link at 433.92MHz and 868.35MHz. It is manufactured using laser trimmed thick film ceramic hybrid. This module is pin compatible with many other receivers and exhibit extremely stable electronic characteristics over an industrial temperature range. Manufacture on a ceramic substrate provides a very reliable operation over a wide temperature range. This transmitter and receiver pair enables the simple implementation of a data link at up to 4.8Kbit/s at distances up to 75m indoors and 250m in open ground. Due to their small size and low power requirements, both modules are ideal for use in portable, battery-powered applications, such as hand-held terminals.

title: UMFT234XD-01 FTDI, USB Interface, FT234XD, UART, USB, 3.3 V
overview:
The UMFT234XD-01 is a Breakout Module utilizes FTDI's FT234XDIC to convert USB to UART. The breakout module is a breakout board that converts USB 2.0 full-speed to UART. This module do not have a USB connector, instead, the modules plug directly into the USB host connector and the pads of the PCB makes electrical contact with the electrical contacts of the USB connector. The UART interface operates at +3.3V voltage levels, however all I/Os are 5V tolerant. The Breakout modules provide the simplest development hardware for the FT-X series of devices. To reduce cost the USB interconnect is simply tracking on the PCB which plugs directly into the USB host socket. The interface connector is a standard 0.1-inch pitch socket. The module is ready to use when plugged in to enable instant development work to begin.
	


    
          
    USB to UART with four control bus lines
          
    3.3V power out limited to 50mA and 5V with as safety fuse
          
    UART signals available via 8-pin female connector
          
    Supports for FT234XD USB to basic UART device
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Computers & Computer Peripherals

title: VDRIVE3-LD FTDI, USB Interface, VNC2-48L1B, USB, 5.5 V
overview:
The VDRIVE3-LD is an USB host/microcontroller application Development Module with an enclosure, offers a lid to cover the USB port to provide protection in harsh environments. The default firmware of the VDRIVE3 supports UART/SPI communications with the embedded USB host controller and USB host port. This product provides an attractive solution for quick and easy integration of applications with a USB flash disk or other USB client devices. VDRIVE3 is designed to support quick and easy integration of a UART/SPI application with a USB client device. The VDRIVE3 comes in a neat enclosure displaying a bicolour LED, making it suitable for incorporating into finished product designs. The VDRIVE3 utilises FTDI's Vinculum-II (VNC2-48L1B) dual USB host controller IC.

    UART programming mode control signals PROG# and RESET# are accessible via an internal header

title: RN131C/RM481 MICROCHIP, Wireless LAN Module, Transceiver, IEEE 802.11b/g , 2.4 GHz, Commercial Temperature
overview:
The RN131C/RM481 from Microchip is a standalone, embedded wireless 802.11 b/g networking module with 4.81 firmware version. With its small form factor and extremely low power consumption, the RN-131C is perfect for mobile wireless applications such as asset monitoring, GPS tracking and battery sensors. The WiFly module incorporates a 2.4GHz radio, processor, TCP/IP stack, RTC, crypto accelerator, power management and analogue sensor interfaces. It is preloaded with software to simplify integration and minimize application development. In simplest configuration, the hardware requires only four connections (PWR, TX, RX & GND) to create wireless data connection. The sensor interface provides temperature, audio, motion, acceleration and other analogue data without requiring additional hardware. It is programmed and controlled with simple ASCII command language. Once the module is set up, it can scan to find an access point, associate, authenticate and connect over any Wi-Fi network.
	


    
          
    Commercial temperature (0°C to + 70°C ) with chip antenna and U.FL connector
          
    Ultra low power 4µA sleep, 40mA Rx, 210mA Tx, 3V to 3.7V supply voltage
          
    High throughput, 1Mbps sustained data rate with TCP/IP and WPA2
          
    Small, compact surface mount module with 2.402MHz to 2.480MHz frequency range
          
    Onboard ceramic chip antenna and U.FL connector for external antenna
          
    8Mbit flash memory and 128KB RAM, UART hardware interface

    Real-time clock for wake-up and time stamping, accepts 3.3V regulated or 2V to 3V battery
          
    Supports ad hoc and infrastructure networking modes, host data rate up to 1Mbps for the UART

overview:
XPP100200S-02R is a most powerful, self contained embedded networking module with encryption. Footprint compatible with the popular XPort and running Evolution OS operating systems, the XPort Pro eliminates the complexity of designing network connectivity into a product and allows user to deploy advanced applications on the edge device itself. The thumb sized XPort Pro provides everything user need in a single embedded solution. It effortlessly handles demanding applications with power of a high speed, advanced architecture 32bit processor. And with ample built in memory, it allows virtually unlimited flexibility for customization and application enablement. XPort Pro provides bullet proof security by offering a variety of robust data encryption and authentication options.

title: SP1ML-868 STMICROELECTRONICS, RF TRANSCEIVERS, 500KBPS, 870MHZ
overview:
The SP1ML-868 from STMicroelectronics is a 868MHz SPIRIT1 antenna module (region 1, Europe). This ultra-low power and fully integrated RF module operates in 868MHz SRD bands. The SP1ML integrates an on-board antenna with easy to use interface, allowing users to easily add wireless connectivity in designs without requiring in depth RF experience and reducing time to market. It is based on SPIRIT1 RF sub-GHz transceiver (with integrated SMPS), STM32L1 microcontroller, integrated filter/balun and chip antenna. The UART host interface allows simple connection to an external microcontroller with a standard firmware, allowing AT commands to facilitate RF configuration, data transmission and reception using simple point to point communication. Selected STM32L1 GPIO and peripherals are available for interfacing to external devices in user application. The SP1ML can be used as an open platform, replacing default firmware with its own application firmware.
	


    
          
    Adds wireless capability to any electronic device without requiring RF experience
          
    BALF-SPI-01D3 868MHz balun with integrated harmonic filter

    Compact size (14mm x 13.4mm x 2.5mm)

title: PTM 215B ENOCEAN, PUSH BUTTON TRANSMITTER MOD, 2.4GHZ
overview:
The PTM 215B from Enocean is a BLE pushbutton transmitter module with NFC interface. PTM 215B enables the realization of energy harvesting wireless switches for building or industrial automation systems communicating based on the 2.4GHz BLE radio standard. PTM 215B is mechanically compatible with the established PTM 21x form factor enabling quick integration into a wide range of designs. Key applications are wall-mounted or portable switches either with up to two rockers or up to four push buttons. PTM 215B pushbutton transmitters are self-powered (no batteries) and fully maintenance free. It can therefore be used in all environments including locations that are difficult to reach or within hermetically sealed housings. The required energy is generated by an electro-dynamic energy transducer actuated by an energy bow located on the left and right of the module.
	


    
          
    PTM 215B provides an NFC interface according to ISO 14443 for configuration
          
    Integrated PCB antenna
          
    75m ideal line of sight / 10m indoor environment communication range (guidance only)
