    NFC Forum Type 2 Tag (ISO/IEC 14443 Part 2 and 3)
          
    Integrated kinetic energy harvester power supply
          
    Module dimensions of 40mm x 40mm x 11.2mm
          
    Module weight of 20g (±1g)
          
    Operating temperature range from -25°C to 65°C
          
    Humidity of 0% to 95% r.h. (non-condensing)
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications

It provides wireless connectivity to user PC with other Bluetooth devices within a range of 40m. This adapter comes with Bluetooth Software like Widcomm Bluetooth Stack. This means the user will get a comprehensive set of Bluetooth profiles like HFP, A2DP, SPP, DUN, FAX etc to work with. LM505 is interoperable with our range of Bluetooth adapters like LM048, LM058 and LM048SPA.

title: ETRX357-HR SILICON LABS, Zigbee Module, Em357, M2M, U.Fl Connector
overview:
ETRX357-HR is a Low power 2.4GHz ZigBee module with 192KB Flash and 12KB of RAM based on the latest Ember EM357 single chip ZigBee/ IEEE802.15.4 solutions. ETRX357 ZigBee module has been designed to be easily integrated into another device and to provide a fast, simple and low cost wireless mesh networking interface. The configurable functionality of the Telegesis AT command set often allows the ETRX3 series ZigBee modules to be used without an additional host microcontroller saving even more integration time and costs. In addition to the Telegesis AT Command set, the ETRX357 modules can be used with custom-built firmware and they represent an ideal platform for custom firmware development in conjunction with the Ember development kits.

title: RF600D RF SOLUTIONS, RF Evaluation Boards, Decoder Chipset, KEELOQ, DIP18
overview:
RF600D is a decoder IC with 18pin PDIP package. It has been designed to achieve the maximum possible range from any radio/infrared transmitter receiver set. This decoder is very easy to use and can be inserted directly into a circuit. In the stand alone operation, The RF600D has the capability to learn up to 7 unique RF600E transmitters and with the addition of an EEPROM memory device this is increased to 48 RF600E encoders. The RF600D may operate with an external 96C76 EEPROM device as additional memory to store identity information of transmitter/encoders. Data stored within the EEPROM is encrypted to maintain security. The RF600D is connected directly to the data output of a radio receiver module and upon detection of a valid data packet ,It will decode the Keeloq encrypted data stream. When an address match occurs the RF600D asserts its 4 digital outputs. An additional output which shows the status of the encoder battery is also asserted.
	


    
          
    Decoder I/Cs with 18pin PDIP package
          
    Highly secure Keeloq protocol
          
    In stand alone operation, RF600D has the capability to learn up to 7 unique RF600E transmitters
          
    Each RF600D+EEPROM combination can learn up to 48 unique transmitter/encoders
          
    Asynchronous serial interface
          
    4 digital outputs(15 States)
          
    The digital outputs may be configured as latching or momentary action
          
    Unprecedented level of security , prevents copying or grabbing whist
          
    Compatible with RF Solutions systems
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Automotive, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics

title: GAMMA-868 RF SOLUTIONS, Smart LoRa Module, Transceiver Based Industrial Remote Control, Bi Directional Switch
overview:
The GAMMA-868 is a SIL RF Telemetry Module with 868MHz frequency band provides a reliable transceiver based industrial remote control for use as a modem or a bidirectional switch. GAMMA is easy to use with direct no-volt Switch input and direct switching telemetry outputs and serial data in/data out. The GAMMA uses the latest OFDM, spread spectrum technology and extensive algorithm enhancements to achieve an industry leading 16km (10mile) range. Two or more modules may be combined to provide a simple or complex network of radio controls and/or radio modems. It is suitable for use with remote control and networking, remote switching and remote traffic light applications.

title: EM7455 SIERRA WIRELESS, AirPrime® EM7455 M2M Networking Module for 4G LTE-Advanced and LTE Network
overview:
The EM7455 is an AirPrime EM7455 PCI Express M.2 module. It is a compact, lightweight, wireless LTE-Advanced and UMTS based modem. It provides LTE-FDD, LTE-TDD, DC-HSPA+, HSPA+, HSDPA, HSUPA, WCDMA and GNSS connectivity for networking and M2M applications over several radio frequency bands and supports 3G roaming. GNSS tracking lets user to locate, monitor and deploy location-based applications and services with module supporting GPS, GLONASS, Beidou and Galileo satellite systems. Ideal for industrial M2M and mobile computing solutions. The AirPrime EM7455 embedded module delivers high speed connectivity with a wide selection of advanced air interfaces including LTE Advanced with carrier aggregation. The EM7455 support 4G LTE bands targeted at the North America and EMEA regions. Based on the PCI Express M.2 standard with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 interfaces, the EM7455 module offers an easy upgrade path to new network technologies and global access to high speed networks.
	


    
          
    Peak download rate up to 300Mbps and peak upload rate up to 50Mbps
          
    B1-B5, B7, B12, B13, B20, B25, B26, B29, B30, B41 4G LTE & B1-B5, B8 3G UMTS/HSPA+ frequency bands

title: USB-COM422-PLUS-2 FTDI, USB to a Dual Interface RS422 Level Serial UART Adaptor
overview:
The USB-COM422-PLUS2 is a USB to a dual interface RS422 level serial UART adaptor incorporating FTDI's FT2232H Hi-Speed USB2.0 (480Mb/s) to dual serial UART interface IC device. The FT2232H handles all the USB signaling and protocols. The adaptor provides a fast, simple way to connect devices with an RS422 interface to USB. USB-COM422-PLUS2 is a USB to a dual-port RS422 adapter. The integrated electronics of the USB-COM422-PLUS2 utilise the FTDI FT2232H and includes RS422 level shifters plus TXD/RXD LEDs to provide a visual indication of data traffic through the module. The module uses a standard USB-B device connector for connection to an upstream host or hub port. RS422-level signals, including modem handshake signals, are available on an industry-standard DE-9P connector. The maximum RS422-level data rate is 10Mbps.

    Easy plug & play installation and RS-422 device connection
          
    Works with USB 1.1 & 2.0 Host and Hub ports

The SPSGRF-868 from STMicroelectronics is a sub-GHz 868MHz low power programmable RF transceiver module. The SPSGRF-868 is easy to use, low power sub-GHz module based on the SPIRIT1 RF transceiver, operating respectively in the 868MHz SRD band. The SPSGRF series enables wireless connectivity in electronic devices, requiring no RF experience or expertise for integration into the final product. As an FCC, IC and CE certified solution, the SPSGRF series optimizes the time to market of end applications. The SPSGRF-868 is certified CE0051. title: AMW004/S SILICON LABS, Embedded Wi-Fi Networking Solution, Cloud-Connected, On-Board Antenna, TCP/IP Networking Stack
overview:
The AMW004 is an Embedded Wi-Fi Networking Module combines microcontroller with a BCM43362 Wi-Fi device and on-board antenna to provide an advanced stand-alone Wi-Fi and networking solution. An integrated module avoids difficult RF layout and enables designers to rapidly embed Wi-Fi and secure net-working functionality into virtually any device. The WiConnect serial-to-Wi-Fi application may be used to fast-track module integration into end-products. With wide temperature range, the module is suitable for integration into most embedded applications. The Wi-Fi device from Broadcom includes an integrated RF transmit power amplifier and provides superior Wi-Fi performance and full compatibility with all 2.4GHz 802.11b/g/n Wi-Fi networks. An external antenna option provides additional performance and flexibility if required. The microprocessor is based on a high-performance ARM® Cortex™-M4 32-bit RISC core operating at a frequency up to 120MHz.

title: RI-CTL-MB2B-30 TEXAS INSTRUMENTS, Control Module, 2000 Series, USB and RS232 Interface, 134.2Khz
overview:
RI-CTL-MB2B is a Control Module with RS-232 interface used for point-to-point communication. ASCII Protocol is used for point-to-point systems. This Control Module has eight configurable digital input/outputs that can be defined by the user and two open collector outputs. It also includes a wireless synchronisation feature and a port to allow wired synchronisation to avoid interference between readers located close to each other. Four indication LEDs show the status of the module.

overview:
The RN41XVC-I/RM is a small form factor, low-power Bluetooth radio module offering plug-in compatibility for the widely used 2 x 10 (2-mm) socket typically used by 802.15.4 radio modules. The RN41XVC-I/RM provides Bluetooth connectivity in legacy and existing designs that may have been based upon the 802.15.4 standard. This module is simple to design in and is fully certified, making it a complete embedded Bluetooth solution.

overview:
The TCM 300/320 are in-system programmable transceiver modules enabling the realization of highly efficient RF repeaters and transceivers for the EnOcean 868 MHz and 315 MHz radio systems. Several built-in operating modes are provided in addition a repeater functionality. Using the Dolphin API library it is possible to write custom software for the module.

title: PTM 330 ENOCEAN, Radio Transmitter Module, Energy Harvesting Wireless Sensor, 868 MHz EnOcean
overview:
The PTM 330 is a radio transmitter module enables the implementation of wireless sensors and switches without batteries. The PTM 330 can be connected to ECO 200 via a contact spring. There are two meander structures on the PCB which allow usage of a rubber pad to set the level of two digital inputs. Alternatively PTM 330 can be mounted as an SMD component onto a host PCB. In this case energy supply pins and digital input pins are accessible via contact pads. The functional principle of this module is when an energy pulse is supplied (e. g. by the motion energy harvester ECO 200 ) an RF telegram is transmitted including a unique 32bit module ID, the polarity of the energy pulse and the operating status of 4 digital inputs. The RPS telegram content can be configured if other content is needed.
	


    
          
    Frequency: 868MHz
          
    Preinstalled whip antenna
          
    Transmission power of 3dBm typically
          
    It has a transmission range up to 200m for free field, up to 30m for indoor
          
    Four digital inputs
          
    Telegram type: RPS of type 2 (allows interpretation of operating two buttons simultaneously)
          
    ASK modulation
          
    Module dimensions 26.2mm x 21.15mm x 3.5mm
          
    Data rate of 125Kbps
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Automation & Process Control

title: BGM121N256V1 SILICON LABS, Blue Gecko Bluetooth® v4.2 Module, 2.4GHz, 1MBPS, 200M, RF Pin Antenna, +8dBm
overview:
The BGM121N256V1 from Silicon Labs is a 2.4GHz blue gecko BGM121 Bluetooth SIP module. It is targeted for applications where ultra small size, reliable high performance RF, low power consumption and easy application development are key requirements. The module fits applications where size is a constraint. The total PCB area required by BGM121 is only 51mm². The BGM121 also integrates a Bluetooth 4.2 compliant Bluetooth stack and it can also run end user applications on-board or alternatively used as a network co-processor over one of the host interfaces. The module also integrates a high performance, ultra robust antenna which requires minimal PCB, plastic and metal clearance. It is used in wearables, IoT end devices, gateways, health, sports and wellness devices, smart phone, tablet and PC accessories, beacons.
	


    
          
    2 x UART/SPI/SmartCard (ISO 7816)/IrDA/I2S, LEUART, I2C, ADC, IDAC and ACMP
          
    Bluetooth 4.2 low energy compliant, built-in RF pin, low power wireless system-on-chip
          
    TX power up to +8dBm, RX sensitivity down to -92dBm and range up to 200m
          
    Low energy consumption, general purpose CRC and random number generator
          
    High performance 32bit ARM Cortex-M4 core at 38.4MHz (256KB flash memory, 32KB RAM)
          
    Autonomous hardware crypto accelerator and random number generator
          
    Integrated DC to DC converter, onboard Bluetooth stack
          
    1.85V to 3.8V single power supply and 2.4V to 3.8V when using DC to DC converter
          
    Bluetooth smart protocol stack, 30 GPIO, fast time to market and low R&D costs
          
    Wide operating temperature range from -40°C to +85°C and dimension is 6.5mm x 6.5mm x 1.4mm
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Medical,

title: BGM111A256V1 SILICON LABS, Blue Gecko BGM111 Bluetooth® Smart Module, Low Power Consumption, Easy Application Development
overview:
The BGM111A256V1 is a Blue Gecko Bluetooth Module targeted for smart applications where good RF performance, low power consumption and easy application development are key requirements. At +8dBm TX power BGM111 has best-in-class RF performance and can provide long range, robust Bluetooth smart connectivity. It integrates all of the necessary elements required for a Bluetooth smart application, Bluetooth radio, software stack and GATT based profiles and it can also host end user applications, which means no external microcontroller is required in size or power constrained devices. The Bluetooth smart module also has highly flexible hardware interfaces to connect to different peripherals or sensors. Although the Bluetooth smart module is targeted at applications requiring high RF performance, it still has ultra-low power consumption and can be operated using a standard 3V coin cell battery.
	


    
          
    Bluetooth 4.1 compliant (Bluetooth Smart)
          
    Software upgradable to Bluetooth 4.2
          
    Up to +8dBm TX power
          
    Down to -93dBm RX sensitivity
          
    Range up to 200m
          
    32-bit ARM® Cortex-M4 CPU core
          
    256kB Flash memory
          
    32kB RAM

    Integrated DC-DC converter

title: B30931D7020Y918 EPCOS, WLAN/BLUETOOTH MODULE, 2.4/5GHZ, LGA
EAP-E-PA TELEGESIS, MODULE, ETRX2-PA, ENET ACCESS POINT
overview:
EAP-E-PA is an Ethernet access point, it allows access to an ETRX2-PA wireless mesh networking module via Ethernet using the Lantronix XPort Direct serial to Ethernet bridge device. The Ethernet Access Point is a "gateway" allowing access to ETRX2 mesh networking modules via an industry standard Ethernet IP Network. Once the IP address of the EAP has been established and Firewall access set, the EAP can be accessed from anywhere in the world. The Telegesis AT-Command interface - based on the EmberZNet meshing stack can be easily accessed by the application software using telnet or by creating a virtual COM port using the supported Lantronix CPR (COM Port Redirector) software for windows. Using the Ember bootloader custom firmware and firmware upgrades can be downloaded via Ethernet or over the air. The SIF interface also allows the EAP-E to be used as a platform for firmware development and debugging.
	


    
          
    Combines a Telegesis ETRX2 module with a incorporates a lantronix serial to Ethernet bridge
          
    Complete TCP/IP protocol stack and Windows deployment software
          
    Interface to Ethernet 10Base-T or 100Base-TX (auto-sensing)
          
    Protocols: TCP/IP, UDP/IP, ARP, ICMP, TFTP, Telnet, Auto IP, DHCP
          
    Link and activity indicator (LED)
          
    Management: Telnet and Microsoft windows-based utility for configuration
          
    AT Style command interpreter
          
    Integrated 2.4GHz antenna
          
    SIF interface for Custom application development and real time debugging of custom firmware
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Building Automation

title: DS9092+. MAXIM INTEGRATED PRODUCTS, IC, TOUCH MEMORY PROBE, 9092
DS-GPM.S DESIGNER SYSTEMS, Arduino UNO Shield, GPS System & GLONASS Shield with Internal Antenna for Arduino & Raspberry Pi
overview:
The DS-GPM. S is a 99 channel global positioning system (GPS) and GLONASS shield with internal antenna for Arduino Arduino and Raspberry-Pi. This module is a highly integrated global positioning system allowing robotic application to determine its location on the earth's surface. Specifically targeted at the Arduino UNO board user [MEGA and NANO boards also supported] the DS-GPM. S features I2C communication to leave the serial [TX/RX] port free for other functions. GPS/GLONASS data received by the GPS shield is stored within internal registers which are updated once per second and include latitude (vertical), longitude (horizontal), altitude (metres), time and date (UTC), heading (true and magnetic), speed (kilometres per hour) and satellites detected information. In addition the DS-GPM. S features an on board fully configurable four line programmable I/O and analogue input port with automatic measurement.
	


    
          
    Arduino UNO shield standard form factor for simple integration into any Arduino project
          
    I2C interface for simple connection to Arduino or Raspberry PI
          
    Fast 99 channel position acquisition with battery backup
          
    Integral low power antenna
          
    Built in fully programmable 4 line IO and 8bit ADC input port for local sensors
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Robotics, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Clock & Timing

                        
          
    

Footnotes
GPS information cannot be collected without a clear view of the sky.

The BT900's tiny form factor, optimized power schemes and smartBASIC language provides a secure, stable Bluetooth environment for any embedded design. title: BT740-SC LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, Class 1 Bluetooth® v2.1 Module, U.FL Connector
overview:
The module is designed to add robust, long-range Bluetooth data connectivity to any device. Based on the market-leading Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR) BC04 chipset, the BT740-SC module provide exceptionally low power consumption with outstanding Class 1 range via 18 dBm of transmit power. A broad range of Bluetooth profiles such as Serial Port Profile (SPP) and other vital features make the modules superior to other Bluetooth modules. Another integration advantage is the inclusion of a complete Bluetooth protocol stack with support for multi-point connections and numerous Bluetooth profiles, including Serial Port Profile (SPP), Human Interface Device profile (HID), and Health Device Profile (HDP). An integrated AT command processor interfaces to the host system over a serial port using an extensive range of AT commands. The AT command set abstracts the Bluetooth protocol from the host application, saving many months of programming and integration time.

title: LTP5902IPC-IPMA#PBF LINEAR TECHNOLOGY, RF Transceiver Module, 8Dbm, 2.4835 GHz
overview:
The LTP5902IPC-IPMA#PBF from Linear Technology is a PCB with MMCX connector. The SmartMesh IP wireless sensor network is self managing, low power Internet Protocol (IP) network built from wireless node called mote. The LTP5902-IPM is the IP mote product in the Eterna family of IEEE 802.15.4e printed circuit board assembly solutions, featuring a highly integrated low power radio design by Dust Networks as well as an ARM Cortex-M3 32-bit microprocessor running Dust's embedded SmartMesh IP networking software. Complete radio transceiver, embedded processor and networking software for forming a self-healing mesh network. It is industry leading low power radio technology with 4.5mA to receive and 9.7mA to transmit at 8dBmn RF modular certification include USA, Canada, EU, Japan, Taiwan, Korea, India, Australia and New Zealand.
	


    
          
    66-lead (42mm x 24mm x 5.5mm) designed for surface mount assembly
          
    Compliant to 6LoWPAN internet protocol (IP) and IEEE 802.15.4e standards
          
    Time synchronized network-wide scheduling, per transmission frequency hopping

title: USB-RS422-PCBA FTDI, Serial Converter, PCB, USB to RS422 UART
overview:
The USB-RS422-PCBA is an USB to RS422 level serial UART Converter PCB incorporates FT232RQ USB to serial UART interface IC device which handles all the USB signalling and protocols The PCB provides a fast, simple way to connect devices with a RS422 interface to USB The integrated electronics also include an RS422 transceiver plus Tx and Rx LEDs which give a visual indication of UART traffic. The PCB is USB powered and USB 2.0 full speed compatible. This feature can be used to create a security or password protected file transfer access using the PCB. The USB-RS422-PCBA requires USB drivers which are used to make the FT232R on the PCB appear as a virtual COM port (VCP). This then allows the user to communicate with the USB interface via a standard PC serial emulation port.
	


    
          
    Entire USB protocol handled by the electronics on the PCB

title: OASIS-24ZB-PIFA TALON COMMUNICATIONS, THREAD/ZIGBEE MODULE, OASIS
overview:
The OASIS-24ZB-PIFA from Talon Communications is a thread / ZigBee / IEEE802.15.4 OASIS RF module with edge castellation. The Oasis RF module is an ultra-low power IEEE 802.15.4 compliant, FCC/IC certified 2.4GHz RF module with a 100mW PA/LNA for extended range operations. It is based on Freescale MKW22D512V fourth-generation ZigBee Pro/IP platform which incorporates a low power 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 compliant radio frequency transceiver combined with a powerful Kinetis mixed signal 50MHz 32bit ARM Cortex M4 MCU, hardware acceleration for both the IEEE 802.15.4 MAC and AES security and a full set of MCU peripherals. The module brings out all the functional pins of the MKW22D512V MCU for maximum usability and flexibility including 2 UART's, 7 ADC Inputs, SPI bus, I2C bus, USB, PWM, Timers, JTAG, 8 KBI's.
	


    
          
    20dBm (100mW) nominal transmit power
          
    Micro form factor module, off-module RF connection
          
    Very small 25mm x 20mm x 2.7mm form factor
          
    Long range-up to greater than 1000meters LoS
          
    Freescale thread, BeeStack Pro, SynkroRF or SMAC
          
    15 selectable IEEE 802.15.4 RF channels, extensive low power modes
          
    1.8V to 3.6V operation (fully functional at 1.8V)
          
    Operating temperature range from -40°C to +105°C

                        Metering,

title: ARF7678BAX ADEUNIS, BLUETOOTH DATA CLASS2, BTC2, RF PIN
overview:
This miniature module (22 x 14 x 3 mm) allows a two-way Bluetooth data transmission, up to 30m. It uses the 2.45GHz frequency world band. This module is Bluetooth V2 certifi ed under the End Product category, allowing customers integrating our solution, to use the Bluetooth label. The data transmission and confi guration are done via an UART serial interface TTL type. The radio rate goes from 723kbps to 3Mbps EDR. The miniature antenna is integrated (RF pin version also available). In Data mode, the embedded SPP profi le allows the module to establish a wireless serial link to a PDA, laptop, mobile phone or other device equipped with a Bluetooth function. OPP profile allows you to send files to a Bluetooth system.

title: ARF7532K ADEUNIS, WIFI MODEM, ARF45-PRO, RS232
overview:
ARF7532I is an WiFi gateway belongs to ARF45-PRO family. The ARF45 are a family of Serial to Wi-Fi gateways. They permit an immediate connection of any serial device to a Wi-Fi network with an enhanced level of security. Available in a ready to use IP65 case, they allow a data wireless link over 200m. The range comes in two versions, "Standard" model proposes RS232 / RS485 interface & complies with the 802.11b and 802.11g network standards with WPA-PSK security. "Pro" model works in RS232. In addition to all standard features, it complies with the 802.11i standard with an advanced WPA-2 Enterprise security protocol. Both versions incorporate "Roaming" technology, making it possible to connect to the nearest Wi-Fi access point and/or the one with the strongest radio signal automatically. This ensures a reliable and uninterrupted connection to the network, In order to make their use and deployment easy and they have an on-board web server accessible via any standard internet browser.
	


    
          
    Frequency of 2.412 to 2.484GHz
          
    Radiated RF power of 32mW
          
    Range 200m
          
    Bit rate is 11Mbits/s & 54Mbits/s
          
    UART data rate 2.4 to 921.6kbps
          
    Sensitivity of -82dBm
          
    Modulation type is DSSS
          
    Transparent mode
          
    Same as standard version + v2C, FTP, PPP, SSL/TLS, SSH, RSS, DNS are supported protocols
          
    Same as standard version + WPA2-PSK + WPA2-Enterprise (EAPTLS/TTLS,PEAP,LEAP) are network security
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Robotics

title: ARF7509A ADEUNIS, BLUETOOTH DATA CLASS1 DONGLES, ARF62
overview:
ARF7509A is an cable replacement pack with 1 DCE/DB9F + 1 DTE/DB9M. ARF62 dongles are wireless Bluetooth class1 network adaptors usable for full duplex data transfer between Bluetooth equipment over distances up to 150m. They use the international 2.45GHz frequency band as described by European Directive RTTE EN 300-220 / EN 301-489 and FCC P15 / IC (USA/CAN). These dongles integrate the Bluetooth V2 stack and are Bluetooth certified. They enable fast file transfer (723kbps) without any wires or dedicated software. Configuration can be carried out using AT commands through a serial port. They can be used in command mode or transparent mode. They take advantage of an extremely compact design with a built-in antenna. They are able to replace cables to build any connection between a PSTN / GPRS modem and a PDA or between a PC and any Bluetooth device.
	


    
          
    Bluetooth Class1 network adaptors
          
    Frequency on the free wavebands 2.4 - 2.5GHz
          
    Totally complies with the Bluetooth V2 standard
          
    Radio rate up to 723kbps
          
    Serial link rate: 9.6 to 115.2kbps
          
    Configuration through AT commands
          
    Full RS232 serial port profile
          
    Specific Profil : GAP - SDAP - SPP - DUN - SPP config.
          
    Range: 150m
          
    Compact design with integrated antenna

overview:
ARF7456A is an Bluetooth class 1 module. This miniature module enables two-way Bluetooth transmission over a range of 150m. It uses the 2.45GHz world frequency band. This module fully complies with the V2.0+EDR Bluetooth standard and data rate goes up to 3Mbps. Data exchange and set-up are only done through an UART data port under SPP profile which can be used in two modes ie command mode and transparent mode. A miniature antenna is integrated. The module converts data from a serial link into a Bluetooth radio frame to be sent to a similar piece of equipment. The operating parameters of the Bluetooth module (serial link, Bluetooth management) can be fully updated through AT commands via the serial link. The major advantage stems from the fact that this module is fully compatible with PDA's, laptops and Bluetooth GSMs.

title: ARF7208A ADEUNIS, BLUETOOTH AUDIO CLASS2 MODULE, ARF32
overview:
ARF7208A is an class2 Bluetooth module with "Data & analogue Audio" transmissions over 20m. It uses the international 2.45GHz frequency band as described by European Directive RTTE / EN300-328 / EN301-489 and US FCC part 15 (USA/CAN). This module is Bluetooth V2 "End Product" certified, meaning users are able to directly use the Bluetooth logo. Data transmission and configuration are both managed through UART-type TTL serial interface. The air rate is 723kbps. Miniature antenna is included. With the "Data" version, the embedded SPP profile allows the ARF32 module to establish a wireless serial connection with any Bluetooth enabled device. The "Audio" versions offer the data features, an SCO link that supports HFP, HSP and HSAG profiles. By using the HSAG profile, the ARF32 module becomes a gateway to any generic Bluetooth headset. With the HFP and HSP profiles and with additional basic microphone and speaker, the ARF32 module becomes a "hand free" system.

AMB8636 AMBER WIRELESS, Radio Module, 868MHz, 27dBm, 2V to 3.6V
overview:
The AMB8636 is a 868MHz Compact Radio Module with SMA connector for wireless half-duplex communication. The integrated microprocessor controls data communication, handling packet and checksum generation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and re-transmission of lost packets. The host system does not have to perform any radio-specific tasks. The module can be configured in many ways and supports data transfer with fast channel and address switching. An opportunity to assess the quality of the radio link is also provided by using the measured field strength (RSSI value). The AMB8636 is connected to a host system via the UART interface with bit rates of up to 115.2kBaud. Other pins are used for data flow control and to switch between operating modes. Using appropriate firmware, the module is also suitable for autonomously recording digital or analogue signals.
	


    
          
    Ultra high performance
          
    Compact design
          
    Flexible addressing with up to 255 nodes
          
    Integrated AMBER RF stack with extensive functions
          
    Robust OEM radio module for the 868MHz SRD band (g3 500mW)
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Wireless

overview:
The AMBZ420 is a compact, powerful 2.4 GHz transceiver module. It combines the latest transceiver technology with a sophisticated antenna circuit in a compact module. With only a few external components, a complete ZigBee compatible network solution can be built. Due to its small size, outstanding performance at low power consumption and easy modular handling, the AMBZ420 is leading the way for the new generation of ZigBee OEM modules. In conjunction with the TI ZNP stack, the AMBZ420 allows simple integration of ZigBee connections into existing systems via a serial interface. The module takes on all of the tasks of the ZigBee protocol and keeps the resources of the host system free for other applications.

    Fully integrated ZigBee PRO stack
          
    Small form factor: 17 x 27.5 x 4 mm

title: AMB8425-M AMBER WIRELESS, RF MODULE, TXRX, CC1101, EXT ANT
overview:
The AMB8425-M is an embedded low-cost wireless M-Bus radio module operates in 12 channels of 868 MHz frequency band. The wireless M-Bus standard (EN13757-4:2005) specifies the communication between water, gas, heat and electricity meters and concentrators. The wireless M-bus radio module AMB8425-M was designed as a subcomponent group for wireless reading of meters. The standard comprises various operating modes (S, T and R) to meet the requirements of one way and two way data communication in stationary and mobile systems. The integrated protocol controls the entire data communication. Data packets are built and transmitted according to EN13757-4:2005 specification. Configuration of parameters is handled via the UART interface and a control pin. The radio module can be addressed directly from a computer using the windows program AMBER commander.
	


    
          
    Low cost wireless M-Bus radio module (868 MHz SRD Band)
          
    Embedded wireless M-Bus according to EN13757-4:2005 standard
          
    Range up to 700m (line of sight)
          
    Small form factor of 16 x 27 x 3.5mm

    Communication and configuration via UART/SPI Interface

    Conforms with EU R&TTE 1999/5/EC directive
          
    Available on tape & reel for SMD mounting

                        RF Communications

title: V2DIP1-32 FTDI, USB Interface, USB Host Interface, VNC2-32Q, SPI, UART, 5 V
overview:
V2DIP1-32 is a 32pin VNC2 based development module with single USB connector. The module is targeted for prototyping with the VNC2 and for application integration to enable USB capability within a finished product design. The VNC2 is the second of FTDI's Vinculum family of Embedded dual USB host controller devices. The VNC2 device provides USB Host interfacing capability for variety of different USB device classes including support for BOMS, Printer, HID. For mass storage devices such as USB Flash drives, VNC2 also transparently handles the FAT file structure. Communication with non USB devices such as a low cost microcontroller is accomplished via either UART, SPI or parallel FIFO interfaces. The VNC2 provides a new cost effective solution for providing USB Host capability into products that previously did not have the hardware resources available. The VNC2 supports the capability to enable customers to develop custom firmware using the Vinculum II development software tool suite.
	


    
          
    Uses FTDI's VNC2-32Q embedded USB host controller IC device.
          
    USB 'A' type USB socket to interface with USB peripheral devices
          
    Second USB interface port accessible via module pins if required
          
    UART, parallel FIFO with and SPI interfaces can be programmed to a choice of available I/O pins
          
    Single 5V supply input from DIL connectors or 5V supplied via USB VBUS slave interface or debugger
          
    All VNC2 signals available on 0.6" wide / 0.1" pitch DIL male connectors
          
    Power and traffic indicator LED's
          
    Debugger interface pin available on DIL pins or via 6way male header
          
    Firmware upgrades via UART or debugger interface pin header
          
    Development tool supports compiler, linker and debugger tools complete within an IDE

title: USB-COM422-PLUS-1 FTDI, Adapter Board, FTDI Chip, Single Channel USB to RS422 Converter Module
overview:
The USB-COM422-PLUS1 module is a single channel USB to RS422 converter module. The USB-COM422-PLUS1 is based on the FTDI FT232R and includes level shifters to support full RS422 signalling plus Power/TXD/RXD LEDs to provide a visual indication of data traffic through the module. The module uses a standard USB-B device connector for connection to an upstream host or hub port. RS422-level signals, including modem handshake signals, are available on an industry-standard DE-9P connector. The maximum RS422-level data rate is 3Mbps. The USB-COM422-Plus1 module requires USB device drivers, which are used to make the USB-COM422-Plus1 appear as a Virtual COM Port (VCP). This allows existing serial communications software such as HyperTerminal to exchange data through the USB-COM422-Plus1 to a legacy RS422 peripheral device.
	


    
          
    Adds one RS-422 serial port by connecting to USB
          
    Easy plug & play installation and RS-422 device connection
          
    Works with USB 1.1 & 2.0 Host and Hub ports
          
    Industry standard FTDI chip set & device drivers for maximum compatibility
          
    Microsoft Windows WHQL-certified, Mac OS X, Linux and Windows CE device drivers
          
    Installs as a standard Windows COM port
          
    Installs as a standard Windows COM port
          
    FIFO with 128 byte transmit buffer, 256 byte receive buffer
          
    RS-422 data signals: TxD+,TxD-,RxD+,RxD-,RTS+,RTS-,CTS+,CTS-,GND. Serial port speed up to 3Mbps
          
    Powered by USB port. No external power adapter required

overview:
The AMB8425 is a compact and low-cost radio data transmission module for wireless half-duplex communication. The integrated microprocessor controls data communication, handling packet and checksum formation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and resending not-received packets. The host system does not have to perform any radio specific tasks. The module can be configured in many ways and supports data transfer with fast channel and address switching. Measured field strength (RSSI value) offers the option of enhancing quality of the radio link. The GUI for the freely available Windows application AMBER-ACC makes it easy to set operating parameters. A USB stick version is available to easily connect the AMB8425 to a PC system.

title: 725TRX8-16K RF SOLUTIONS, TELEMETRY TRANSCEIVER, 869.5MHZ, 20DBM
overview:
The 725TRX8-16K from RF Solutions is a 700 series 868MHz DIN rail radio telemetry transceiver (+20dBm). The 725TRX telemetry system provides bi-directional, transceiver, remote switching. The module has two switch inputs and two relay changeover contact outputs. When two or more modules are paired together the relay outputs will follow the state changes of the other modules inputs. Additional input/output modules can be connected to provide extra inputs/outputs to a 725TRX. All signals are acknowledged and a watchdog feature means that when an input is activated, the status of its remote counterpart is assured. This is automatic, allowing the user to simply connect to the screw terminals and achieve a reliable telemetry link. Supply current is 50mA (quiescent), 101mA (all output relays operating), 25mA (watchdog relay operating), 95mA (when transmitting). Typical applications include industrial telemetry, remote monitoring and control, reliable remote switch.
	


    
          
    FSK and spread spectrum LoRa

title: 660EVAL RF SOLUTIONS, BOARD, EVALUATION
overview:
RF650-EVAL is evaluation host PCB for RF650 module, The RF650 radio transceiver module provides a reliable wireless communications for the transfer of data at gaussian frequency shift keying (GFSK), Manchester encoded, RF data rates of up to 100 kbps. Their unique features of narrow band operation and user channel selection combined with excellent interference rejection make them an ideal choice for next generation application. The transceivers have the functions of a complete radio modem and simply require CMOS/TTL data at the transmit input and the corresponding transceiver(s) output the same data. Preamble and CRC are automatically generated and added to the RF transmission. This eval board operates within the 433MHz band with user selectable channels. The RF650 can use any channel in 100kHz steps. The modules both use a crystal controlled design which provides narrow band performance and is far superior to other wideband 'SAW' based designs.

title: 650201279G AUREL, MODULE, AUREL RFT-868-5V, SERIALISED
overview:
The RFT-868 Module is the key element for RFTide network, developed by Aurel it is a 868MHz transceiver to be used on a actuator or in a remote sensor. It is equipped with two input pins which can be used as digital input or Analogue inputs and two output digital pins to perform actuation, one of which can implement a Pulse Width Modulation. A UART interface with a specific protocol is also provided in order to establish a more customizable network. title: 32000573 MIPOT, RF MODULE, TRANSCEIVER, FSK, 434MHZ
AMB8355 AMBER WIRELESS, RF DATA MODEM, 869MHZ, 20KM, 8 CH
overview:
The AMB8355 is a powerful OEM radio data modem enabling cable-free and reliable transmission of data over long distances. The embedded microprocessor controls the complete wireless data communication, thus handling packet and checksum formation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and resending of unacknowledged data packets. A buffer memory is provided to enable transmission and reception of data independently of the connected host controller. The radio modem can be used as a transparent cable replacement. The AMB8355 features a command set of various transmission modes to meet the requirements of the respective application. It provides a broadcast operation mode and it enables the user to address up to 255 devices per channel. The GUI for the freely available Windows application AMBER-ACC makes it easy to set the operating parameters. The configuration of the parameters can alternatively be realised by means of AT-commands.
	


    
          
    Multi-channel, narrowband RF data modem
          
    Transmit power 500 mW
          
    Range up to 20km (line of sight)
          
    RF data rates up to 19.2 kbps
          
    Integrated microcontroller (8 kbyte data buffer)
          
    Flexible software stack to suit a wide range of applications
          
    Complies with R&TTE directive 1999/5/EC
          
    Licence-free within Europe
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Building Automation

title: AMB8350 AMBER WIRELESS, RF DATA MODEM, 868MHZ, 2KM, 31 CH
overview:
The AMB8350 is a high performance wireless modem providing a reliable low cost serial data communication link that can be used for many data communications application at an exceptionally competitive price. The modem operates in the ISM 868 MHz band. The RF modem is very simple to use and provides a wireless RS232 link with a RF data rate of up to 57.6 kbps. The parameter of the RF modem is realised via serial interface by making use of PC software 'ACC' supplied by Amber wireless. The serial link interface is fully programmable from 110 bps up to 115.2 Kbps. The modem achieves a RF range of up to 2 km (at clear line of sight). Each modem may be configured to either operate in 'Master' or 'Slave' mode for use in a wireless network.
	


    
          
    Radio data modem 868 MHz
          
    Industry standard RS232 interface
          
    Radio data rate up to 57.6Kbps
          
    RS232 data rate up to 115.2Kbps
          
    RF range up to 2km (at clear line of sight)
          
    RF output power typ 20mW
          
    Embedded communications firmware
          
    Addressed mode, P2P, P2MP communication
          
    Transparent or data verified broadcast modes
          
    Configurable AMBER ACC software for PC

                        Security,

title: AMB2560 AMBER WIRELESS, RF ADAPTOR, FSK, MSK, 2.4GHZ, USB
overview:
The AMB2560 is a variation of the low cost radio module AMB2520 for easy connection to the PC via the USB interface. In combination with the relevant radio technology in the end device, This solution enables quick and simple realization of PC supported radio networks and can be used. For example, for data collection or control tasks. The integrated radio module AMB2520 enables a wireless half-duplex transmission of data. The integrated microprocessor controls all radio communication and handles packet and checks on formation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and also the resending of unacknowledged packets. The USB stick offers numerous configuration possibilities and data transfer with fast channel and address switching is also supported. It is also possible to assess the quality of the radio link using the measured field strength (RSSI value). The graphical user interface of the free windows application "AMBER-ACC" allows easy configuration of the operating parameters.
	


    
          
    PC link for OEM radio module AMB2520 via USB 
          
    Range up to 100m
          
    Communication via a virtual COM port
          
    Software stack with comprehensive functions
          
    Flexible addressing 
          
    Flexible network topologies 
          
    Configurable data rate and data transfer channel

overview:
The AMB2520 is a compact and low-cost radio data transmission module for wireless half-duplex communication. The integrated microprocessor controls data communication, handling packet and checksum formation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and resending unreceived packets. The host system does not have to perform any radio-specific tasks. The module can be configured in many ways and supports data transfer with fast channel and address switching. Measured field strength (RSSI value) offers the option of enhancing quality of the radio link. The GUI for the freely available windows application AMBER-ACC makes it easy to set operating parameters. A USB adapter is available to easily connect the AMB2520 to any PC system or data terminal.

overview:
The RF Solutions AM Superheterodyne Receivers are compact modules, which can be used to capture undecoded data from any equivalent AM Transmitter, such as R.F. Solutions AM-RT4 range of transmitters. Receivers are manufactured on a ceramic substrate, the RRQ3 incorporates an LC Filter, pre amplifier front end and PLL Synthesiser for high sensitivity and reduced EMC emissions. The RRQ5 incorporates a SAW Filter to provide a further increase in the module sensitivity. The modules show a very high frequency stability over a wide operating temperature even when subjected to mechanical vibrations or manual handling offering a very cost effective solution.

ALM-1412-BLKG BROADCOM LIMITED, AMP, LO-NOISE, GPS/WLAN, 12MCOB
overview:
The ALM-1412 is an GPS LNA front end filter module, with integrated filter, designed for GPS band application at 1.575GHz. The LNA uses Avago Technologies proprietary GaAs enhancement-mode pHEMT process to achieve high gain with very low noise figure and high linearity. Noise figure distribution is very tightly controlled. A CMOS compatible shutdown pin is included either for turning the LNA on/off, or for current adjustment. The integrated filter utilises an Avago Technologies leading edge FBAR filter for exceptional rejection at cell/PCS band frequencies. The ALM-1412 is usable down to 1 V operation. It achieves low noise figure, high gain and linearity even at 1V, making it suitable for use in critical low-power GPS application or during low-battery situations.
	


    
          
    Very low noise figure: 0.82dB typical
          
    High gain of 13.5dB typical
          
    High IIP3 and IP1dB
          
    Exceptional cell/PCS-band rejection
          
    Advanced GaAs E-pHEMT technology
          
    Shutdown current is < 0.1µA
          
    CMOS compatible shutdown pin (SD) current @ 2.8V is 0.1mA
          
    Adjustable current via single external resistor/voltage
          
    Meets MSL3 and lead-free
          
    ESD-protected RF input: 3KV HBM
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        RF Communications

title: AC164104 MICROCHIP, RF MODULE, RECEIVER, RFPIC, 315MHZ
overview:
The AC164104 is an RFPIC receiver module supports 315MHz ASK. The RFPIC development kit 1 provides design engineers with an easy way to evaluate unidirectional, remote sense and control wireless links based on the RFPIC12F675 and rfRXD0420/0920 devices. The kit is based on the popular PICkit 1 Flash Starter Kit and consists of modular building blocks for different transmitters and receivers that can be utilised for prototype systems. The receiver modules are based on the rfRXD0420 and rfRXD0920 devices and are available in two options supporting 315MHz ASK and 433MHz ASK. These modules plug directly into the PICkit 1 Flash Starter development board, offering an easy way to evaluate the different receiver modules with Microchip's 8 and 14-pin Flash PIC microcontrollers as well as a USB interface to a PC. The design files for these modules are available to allow easy integration of the designs into a system.

    Transmitter modules are based on the RFPIC12F675 devices

overview:
The AC164102 is an RFPIC transmitter module of 315MHz. The RFPIC development kit provides design engineers with an easy way to evaluate unidirectional remote sense and control wireless links based on the RFPIC12F675 and rfRXD0420 devices. The kit is based on the popular PICkit 1 flash starter kit and consists of modular building blocks for different transmitters and receivers that can be utilised for prototype systems or to evaluate Microchip products. The transmitter modules are based on the RFPIC12F675 devices and support the same frequency and modulation formats as the receivers. The transmitter modules feature button inputs for remote control functions as well as analogue input to allow evaluation of the A/D and comparator peripherals on the RFPIC12F675. title: AMB2300 AMBER WIRELESS, Class 2 Bluetooth® Module for Data and Audio Transmissions with integrated Chip Antenna
overview:
The BlueNiceCom IV module (BNCIV) is a completely integrated Bluetooth solution, containing Bluetooth radio (LMX9830), antenna and a fully implemented software protocol stack. The module provides reliable Bluetooth data communication links as well as AUDIO communication links. Thus the module supports AUDIO gateway applications (e.g. Headset or Handsfree). The module features point-to-point and point-to-multipoint link management supporting data rates up to 704 kbps. The internal memory supports up to 7 active Bluetooth ACL links (data) and one SCO link (AUDIO). BlueNiceCom IV is supplied with an onboard chip antenna. Depending on the respective application, BlueNiceCom IV can either be linked to a processor via serial UART-interface or directly to a terminal device. Configuration of the module is being effected through a host processor. Depending on the application and pre-parameterisation, BlueNiceCom IV can either be operated as 'master' module or as stand-alone 'slave' module.
	


    
          
    Bluetooth radio module (Class 2)
          
    Bluetooth 2.0 specification
          
    Digital AUDIO interface (PCM interface)
          
    Integrated profiles: SPP, GAP, SDAP

title: RN131C/RM480 MICROCHIP, Wireless LAN Module, Transceiver, IEEE 802.11b/g , 2.4 GHz, Commercial Temperature
overview:
The RN131C/RM480 from Microchip is a standalone, embedded wireless 802.11 b/g networking module with 4.80 firmware version. With its small form factor and extremely low power consumption, the RN-131C is perfect for mobile wireless applications such as asset monitoring, GPS tracking and battery sensors. The WiFly module incorporates a 2.4GHz radio, processor, TCP/IP stack, RTC, crypto accelerator, power management and analogue sensor interfaces. It is preloaded with software to simplify integration and minimize application development. In simplest configuration, the hardware requires only four connections (PWR, TX, RX & GND) to create wireless data connection. The sensor interface provides temperature, audio, motion, acceleration and other analogue data without requiring additional hardware. It is programmed and controlled with simple ASCII command language. Once the module is set up, it can scan to find an access point, associate, authenticate and connect over any Wi-Fi network.
	


    
          
    Commercial temperature (0°C to + 70°C ) with chip antenna and U.FL connector
          
    Ultra low power 4µA sleep, 40mA Rx, 210mA Tx, 3V to 3.7V supply voltage

    Small, compact surface mount module with 2.402MHz to 2.480MHz frequency range
          
    Onboard ceramic chip antenna and U.FL connector for external antenna
          
    8Mbit flash memory and 128KB RAM, UART hardware interface
          
    10 general purpose digital I/O pins, 8 analogue sensor interfaces
          
    Real-time clock for wake-up and time stamping, accepts 3.3V regulated or 2V to 3V battery
          
    Supports ad hoc and infrastructure networking modes, host data rate up to 1Mbps for the UART
          
    Onboard ECOS -OS, TCP/IP stacks, Wi-Fi alliance certified for WPA2-PSK, FCC/CE/ICS certified

title: PEM3012C INFOMART IT SOLUTIONS, Power Over Ethernet Plus (POE+) PD Module, 30W, 12V
overview:
PEM3012C is a Power Over Ethernet Powered Device (PD) power extraction module, have complete compliance with the high power IEEE 802.3at Power-Over-Ethernet Plus (PoE+) standard, and is designed to extract power from CAT5 Ethernet cable when sourced by both IEEE 802.3at(POE+) and IEEE 802.3af (POE) compliant Power Sourcing Equipments (PSE). The PEM3012 series modules provide full two event PoE+ and single event POE signature for layer 1 classification and supports layer 2 classification via an AT Detect pin. Its high efficiency DC/DC converter provides up to 30W of power in a well regulated, low noise and low ripple output with in built in rush current, overload and output short-circuit protection. The PEM3012 provides a quick, easy, and low cost method for Ethernet equipment manufacturers to PoE enable their equipment.

title: LC231X FTDI, EVAL BRD, USB TO UART INTERFACE BRIDGE
overview:
The LC231X from FTDI is a low cost FT231X USB to UART development module. It provides a low cost USB to UART bridge using the FT231X IC to transfer data at up to 3M baud. The FT231X is a USB to serial UART interface with full modem control. This development module is ideal for programming Arduino Pro, ESP modules etc. The pin-outs follow the industry standard FTDI TTL cable interface. The module provides power and UART interface with full modem handshaking control. The LC231X IO interface also provides the option to output 5V power to external hardware. The interface IO levels may be set to either set to 3V3 or 5V by an on-board jumper with no soldering /de-soldering required. In 5V mode, outputs are rail to rail for maximum reliability. The LC231X module provides 2 interface options. One is a 1X6 pin right angle socket header which follows the industry standard FTDI TTL cable interface for basic UART signals (RXD, TXD, RTS, CTS, power and GND).
	


    
          
    Small PCB size as 15.24mm x 28.19mm

title: SPWF04SA STMICROELECTRONICS, Wi-Fi Module, SPWF04SA 2.4 GHz IEEE 802.11 b/g/n Transceiver, Integrated Antenna
overview:
The SPWF04SA from STMicroelectronics is a WiFi module with integrated antenna. This is a ready-to-use Wi-Fi module conceived for Internet of Things (IoT) applications. The module integrates a Cortex-M4-based STM32 microcontroller and a powerful Wi-Fi transceiver, compliant with IEEE 802.11 b/g/n standard for the 2.4GHz band. The module is cloud compatible thanks to the complete protocol package, which includes application and security layers. It can operate in serial-to-Wi-Fi and standalone mode with customer applications developed in the subsystem based on the MicroPython environment. The SPWF04SA module is configured with a highly-efficient, embedded micro 2.4GHz ISM band antenna and certified FCC/IC and CE. The module supports WPA2-personal and WPA2-enterprise security and WPS (Wi-Fi protected setup).

title: RI-ACC-008B-30 TEXAS INSTRUMENTS, RF Module, Antenna Tuning, 134.2Khz
overview:
The RI-ACC-008B radio frequency power module is capable driving a variety of antennas with extended inductance ranges from 8µH to 80µH including TI standard antennas RI-ANT-G01E, RI-ANT-G02E, RI-ANT-G04E gate antennas as well as RI-ANT-S01C and RI-ANT-S02C stick antennas. The RI-RFM-008 is designed to be connected to control modules RI-CTL-MB2A (RS232 interface) or RI-CTL-MB6A (RS422/485 interface) provide the interface to connect a host system, power supply connectors and additional I/O's. The reader (RI-RFM-008B + control module) and the RI-ACC-008B is well suited for usage in a broad range of application. The RI-RFM-008B radio frequency power module is capable driving the RI-ACC-008B. It forms the resonant circuit with the antenna. The distance between the antenna - RI-ACC-008B combination and the reader (RI-RFM-008B + control module) can be extended up to 120 meters when connected by a symmetrical twinax cable.

title: SP1ML-915 STMICROELECTRONICS, RF TRANSCEIVERS, 500KBPS, 928MHZ
overview:
The SP1ML-915 from STMicroelectronics is a 915MHz SPIRIT1 antenna module (region 1, Europe). This ultra-low power and fully integrated RF module operates in 915MHz SRD bands. The SP1ML integrates an on-board antenna with easy to use interface, allowing users to easily add wireless connectivity in designs without requiring in depth RF experience and reducing time to market. It is based on SPIRIT1 RF sub-GHz transceiver (with integrated SMPS), STM32L1 microcontroller, integrated filter/balun and chip antenna. The UART host interface allows simple connection to an external microcontroller with a standard firmware, allowing AT commands to facilitate RF configuration, data transmission and reception using simple point to point communication. Selected STM32L1 GPIO and peripherals are available for interfacing to external devices in user application. The SP1ML can be used as an open platform, replacing default firmware with its own application firmware.

title: SPBTLE-RF STMICROELECTRONICS, BLUETOOTH MODULE, V4.1, 2.4GHZ
overview:
The SPBTLE-RF from STMicroelectronics is a very low power module for Bluetooth Smart v4.1. It is an easy to use Bluetooth® low energy master/slave network processor module, compliant with Bluetooth v4.1. The SPBTLE-RF module supports multiple roles simultaneously and can act at the same time as Bluetooth low energy sensor and hub device. The entire Bluetooth low energy stack and protocols are embedded into SPBTLE-RF module. The external host application processor where the application resides is connected to the SPBTLE-RF module through a standard SPI interface. The SPBTLE-RF module provides a complete RF platform in a tiny form factor. Radio, antenna, high frequency and LPO oscillators are integrated to offer a certified solution to optimize the time to market of the final applications. The SPBTLE-RF can be powered directly with a standard 3V coin cell battery, a pair of AAA batteries or any power source from 1.7V to 3.6V.

title: DS9092+ MAXIM INTEGRATED PRODUCTS, Touch Memory iButton Probe, Panel-Mount Probe, Solid Face
PTM215ZE ENOCEAN, PUSH BUTTON TRANSMITTER MOD, 2.4GHZ
overview:
The PTM215ZE from Enocean is a 2.4GHz pushbutton transmitter module. It enables realization of energy harvesting wireless switches for Enocean systems communicating based on 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 radio standard. It is mechanically compatible with established PTM21x form factor enabling quick integration into a wide range of designs. Key applications are wall mounted or portable switches either with up to 2 rockers or up to 4 push buttons. It contains an electro-dynamic energy transducer actuated by a bow which can be pushed from outside the module on left or right by an appropriate pushbutton or switch rocker. When energy bow is pushed down, electrical energy is created and 2.4GHz radio telegram according to IEEE 802.15.4 is transmitted. This radio telegram transmits operating status of all 4 contact nipples at moment when energy bow was pushed down. The telegram format has been defined to maximize compatibility with wide range of devices including ZigBee Green Power standard.
	


    
          
    Integrated PCB antenna, self powered (no batteries), fully maintenance free
          
    Used in locations that are difficult to reach or within hermetically sealed housings
          
    Protected with AES-128 (CBC) security based on a device unique private key
          
    100.000 operations at 25°C (tested according to EN 60669 / VDE 0632)
          
    Default IEEE 802.15.4 radio channel 11, user selectable (commissioning) radio channel
          
    Individual 32bit device ID (factory programmed), transmission range is 175m free field / 20m indoor
          
    Radio certification R&TTE (Europe)/FCC (US)/IC (Canada)
          
    Integrated Kinetic energy harvester power supply
          
    1.8mm/10N (at room temperature) energy bow travel/force
          
    40mm x 40mm x 11.2mm module dimension, -25°C to 65°C operating temperature

overview:
The ATWINC1500-MR210PB1952 from Microchip is an IEEE 802.11 b/g/n SmartConnect IoT module. It is a 28 pin certified module with ATWINC1500B chip (4MB flash) and PCB printed antenna. This low power consumption IoT (Internet of Things) module is specifically optimized for low power IoT applications. The module integrates power amplifier, LNA, switch, power management and printed antenna resulting in a small form factor (21.7 x 14.7 x 2.1mm) design. With seamless roaming capabilities and advanced security, it could be interoperable with various vendors 802.11 b/g/n access points in wireless LAN. The module provides SPI ports to interface with host controller. Superior MAC throughput via hardware accelerated two level A-MSDU/A-MPDU frame aggregation and block acknowledgment. RF performance guaranteed at room temperature of 25°C with a 2-3db change at boundary conditions. It also has Wi-Fi alliance certifications for connectivity and optimizations.

title: NV08C-CSM NVS TECHNOLOGIES, Integrated Satellite Navigation Receiver, GPS / GLONASS / GALILEO/ SBAS, M2M
overview:
NV08C-CSM is a fully integrated multi-constellation satellite navigation receiver. Its fully compatible with GPS, GLONASS and future global navigation satellite systems (GNSS), GALILEO and COMPASS, as well as Satellite Based Augmentation Systems (SBAS), EGNOS, WAAS and MSAS. The NV08C-CSM device is specifically designed for use in LBS and M2M applications, demanding low cost, low power consumption, small form factor and uncompromised performance. Tracking satellites from multiple GNSS constellations ensures much higher availability of navigation signals when compared to single constellation alternatives, providing increased performance, accuracy and reliability to devices used in urban and industrial environments. A variety of interfaces, flexible power supply options, and a supply voltage for an active antenna are provided. This very compact and fully featured GNSS receiver can be integrated on a low cost 2 or 4 layer PCB with minimum additional passive components.
	


    
          
    Two RF channels (GPS and GLONASS) and 3 stage SAW filtration for better noise immunity
          
    GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, COMPASS, SBAS L1 signals

overview:
MRF89XAM9A is an 915MHz ultra low-power sub-GHz transceiver module with integrated crystal, internal voltage regulator, matching circuitry and PCB antenna. The integrated module design frees the integrator from the extensive RF and antenna design and regulatory compliance testing allowing quicker time to market. The MRF89XAM9A module is compatible with Microchip's MiWi development environment software stacks. The module is based on the Microchip Technology MRF89XA ultra low-power sub-GHz transceiver integrated circuit (IC). The module interfaces to many popular Microchip PIC microcontrollers through a 3-wire serial SPI interface. The MRF89XAM9A module has received regulatory approvals for modular devices in the united states (FCC) and Canada (IC). Modular device approval removes the need for expensive RF and antenna design and allows the user to place the MRF89XAM9A module inside a finished product and not require regulatory testing for an intentional radiator.

title: XSO210000-01-S LANTRONIX, xSenso™ DIN-Rail or Wall Mount Solution
overview:
xSenso is a compact DIN-rail or wall mount solution that enables analog sensors (voltage or current) to easily and transparently send real-time data to any node on the Internet or to a cloud based application. The options of two analog outputs (voltage or current) or two mechanical relays (AC or DC) make the xSenso a complete industrial process controller. Compatible with some of the most popular off-the-shelf data acquisition systems such as LabVIEW and DASYLab, xSenso is an ideal solution for remote monitoring and data logging of critical events in process control and automation applications. With its low port density, xSenso can be affordably installed in dispersed or remote locations. In applications where analog sensors and controllers are used, xSenso can be configured to send alarms via emails when the analog I/O readings are outside predefined ranges. These alarms allow control engineers to take immediate corrective action when certain thresholds are met.

title: V2DIP1-64 FTDI, USB Interface, USB Host Interface, VNC2-64Q, SPI, UART, 5 V
overview:
V2DIP1-64 is a 64pin VNC2 based development module with single USB connector. The module is targeted for prototyping with the VNC2 and for application integration to enable USB capability within a finished product design. The VNC2 is the second of FTDI's Vinculum family of Embedded dual USB host controller devices. The VNC2 device provides USB Host interfacing capability for a variety of different USB device classes including support for BOMS, Printer, HID. For mass storage devices such as USB Flash drives, VNC2 also transparently handles the FAT file structure. Communication with non USB devices such as a low cost microcontroller is accomplished via either UART, SPI or parallel FIFO interfaces. VNC2 provides a new cost effective solution for providing USB Host capability into products that previously did not have the hardware resources available. The VNC2 supports the capability to enable customers to develop custom firmware using the Vinculum II development software tool suite.
	


    
          
    Uses FTDI's VNC2-64Q embedded USB host controller IC device
          
    USB single 'A' type USB to interface with USB peripheral devices
          
    Second USB interface port available via module header pins if required
          
    UART, parallel FIFO with and SPI interfaces can be programmed to a choice of available I/O pins
          
    Single 5V I/P supply from DIL connectors or supplied via USB VBUS slave interface/debugger module
          
    Power and traffic indicator LED's
          
    Debugger interface pin available on DIL pins or via 6 way male header
          
    Firmware upgrades via UART or debugger interface
          
    Development tool supports compiler, linker and debugger tools complete within an IDE
          
    Communications

title: AC-RX2 AUREL, RF MODULE, RECEIVER, ASK, 433.92MHZ
overview:
The 434MHz Standard (OOK) RF data receiver super-reactive ASK modulation with Trimmable capacitor, low current, low antenna radiation and high insensitivity to power switching noise is optimised for the HCSXXX Microchip family. It is in compliance with European Normative. Performances from the receiver and to comply with the security rules requested by the Certification, electrical and mechanical protection of the receiver has to be guarantee by the User by means of suitable enclosures and applying the appropriate isolation techniques. The receiver must be supplied by a very low voltage source, safety protected against short circuits. Maximum voltage variations allowed is ± 0.5 V, De-coupling next to the receiver by means of a minimum 100.000 pF ceramic capacitor. A whip antenna, 16,5 mm long and approximately 1 mm dia, brass or copper wire made, must be connected to the RF input of the receiver

title: PEM1212 INFOMART IT SOLUTIONS, Power Over Ethernet PD Module, 12.95W, 12V
overview:
PEM1212 is a power extraction module, have complete compliance with the IEEE 802.3af Power-Over-Ethernet (PoE) standard, and is designed to extract power from CAT5 Ethernet cable when sourced by a IEEE 802.3af compliant Power Sourcing Equipment (PSE). With the increasing demand for Green Power IEEE has emphasized the need for power rightsizing. The PEM1212 Powered Device (PD) module provides full PoE signature and programmable power classification for granular power management. Its high efficiency DC/DC converter provides a well regulated low noise and low ripple output with in built overload and output short circuit protection. The PEM1212 provides a quick, easy, and low cost method for Ethernet equipment manufacturers to PoE enable their equipment.

title: MGM12P02F1024GE-V2 SILICON LABS, MULTIPROTOCOL WIRELESS MESH MOD, 250KBPS
overview:
The MGM12P02F1024GE-V2 from Silicon Labs is a MGM12P Mighty Gecko multi protocol wireless mesh module. The EFR32MG12 mesh module is a fully integrated, certified module, enabling rapid development of wireless mesh networking solution. Based on the Silicon Labs EFR32MG12 Mighty Gecko SoC, the MGM12P combines an energy efficient, multi protocol wireless SoC with a proven RF/antenna design and industry leading wireless software stacks. The integration accelerates time to market and saves months of engineering efforts and development cost. In addition, common software and development tools enable seamless migration from a module to discrete SoC based design when the time right. MGM12P can be used in a wide variety of applications including IoT multi protocol devices, connected home, health and wellness. It supports Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), ZigBee®, thread and proprietary protocols. It features 2 x 32bit timer/counter, 2 x 16bit timer/counter, 8 channel DMA controller.

title: USB-COM232-PLUS-1 FTDI, Adapter Board, FTDI Chip, USB to RS232, USB-COM232-Plus1
overview:
The USB-COM232-PLUS1 module is a single channel USB to RS232 converter module. The module is designed to support USB communication with RS232 equipment. The USB-COM232-PLUS1 is based on the FTDI FT232R IC. The module features integrated electronics supporting full conversion from USB to RS232 signal levels with onboard level shifters. The module also features LEDs for power, TXD, RXD status indication. The integrated electronics of the USB-COM232-PLUS1 utilise the FTDI FT232R and includes RS232 level shifters plus TXD/RXD LEDs to provide a visual indication of data traffic through the module. The USB-COM232-Plus1 module requires USB device drivers, which are used to make the USB-COM232-Plus1 appear as a Virtual COM Port (VCP). This allows existing serial communications software such as HyperTerminal to exchange data through the USB-COM232-Plus1 to a legacy RS232 peripheral device.

    Installs as a standard Windows COM port

title: SPWF01SA.21 STMICROELECTRONICS, Wi-Fi Module, SPWF01SA Integrated Antenna, 512KB of Flash and Wi-Fi Full Stack
overview:
The SPWF01SA.21 from STMicroelectronics is a Wi-Fi module with integrated antenna, 512KB of flash and Wi-Fi full stack. The intelligent Wi-Fi module represents a plug-and-play and standalone 802.11 b/g/n solution for easy integration of wireless internet connectivity features into existing or new products. Configured around a single-chip 802.11 transceiver with integrated PA and comprehensive power management subsystem and an STM32 microcontroller with an extensive GPIO suite, it also incorporates timing clocks and voltage regulators. It is integrated with full featured TCP/IP protocol stack with added web server and additional application service capabilities. For secure end to end communication with the cloud, an SSL/TLS stack is embedded in every module with no licensing charge. The SW package includes an AT command layer interface for user-friendly access to stack functionalities via the UART serial port. It is possible to upgrade module firmware via UART and Over The Air (FOTA).

title: WP2001000-01G LANTRONIX, WiPort NR, Compact Integrated Solution, Add Ethernet Networking to Device, Serial to 802.11b/g
overview:
WP2001000-01G is a WiPort NR (No Radio), most compact, integrated solution available to add Ethernet networking to any device with a serial interface. Using this integrated hardware and software module, you will add to your profits by significantly reducing product development time, risk and cost. With a high level of integration, in a compact package, the WiPort NR Device Server features a Lantronix DSTni x86 Ethernet Processor SoC, memory, a 10/100 Ethernet transceiver and dual high-speed serial ports. All of this combines to give you a complete, ready-to-use network enabling solution. Total pin compatibility with Lantronix's WiPort 802.11 wireless module enables a single board design that can be either wired networking or wireless networking ready using either the WiPort NR or the WiPort. To enable access to a local network or the Internet, The WiPort NR integrates a fully developed TCP/IP network stack and OS. The WiPort NR also includes an embedded web server.

overview:
The SQUIDBOARD-868 from RF Solutions is a module which turns any switch wireless. This is an innovative product which allows anybody to make their own remote transmitter and wireless enable an existing switch. With 6 wired inputs to use this tiny board is easily capable of achieving 100m range in open line of sight conditions. The SQUIDBOARD is a versatile remote control and as such is compatible with nearly all RF solutions 868MHz receivers. It operates with BRAVO-T868, ELITE Series, MAINSLINK and TRAP. It is typically used in remote control, remote switching, remote light switch and single or double gang switch.

overview:
The FX30S from Sierra Wireless is a programmable IoT gateway with serial interface. It is an industry's smallest, most rugged, programmable, extensible 3G/4G LTE cellular gateway. Providing an integrated, secure embedded application environment, tightly integrated with the cloud, the FX30S enables swift, scalable and global deployments of IoT applications for any connected machine or infrastructure. It integrates Legato® Open Source Linux platform that simplifies application level development with a secure application framework, maintained Linux distribution and feature rich development environment. It has -30°C to 75°C temperature (CLASS B), 75 x 60 x 32mm (w/o connectors), 82 x 60 x 32mm (w/connector) dimension and features USB driver for Linux, WIN7, WIN8. Also features configurable RS232/RS485 Sub-D9, USB, 1 signal LED, 1 user LED, 3 configurable I/Os, for user app (GPIO), 2FF SIM interface, MFF2 (optional) embedded SIM, SMA cellular antenna.
