title: ARF8054AA ADEUNIS, AMR Wireless M-Bus Ambient Sensor, 300m
overview:
The ARF8054AA is an AMR Ambient Sensor from Adeunis RF is a ready-to-use room temperature transmitter. The radio data transmission is conforming to the Wireless M-Bus protocol which allows the integration of the sensor into architecture of consumption data collection. The AMR Ambient Sensor from Adeunis RF is one of the most compact room temperature sensors, allowing discrete integration, even in individual units. It is equipped with a LCD screen, displaying the real-time temperature measured for an immediate reading of values.
	


    
          
    Radio transmission of ambient temperature
          
    Wireless M-Bus protocol
          
    Range up to 300m
          
    LCD display
          
    Remote sensor version
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless

information.name: RF Transmitter Applications:
information.value: Automatic Meter Reading, Low Cost Wireless Data Transfer, Wireless MBUS

title: 725-OP RF SOLUTIONS, 4 OUTPUT ADD-ON MODULE, TELEMETRY TXRX
overview:
The 725-OP from RF Solutions is a 700 series DIN rail 4 channel output add-on module. The 725 telemetry system provides bi-directional, transceiver, remote switching. The module has two switch inputs and two relay changeover contact outputs. When two or more modules are paired together the relay outputs will follow the state changes of the other modules' inputs. The 725-OP output module can be connected to the 725-TRX to provide 4 extra inputs per module.
	


    
          
    Four changeover relay outputs
          
    Up to 4 725-OP can be daisy chained without VCC linked
          
    Up to 16 725-OP can be daisy chained with VCC linked
          
    Provides simple extension to the number of inputs
          
    5A(RMS) relay rating (230VAC) RLY-14
          
    Time delay from Tx on switch to Rx relay operation is 30ms (FSK), 30 to 1500ms (LoRA)
          
    Time delay from Tx sw relax to Rx relay release is 30ms (FSK), 30 to 1500ms (LoRA)
          
    Supply current is 12mA (quiescent), 90mA (all relays operating)
          
    Operating temperature range from -10°C to 50°C
          
    Dimension is 136mm x 78mm x 42mm
        
    
    
    
 

    
       Contents
        
            725-OP add-on module, Connecting ribbon cable.

information.name: For Use With:
information.value: RF Solutions 725 Series 16Km Radio Telemetry Transceivers

title: 32000519A MIPOT, RF MODULE, TRANSCEIVER, FSK, 868MHZ
overview:
3-2000519A module are fully programmable multichannel PLL based FSK transceiver, with dual IF conversion and software channel selection in the 868Mhz ISM bands. The typical transmission output power is 10mW ( +10dBm ) and the sensitivity in receive mode is 108dBm. The dual IF conversion, together with the SAW front end filter, allows for a highly selective module, with outstanding side channel noise immunity, ideal for industrial application and wireless RS232 and RS485 replacement. The transmitter output frequency can be set digitally by software and is stabilised by a closed loop control. The RSSI signal can be read by the software with great accuracy, so that the output power can be matched to the strength of the received RF signal, optimising power as a function of the required range.
	


    
          
    868MHz FSK transceiver
          
    Typical power supply of 3.3V
          
    The module is based on a state of the art AT86RF211 transceiver
          
    Developed according to I-ETS-300-220 e and I-ETS-300-683 European Standard
          
    Very high noise immunity
          
    SAW front end filter and dual IF ceramic filter
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        RF Communications

title: 32000508E MIPOT,
32000473 MIPOT, RF MOD, TRANSCEIVER, OOK, 868.35MHZ
overview:
The 3-2000473 module is an On-Off Key transceiver operating at 868.35MHz, low consumption and low cost. In transmission the typical power output is 10mW (+10dBm) and the receiver sensitivity reaches 98dBm. There is an auxiliary pin for RF input/output to use when in transmission is sufficient 1 mW (0 dBm) power output and it wants to limit the current consumption. In power down mode the 3-2000473 current consumption is about 5µA and so is perfect for battery supply systems.
	


    
          
    On-Off Key transceiver module operating at 868.35MHz
          
    Typical power output is 10mW (+10dBm)
          
    Transceiver power supply is from -0.3 to 5.2 V
          
    Receiver sensitivity reaches up to -98dBm
          
    Current consumption in power down mode is about 5µA
          
    RSSI signal indicator

    Low power consumption and low cost

title: 32-0151-0 TALLYSMAN WIRELESS, Signal Splitter, Professional Grade DC blocked, 1 to 2 L-Band
overview:
32-0151-0 is a TW151 professional grade DC blocked L-Band 1 to 2 Signal Splitter, suitable for a wide range of L-Band and all GNSS applications, including GPS L1, L2, L5 and GLONASS L1 & L2. The TW151 splitter permits for two GNSS receivers to operate on one antenna, while blocking the DC voltage source on both receiver ports 1 and 2, suitable for applications with external DC voltage source.
	


    
          
    DC blocked on both receiver ports
          
    1 to 2 GHz operating frequency
          
    Low insertion loss 1.0 dB over 3 GHz
          
    VSWR less than 1.25 typical
          
    50ohm port impedance
          
    Clear anodized aluminium, IP67 housing
          
    Allows for external DC source
          
    Allows use of two GNSS receivers on one antenna
          
    Compact form factor
          
    Fits in line with antenna cable
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: 32-0141-0 TALLYSMAN WIRELESS, MOD, TW141, AMP, GPS, WITH SMA JACK
overview:
32-0141-0 is a TW141 rugged, waterproof wideband 40dB gain inline amplifier, specially designed to boost weak frequency signals from 1200MHz to 1750MHz, including L Band and all GNSS (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) signals. The TW141 provides for much longer cable runs from antenna to receiver without degradation of system sensitivity, for applications such as mast mount, large vehicle and timing systems. The TW141 passes DC directly from input to output to support centre conductor DC supply to the antenna, and so avoids the need for an additional bias source or bias "T".
	


    
          
    Very low noise is less than 2dB
          
    75mA maximum current consumption
          
    Wide input voltage 5V to 10V
          
    Cylindrical nickel plated brass housing
          
    Powered via antenna coax from receiver
          
    50ohm port impedance
          
    Improves signal reception
          
    Enables extended cable runs
          
    Avoid installation of costly low loss cable
          
    Fits in line with antenna cable
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Aerospace, Defence, Military, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics

title: 20-101-1321 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, MODULE, DEVICE SERVER, RCM6760
overview:
The ultra compact MiniCore RCM6760 is ideal for todays smart energy initiatives as well as other applications that require a cost effective web enabled device server. The RCM6760 provides up to 6 serial ports, configurable I/O and control features such as PWM. The RCM6700 series is fully programmable, taking advantage of processor peripherals. The programming environment, Dynamic C, is an ANSI C compatible development environment that provides a royalty free TCP/IP stack and Wi-Fi support. Various protocol support such as ZigBee, Modbus and BACnet are also available to help reduce time to market.
	


    
          
    Rabbit® 6000 running up to 200MHz
          
    10/100 Ethernet and pin-compatible with MiniCore 802.11b/g wireless modules
          
    1MB of internal RAM for program storage
          
    4MB of serial Flash for data logging or web page storage
          
    Flexible Interface Module (FIM) provides protocol support for CANbus or SD/SDIO
          
    iDigi platform provides cost-effective cloud computing for remote device management
          
    Seamless migration to chip level design
          
    5X greater throughput performance
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Alternative Energy, 
                    
                        Automation & Process Control, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Medical, 
                    
                        Metering, 
                    
                        Motor Drive & Control, 
                    
                        Security

title: 20-101-1265 RABBIT SEMICONDUCTOR, WIFI MODULE, 802.11, 2.4GHZ, PCI
overview:
20-101-1265 is a MiniCore RCM5600W - Rabbit's most compact Wi-Fi embedded solution. The MiniCore RCM5600W offers 802.11b/g connectivity supporting WPA2 enterprise security as well as encryption standards such as SSL and AES. Embedded web server capability allows for monitoring and control of devices from remote locations. RCM5600W use the firmware update feature which allows for remote firmware updates from virtually anywhere in the world. The RCM5600W Wi-Fi modules are fully compatible with the RCM5700 Ethernet enabled MiniCores, providing greater network deployment and design flexibility. It has six serial ports, four configurable SPI. RCM5600W can easily embed into any existing or new design and is pin compatible with current and future MiniCore products. The MiniCore RCM5600W offers an ultra-compact 802.11b/g Wi-Fi control and communications solution for cost-sensitive embedded application.
	


    
          
    Rabbit 5000 running at 74MHz
          
    On-board single chip 802.11b/g transceiver
          
    Supports 32 GPIO lines and 6 serial ports
          
    1MB of SRAM and up to 4MB of serial flash
          
    Update firmware wirelessly
          
    4 x PWM channels with 16-bit counter
          
    Operate with 10 x 8-bit, 1 x 10-bit, 1 x 16-bit timers
          
    2 channel input capture, 2 channel quadrature encoder
          
    Embedded web server
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Audio

title: 00713-0 KVASER, CAN to Ethernet Interface, Kvaser Ethercan Light HS, Internet of Things Application
overview:
The 00713-0 is a Kvaser EtherCAN Light HS CAN to Ethernet Interface Module facilitates the adoption of the internet of things concept within modern manufacturing environments by enabling data from any CAN product or system to be accessed over the Internet, via an Ethernet equipped PC. It is fully-equipped interface with a large onboard RAM buffer and full compatibility with J1939, CANopen, NMEA 2000 and DeviceNet. Simple to set up using the standard Kvaser API, in contrast to many of the CAN to Ethernet gateways on the market, it provides a simple, inexpensive one CANchannel to Ethernet interface for Windows-based PCs.
	


    
          
    High-speed CAN connection up to 1Mbps
          
    Small, lightweight plastic housing with galvanic isolation
          
    -20 to +70°C Operating temperature
          
    Built-in Power over Ethernet (PoE) - receives data and power over the Ethernet cable
          
    100% Compatible with applications written for other Kvaser CAN hardware with Kvaser CANlib
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking

title: 00688-1 KVASER, CAN Add On Board, Highly Integrated , Kvaser Mini PCI Express
00671-3 KVASER, WLAN Solution, Communication Link for the High Speed CAN Bus, Kvaser BlackBird v2
overview:
The 00671-3 is a WLAN Solution than Kvaser's original BlackBird, Kvaser BlackBird v2 incorporates a new radio chip that gives it up to 75% better range. In addition, more onboard memory overcomes potential interruptions to the wireless connection due to the protocol itself or disturbance. The BlackBird v2's ability to leverage existing wireless infrastructure makes it ideal for replacing cumbersome cable, accessing hard-to-reach CAN networks or for monitoring a CANbus while in motion. Based on radio chip that is Wi-Fi certified and meets CE and FCC standards, it works in both Ad Hoc and Infrastructure mode. The Blackbird v2's API is device independent and so can be used on a tablet or smartphone, as well as PC. Responds to increased market demand for iOS and Android API with advice independent http based REST API.
	


    
          
    Powerful and versatile
          
    WLAN version 802.11b/g/n
          
    Up to 75% better range
          
    Works in AdHoc and Infrastructure mode
          
    Lightweight but highly rugged aluminium housing
          
    Polyurethane cabling suitable for extreme environments
          
    Galvanic isolation of the CAN bus driver stage to protect the hardware
          
    Interfaces the CAN bus with a standard D-SUB connector
          
    Configured by USB connection
          
    Can be used as a wired interface
          
    
    
    
          
    Messages are time-stamped and synchronized with a precision of 25microsecond
          
    Supports 11-bit and 29-bit identifiers
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: 00453-5 KVASER, CAN MODULE, WLAN, BLACKBIRD, 2 CH
overview:
The BlackBird SemiPro HS is a 2-channel high performance wireless communication link to the CAN bus utilising WLAN technology. This high speed interface communicates to CAN via WLAN (802.11b/g), which offers increased mobility and extended range of coverage for CAN bus networks. It is a powerful and versatile WLAN solution to replace cumbersome cables for CAN bus application. It provides flexible communication solution when operating on infrastructure mode and Ad-hoc mode
	


    
          
    WLAN version 802.11b/g
          
    Encryption to WPA2/WPA/WEP128/WEP64
          
    Accessible to Public/Private
          
    Provides the functionality of a WLAN and a USB to CAN bus interface in a single device
          
    Designed for USB 2.0, backward compliant with USB 1.1
          
    IP67 rated lightweight aluminium housing
          
    Supports both 11bit (CAN 2.0A) and 29bit (CAN 2.0B active) identifiers
          
    Supports silent mode for analyzing tools
          
    100% software compatible with application written for all Kvaser hardware with Kvaser CANlib SDK
          
    Interfaces the CAN bus with a D-SUB connector
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Multimedia, 
                    
                        Portable Devices, 
                    
                        Automotive,

title: NTX2-434.650-10 RADIOMETRIX, RF MODULE, TX, FM, 434.65MHZ, 10KBPS
overview:
NRX2-434.650-10 is an UHF narrow band FM transmitter working at 434.650MHz frequency. The NTX2 transmitter and NRX2 receiver offer a low power, reliable data link in a Radiometrix SIL standard pin out and foot print. This makes the NTX2/NRX2 pair ideally suited to those low power applications where existing single frequency wideband UHF modules have insufficient range. NTX2 HP (25mW) variant can be used in applications where greater radiated power is desired. NTX2 & NRX2 modules combine effective screening with internal filtering to minimise spurious radiation and susceptibility thereby ensuring EMC compliance. They are particularly suitable for point to point and point to multipoint wireless links where longer ranges are required at low data rates.
	


    
          
    3 stage crystal controlled VCXO
          
    Data bit rate: 10kbps max
          
    Transmit power: +10dBm (10mW) or +14dBm (25mW HP variant)
          
    Conforms to ETSI EN 300 220-3 (radio) and EN 301 489-3 (EMC)
          
    Usable range over 500m
          
    25kHz Channel spacing
          
    Longer range compared to Wide Band FM modules
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Portable Devices, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: 00714-7 KVASER, CAN to USB 2.0 Compliant Interface, Two High Speed CAN Channels, Kvaser USBcan Light 2xHS
overview:
The 00714-7 is a CAN Interface Module connecting two high speed CAN busses to a PC or mobile computer. overview:
32-0120-0 is a TW120 rugged waterproof, low cost, low noise, low power, narrow band 25dB gain inline amplifier, specially designed to tightly filter and boost weak GPS L1 signals, while maintaining low antenna noise figures. The TW120 provides for much longer cable runs from antenna to receiver, for applications such as mast-mount, roof-top and large vehicle installations, without any degradation of system sensitivity. The TW120 passes DC directly from input to output to support centre conductor DC supply to the antenna, and so avoiding the need for an additional bias source or bias "T".

title: ZULU2-T868-SO RF SOLUTIONS, RADIO MODEM MODULE, 868MHZ, 115KBPS
overview:
The ZULU2-T868-SO from RF Solutions is a 868MHz ZULU-2 Smart radio telemetry module in SMT package. This module provides a reliable transceiver based industrial remote switch up to 2000meter range. Two modules are combined to provide a simple network for radio switching. Each unit is supplied ready to operate, once paired with another module a remote control system is created. Connections for power, antenna and input/output are the only connections required. Each module can be set to act as a transmitter or receiver. A remote telemetry system is achieved when two modules are paired together, as transmitter (Zulu-2 Tx) and receiver (Zulu-2 Rx). Each time input changes on ZuLU-2 Tx, it will transmit status of its inputs to paired receiver. Which will set its outputs to follow the Zulu-2 Tx input reply back with an acknowledge signal. Once completed the module will then go to sleep mode. It is used in remote control, remote networking, remote switching and remote traffic lights.
	


    
          
    Ultra low voltage of 2.4V to 3.6V, small form factor, 2 analogue I/O (10bit)
          
    Data reception LED, secure data protocol
          
    Easy pairing process
          
    On-board XTAL
          
    One to one operation
          
    M100mW transmit power
          
    10 digital input/outputs
          
    Minimal external components
          
    10-channel transceiver module
          
    90KHz to 100KHz operating frequency
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications

title: XTR7020A8 AUREL, RF MOD, TXRX, FSK, 868MHZ, 115.2KBPS
overview:
The XTR-7020A-8 multichannel transceiver represent a simple and inexpensive additional solution to the problem of wireless data transmission. The integrated microprocessor is accepting data entering from a TTL logic RS-232 line, creating packets, avoiding user to write software routines for the transmission management. The XTR-7020A-8 features, using programmable internal registers, channel setting (7 channels in the 868MHz License Free band), choice of serial data rate (9600-19200-38400-57600-115200bps) chosen via module input pins and choice of emitted RF power from -8 to +10dBm. RS232 serial speeds may be differently settled in the two modules of the radio link. The store and forward technique used to send the data allows 240 bytes of maximum data packet length. A sophisticated transmission technique used on the digital data, validation of received data support distance in free air of 300 meters.
	


    
          
    Micro controlled embedded 7 channels
          
    Integrated microprocessor accept data entering from a TTL logic RS-232 line
          
    Uses programmable internal registers
          
    Input bit rate is 9600, 19200, 38400, 57600, 115200bps
          
    Supports a distance of 300m (free air )
          
    Input signal has to be made up of 1 start bit, 8 data bit and 1 stop bit, no parity.
          
    At maximum power only the 6 central channels are utilizable

title: AMB3626-M AMBER WIRELESS, Radio Module, 169Mhz, Wireless M-Bus
overview:
The AMB3626-M is a 169MHz Wireless M-Bus Module specifies the communication between water, gas, heat and electricity meters and concentrators. The module supports operating mode "N" to meet the requirements of one-way and two-way data communication in stationary and mobile systems. It is an all embedded low-cost wireless M-Bus radio module, which operates in 169MHz frequency band. The integrated protocol controls the entire data communication. Data packets are built and transmitted according to EN13757 part 4 specifications. Configuration of parameters is handled via the UART interface and a control pin. Measured field strength (RSSI value) offers the option of enhancing quality of the radio link. The customized application layer can be fully integrated in the radio module, thus eliminating the need for an external host microcontroller. The radio module supports the AES-128 encryption standard. A very low-power mode ensures long battery lifetime.
	


    
          
    N Operating modes
          
    Range up to 5000m line of sight
          
    Small form factor
          
    Low-power functions (wake-on-radio)
          
    Adjustable RF data rates
          
    Communication via UART/SPI interface
          
    AES128 Data encryption
          
    Pin-to-pin compatible with AMB8426-M and AMB8626-M radio modules
          
    Automatic assembly
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless

SMARTALPHA-433 RF SOLUTIONS, Intelligent RF Modem Module, 19200bps Data Rates, 439.7 Mhz
overview:
The SMARTALPHA Radio Modem module provides a simple interface wireless communications module for the transfer of data at of up to 19200bps. Its unique features of narrow band operation and user channel selection combined with excellent interference rejection make them an ideal choice for next generation applications. The transceivers have the functions of a complete radio modem and simply require CMOS/TTL data at the transmit input and the corresponding transceiver(s) output the same data. Preamble and CRC are automatically generated and added to the RF signal. Possible applications include one-to-one and multi-node wireless links in applications including car and building security, EPOS, inventory tracking, remote industrial process monitoring and computer networking. Because of their small size and low power requirements, both modules are ideal for use in portable, battery-powered applications such as hand-held terminals.

overview:

RI-CTL-MB6B uses two different interfaces for point-to-point communication via an RS-422 interface and for point-to-multipoint communications via an RS-422/485 interface. It combines the high performance from Telit's proven GSM/GPRS core technology with the latest SiRFstarIII high sensitivity single-chip GPS receiver. The Ball-Grid-Array (BGA) package allows the end application to have a very low profile and small overall dimensions, making it possible for the design of extremely compact location-based-services solutions. Since connectors are eliminated, The solution cost is significantly reduced as compared to conventional mounting. The new GPS receiver features low power consumption with position resolution accuracy of less than 2.5m, SBAS (WAAS and EGNOS) as well as high sensitivity for indoor fixes. overview:
The AM-RX12E-433P from RF Solutions is a 433.92MHz AM super heterodyne (SuperHet) receiver SIL module with Euro pin-out. This compact module can be used to capture un-decoded data from any equivalent AM transmitter. The module exhibits extremely stable electronic characteristics with no adjustable components and very reliable operation. The module is compatible with RF solutions AM transmitter to provide a complete radio link. Typical applications include wireless security system, car alarms, remote gate control, remote sensing, data capture and sensor reporting.
	


    
          
    Complete RF receiver
          
    ASK demodulation, 433.92MHz working frequency
          
    PLL enhanced noise immunity
          
    CMOS/TTL output, stable operating frequency
          
    0.5µA standby current (PD = +VCC), 3V to 5.5V supply voltage, 6mA supply current
          
    Low power consumption
          
    High RF sensitivity of -110dBm at 433MHz (VCC = 5V, 1Kbps AM 99% square modulation)
          
    Operating temperature range from -40°C to 85°C
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

LM817-0655 LM TECHNOLOGIES, Mode Bluetooth® Combination Adapter, LM817, WiFi and Dual
STM 332U ENOCEAN, Energy Harvesting Wireless Temperature Sensor Module, Whip Antenna, 902 Mhz
overview:
The STM 332U is a Sensor RF Transmitter Module optimized for realization of wireless and maintenance free temperature sensors or room operating panels including set point dial and occupancy button with a minimum number of external components. The module provides an integrated calibrated temperature sensor. Power supply is provided by a small pre-installed solar cell, an external energy harvester or an external 3V battery. An energy storage element is installed to bridge periods with no supply from the energy harvester. The module provides user configurable cyclic wake up. After wake up a radio telegram will be transmitted in case of a significant change of measured temperature or set point values or if the external occupancy button is pressed.
	


    
          
    Extreme power saving module
          
    Pre-installed solar cell power supply
          
    Pre-installed whip or helix antenna
          
    902.875MHz Frequency band
          
    125kbps Data rate
          
    ASK Modulation technique
          
    One LED transmission indicator
          
    -20 to +60°C Operating temperature

                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        RF Communications

title: TDL2A-433-9 RADIOMETRIX, UHF Multi Channel Transparent Data Link Transceiver
overview:
TDL2A-433-9 is a 9600 baud half-duplex multi channel OEM radio modem in BiM2 footprint operating at 433.925 - 434.565MHz frequency(European ISM frequency band ). TDL2A-433-9 acts as a transparent serial cable to attached host. TDL2A-433-9 is an intermediate level OEM radio modem which is in between a raw FM radio module like BiM2 and a sophisticated OEM radio modem like SPM2. TDL2A-433-9 will take care of preamble, synchronisation, bit balancing and error checking along with automatic noise squelching when there is no transmission. The TDL2A provides a half duplex link. Provided no two devices attempt to transmit simultaneously no further restrictions on data transmission need be made. Includes all transmit timing, valid data identification and datastream buffering is conducted by the unit. For multiple radio systems a TDL2A can be set to 1 of 8 unique addresses. As well as having unique addresses, The TDL2A allows operation on one of 5 pre-set frequencies in the 433MHz band.
	


    
          
    Conforms to EN 300 220-3 and EN 301 489-3
          
    High quality, stable crystal reference
          
    Low noise Synthesiser / VCO
          
    SAW front-end filter
          
    Multi-stage ceramic IF filtering
          
    Single conversion superHet Receiver
          
    Serial modem baud rate at 9600bps (half-duplex)
          
    Addressable point-to-point
          
    5 serial select wideband channels
          
    Available as TDL2T transmitter and TDL2R receiver for one way communication
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Portable Devices, 
                    
                        Building Automation, 
                    
                        Automation & Process Control, 
                    
                        System Monitoring

title: RWD-QT RF SOLUTIONS, Reader Module, Micro RWD RFID, 125Khz, Quad Tag
overview:
RWD-QT is a low cost proximity RFID reader module supporting several transponder/tag types. Philips / NXP Hitag 1, Hitag S, Hitag 2, EM4001 / EM4102 and Microchip MCRF200/123 tag types. The module is housed with 24 pin DIP package and requires 5v supply and 700µH antenna coil with fully featured read/write and tag acceptance system. It has outstanding RF drive capability and has a read/write range to ISO card size tags of up to 20cm whilst maintaining reliable communication and high resilience to EMC corruption. This has been achieved through RWD continuously self tuning to allow for inductive changes in the RF field and extensive software/hardware filtering. The RWD module has a TTL level RS232 interface that allows a host system to send and receive easy to use optimised commands/data. It also has internal EEPROM memory for holding system parameters, encryption/password keys, lists of authorised serial numbers and supports direct LED drives to give visual indication of acceptance.
	


    
          
    Micro RWD Quad Tag module
          
    9600 baud, 8 data bits, no parity, 1 stop bit protocol with CTS handshake
          
    Module is completely housed within a 24 pin DIP package
          
    Fully featured read/write and tag acceptance system.
          
    TTL level RS232 interface that allows host system to send and receive easy to use optimised data
          
    Active low switch input
          
    The RWD also has internal EEPROM memory for holding system parameters, encryption/password keys
          
    Has outstanding RF drive capability
          
    Has a read/write range to ISO card size tags of up to 20cm.
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: RI-STU-251B-30 TEXAS INSTRUMENTS, RFID Reader Module, Series 2000, S251B, 134.2Khz
overview:
RI-STU-251B-30 is a low-frequency (LF) reader provides all the functionality required to communicate with TI 134.2kHz LF transponders. RI-STU-251B Reader/Writer is capable driving a variety of antennas with inductance ranges from 26.0µH to 27.9µH including TI standard antennas such as gate antennas, stick antennas. The RI-STU-251B includes an automatic antenna resonance tuning feature which further reduces the need for maintenance and simplifies installation. It also supports both RS232 and RS422/485 interface standards. The Series 2000 Reader S251B provides all RF and Control Functions to communicate with 134.2kHz HDX/FSK transponders. It sends an energizing signal to the transponder, modulates the RF signal to send data to the transponder, decodes and checks the received transponder data and transmits it via a standard serial interface. The reader includes Dynamic Auto Tuning (DAT) function that automatically tunes a standard antenna to resonance and keeps it tuned during operation.
	


    
          
    Best in class performance through patented HDX (Half Duplex) technology
          
    Automatic antenna tuning
          
    High power output
          
    Proven in harsh industrial environments
          
    Easy to install and use
          
    Inductance ranges from 26.0µH to 27.9µH
          
    Operating temperature range -20 to +70°C
          
    64kByte EPROM for firmware, 1kBit EEPROM for Configuration, 32 kByte RAM for data
          
    ASCII with Xon/Xoff handshake, TIRIS bus protocol
          
    8 configurable digital I/Os, 2 open collector outputs
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        System Monitoring, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

title: LM910-0630 LM TECHNOLOGIES, Class 1 Low Energy USB Bluetooth® v4.1 Module, + EDR, 2.4 to 2.4835GHz
overview:
The LM910-0630 is a dual mode Bluetooth 4.1/HCI Compact USB SMT Module with 110m maximum estimated distance with integrated antenna. Its exceptional performance will allow users to connect up to 110m via Bluetooth 4.1, Classic, EDR and LE standards. This is a very small form factor and high performance module which allows you to connect to up to 7 Bluetooth devices simultaneously. The module is backward compatible with Bluetooth 2.0 and Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR devices and also supports connection to Bluetooth 3.0 and Bluetooth low energy devices (BLE). The module integrates high performance Bluetooth radio, baseband, link manager, host controller interface and is compatible with all Bluetooth stacks. The LM910 is ideally suited for Bluetooth connectivity to serial adapters, laptops, PC's, Bluetooth low energy devices and mono and stereo headsets.
	


    
          
    Smart ready
          
    Dual-mode with integrated antenna
          
    USB interface only
          
    PLC packet loss concealment
          
    iBeacon compatible
          
    Low power consumption
          
    Excellent compatibility
          
    Powered from USB only

title: GPRS8000-S MODULE EMBEST, GPRS Module, WAP, MMS, for Devkit8000, Support GSM 2/2+ standard
overview:
The GPRS8000-S MODULE is a ARM based embedded GPS module which allows to connect to Devkit8000 board for GSM/GPRS solution. The Devkit8000's UART (the serial port) from the expansion connector is used to communicate with the GPRS module. GPRS (General Packet Radio Services) is a packet based wireless communication service which is used for various data applications on phones, including wireless Internet (WAP), MMS and software that connects to the Internet. It is an overlay to the GSM network.
	


    
          
    Tri band 900MHz/1800MHz/1900MHz
          
    Quad band 850MHz/900MHz/1800MHz/1900MHz
          
    Output power class 4 (2W) at 850MHz/900MHz and class 1 (1W) at 1800MHz/1900MHz

    Support STK

title: ZULU-868 RF SOLUTIONS, ZULU Plug & Play Radio Transceiver Module, 868 Mhz
overview:
The ZULU-868 is a 868MHz RF transceiver module in DIP package. This module provides a highly integrated plug and play radio solution. Based on the Silicon Labs Si1000 chipset, the Zulu transceiver integrates a high power RF transmitter (+20dBm) with high sensitivity receiver (-121dBm) and an 8051 microcontroller. The Si1000 is a fully integrated mixed signal system on a chip MCU. It has industry's lowest power consumption in active, sleep and deep sleep modes. This ultra low power consumption is achieved without any compromises in wireless transceiver performance. Having the lowest system power allows longer battery life, higher product performance and lower system cost.
	


    
          
    RF transceiver combined with on board 8051 microcontroller
          
    Range up to 2Km
          
    Ultra low power, 1.8V to 3.6V operation
          
    Frequency hopping capability
          
    Less than 600nA with RTC running
          
    Less than 1µA with RTC running and radio state retained
          
    Two built in brown out detectors cover sleep and active modes
          
    FSK, GFSK, and OOK modulation
          
    Auto frequency calibration (AFC)
          
    On chip crystal tuning
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking, 
                    
                        Lighting, 
                    
                        System Monitoring, 
                    
                        Security, 
                    
                        Consumer Electronics, 
                    
                        RF Communications

The ARF8046PA from Adeunis is a LoRaWAN sensor. The LoRaWAN sensor with pulse interfaces is a ready to use radio transceiver allowing to transmit data from water, gas, electricity & heat meters. The LoRaWAN pulse provides connection to any operated network using the LoRaWAN protocol. Two meters can be supported by a single LoRaWAN Pulse transmitter allowing significant reduction of costs of implementation and deployment. The configuration of the transmitter can be done via the network allowing the choice of periodicity, pulse weight or data encryption. title: 00242-5 KVASER, One Channel USB Interface for CAN, Kvaser Leaf SemiPro HS, Send/Receive Max Message Rate 1500
overview:
Kvaser Leaf SemiPro with MagiSync is a one channel USB interface for CAN. It offers the possibility to easily connect several interfaces to a PC. The time-stamping is synchronised through Kvaser MagiSync. Providing flexibility and making it perfect for multi-channel applications. High-Speed, Low-Speed and Single-Wire CAN are supported through different product versions. Kvaser MagiSyncTM is a new innovative way of synchronising several different channels. All units are synchronised, achieving a high precision virtual clock accurate to the microsecond. No external cables are necessary; you get instant synchronisation as soon as you connect. For this to work the units must reside on the same USB root hub.
	


    
          
    Automatic and accurate clock synchronisation
          
    Messages are time-stamped and synchronised with a precision of 25 microsecond
          
    Handles up to 15000 messages per second.
          
    Supports both 11-bit (CAN 2.0A) and 29-bit (CAN 2.0B active) identifiers
          
    Reliable error handling
          
    Supports silent mode for analysing tools
          
    Low power consumption
          
    Excellent EMC performance
          
    Galvanic isolation of the CAN bus driver stage to protect the hardware
          
    Interfaces the CAN bus with a 9-pin D-SUB connector

                        Multimedia, 
                    
                        Portable Devices,

title: VDRIVE3 FTDI, USB Interface, VNC2-48L1B, USB, 5.5 V
overview:
The VDRIVE3 is an USB host/microcontroller application Development Module with an enclosure. The default firmware of the VDRIVE3 supports UART/SPI communications with the embedded USB host controller and USB host port. This product provides an attractive solution for quick and easy integration of applications with a USB flash disk or other USB client devices. VDRIVE3 is designed to support quick and easy integration of a UART/SPI application with a USB client device. The VDRIVE3 comes in a neat enclosure displaying a bicolour LED, making it suitable for incorporating into finished product designs. The VDRIVE3 utilises FTDI's Vinculum-II (VNC2-48L1B) dual USB host controller IC.
	


    
          
    USB A-type socket to connect to USB client devices
          
    2mm (0.08") pitch 8-pin header used for the UART/SPI interface
          
    Connects directly and communicates with a FTDI TTL-232R-3V3-2mm USB-UART cable

    Vinculum-II debugger module port under neat enclosure, for changing the firmware
          
    UART programming mode control signals PROG# and RESET# are accessible via an internal header
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Computers & Computer Peripherals

title: ZETAPLUS-915-D RF SOLUTIONS, RF TRANSCEIVER, 500KBPS, 915MHZ
overview:
The ZETAPLUS-915-D from RF Solutions is a 915MHz miniature Smart RF transceiver module in DIP package. This is a plug and play radio communication module with simple SPI and URAT (LV 323) interface. With only few connections to power, comms and antenna user can quickly start sending and receiving data. No other external components are required. With a highly tuned on-board RF matching network ZETAPLUS outperforms other modules achieving range far in excess of its competitors for given power output/ power consumption. It features 64byte transmit/receive FIFO, preamble detection, sync word detector and CRC are all automatically handled allowing power consumption and for use of lower cost system MCU's. The ZETAPLUS also gives access to the integrated auxiliary 11bit ADC used for internal battery voltage detection making low battery detect very simple to implement on user design. It is used in home automation, sensor/mesh RF networks, telemetry, keyless entry, health monitors.
	


    
          
    Supply voltage range from 1.8VDC to 3.6VDC (marked yellow dot)
          
    Maximum ((G)FSK) data rate is 500Kbps, OOK data rate is 120Kbps, 2Km range
          
    Intelligent wire replacement SMARTRADIO and form factor of 16mm x 18mm
          
    Transmit power of +13dBm, -116dBm high sensitivity at 2.4Kbps GFSK and -102dBm at 40Kbps OOK
          
    Best in class cost performance
          
    Low power consumption of -0.5nA standby, -10mA RX and -18mA Tx at 10dBm
          
    Based on Silicon Lab's Si445 chipset
          
    Fast and effective plug and play RF comms
          
    Integrated battery voltage sensor
          
    No configuration necessary
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications

title: RFM119W-868S1 HOPERF, RF TX MODULE, FSK/GFSK/OOK, 868.35MHZ
overview:
The RFM119W-868S1 from Hoperf is a RFM119W FM transmitter module at 868MHz band in SMD package. The RFM119W is high performance, highly flexible, low cost, single-chip (G)FSK/OOK transmitter for various wireless applications. This RFM119W is a part of the HOPERF NextGenRF™ family which includes a complete line of transmitters, receivers and transceivers. It provides the simplest way to control the data transmission. The transmission is started when an effective level turnover is detected on the DATA pin. While the transmission action will stop after the DATA pin holding level low for a defined time window or after a two-wire interface (TWI) command is issued. The chip features can be configured in two different ways, setting the configuration registers through the TWI or programming the embedded RFPDK. It is used in remote fan controllers, infrared transmitter replacements, remote lighting control, remote keyless entry (RKE), wireless alarm and security systems.
	


    
          
    Embedded EEPROM, very easy development with RFPDK and all features programmable

title: GAMMA-868R-SO RF SOLUTIONS, RF TELEMETRY MODULE, 869.5MHZ, 20DBM
overview:
The GAMMA-868R-SO from RF Solutions is an 868MHZ RF Telemetry module SMT package. GAMMA LoRA provides a reliable, transceiver based industrial remote control for use as a modem or a bi-directional switch. It can also send low speed serial data (250byte payload). Smart LoRA module provides a long range, low data rate suited to remote sensors transmitting occasional data packets. It is easy to use with direct no-volt switch input and direct switching telemetry outputs and serial data in /data out. The GAMMA uses the latest OFDM, spread spectrum technology and extensive algorithm enhancements to achieve an industry leading 16Km (10miles) range. Two or more modules may be combined to provide a simple or complex network of radio controls and/or radio modems. Typical applications include remote control, remote networking, remote sensing and remote sensor.

overview:
The A2530E24CZ1 is a high-performance, FCC & IC certified and ETSI-compliant ZigBee/IEEE 802.15.4 RF SOC module that incorporates the Texas Instruments CC2530 transceiver chip and CC2591 range extender in the industry's smallest package (11 x 19 x 2.5 mm). The module incorporates a crystal, the required RF matching and filtering for regulatory compliance, plus filtering on select digital lines for better noise reduction and sensitivity. The modules operate in the global non-licensed 2.4GHz ISM/SRD frequency band. These radio modules are ideal for achieving low power wireless connectivity without having to deal with extensive Protocol, RF design and regulatory compliance, allowing quick time to market. The modules are 100% RF-tested to provide consistent performance.

overview:
32-0125-0 is a TW125 low cost, rugged, waterproof, low noise, low current/low voltage, 1.2 to 1.8 GHz band, 25dB gain in-line amplifier, specially designed to amplify all GNSS frequency signals, from GPS L2 to GLONASS L1. The TW125 provides for much longer cable runs from antenna to receiver, for applications such as mast-mount, large vehicle and timing systems, without degradation of system sensitivity. Its low loading allows for both the antenna and the TW125 in-line amplifier to be powered by the GNSS receiver. The TW125 passes DC supply to the antenna, therefore not requiring additional hardware such as bias-T, power cable and power supply.

overview:
XBee Wi-Fi embedded RF module provides simple serial to IEEE 802.11 connectivity. By bridging the low power/low cost requirements of wireless device networking with the proven infrastructure of 802.11, the XBee Wi-Fi creates new wireless opportunities for energy management, process and factory automation, wireless sensor networks, intelligent asset management and more. Featuring easy provisioning methods and native Device Cloud by Etherios™ connectivity, XBee Wi-Fi modules give developers the fastest IPto- device and device to cloud capability possible. Focused on the rigorous requirements of these wireless device networks, the module gives developers IP to device and device to cloud capability. XBee modules offer developers tremendous flexibility and are available in surface mount and through-hole form factors. The XBee Wi-Fi shares a common footprint with other XBee modules. overview:
The RDF1-433 is a complete FM receiver and decoder module in one operates at 433MHz frequency, It act as complete radio system comprising of four digital outputs and single serial data output when used with an RF Solutions FIREFLY, HORNET or 205 series Handheld transmitters. Dependant on the transmitter, a system using the RDF1-433 can achieve up to 200m range. The RDF1-433 module consists of a front end super-heterodyne receiver and an embedded microcontroller which decodes the RF string for a compatible transmitter and outputs to 4 telemetry lines and as serial data. The module has an easy-to-use 'LEARN' facility and is capable of storing up to 40 pairings within its internal non volatile memory (EEPROM).

title: MGM12P32F1024GE-V2 SILICON LABS, MULTIPROTOCOL WIRELESS MESH MOD, 250KBPS
overview:
The MGM12P32F1024GE-V2 from Silicon Labs is a MGM12P Mighty Gecko multi protocol wireless mesh module. The EFR32MG12 mesh module is a fully integrated, certified module, enabling rapid development of wireless mesh networking solution. Based on the Silicon Labs EFR32MG12 Mighty Gecko SoC, the MGM12P combines an energy efficient, multi protocol wireless SoC with a proven RF/antenna design and industry leading wireless software stacks. The integration accelerates time to market and saves months of engineering efforts and development cost. In addition, common software and development tools enable seamless migration from a module to discrete SoC based design when the time right. MGM12P can be used in a wide variety of applications including IoT multi protocol devices, connected home, health and wellness. It supports Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), ZigBee®, thread and proprietary protocols. It features 2 x 32bit timer/counter, 2 x 16bit timer/counter, 8 channel DMA controller.

title: AMB8465 AMBER WIRELESS, Wi-Fi, USB Stick / Adaptor, 868 Mhz
overview:
The AMB8465 is a variation of the low cost radio module AMB8425 for easy connection to the PC via the USB interface. In combination with the relevant radio technology in the end device, this solution enables quick and simple realisation of PC supported radio networks and can be used for data collection or control tasks. The integrated radio module AMB8425 enables wireless half-duplex transmission of data. The integrated microprocessor controls data communication, handling packet and checksum formation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and resending unacknowledged packets. The host system does not have to perform any radio-specific tasks. The USB stick offers numerous configuration possibilities and data transfer with fast channel and address switching is also supported. It is also possible to assess the quality of the radio link using the measured field strength (RSSI value).
	


    
          
    USB version of the OEM radio module AMB8425
          
    Range up to 100 m
          
    Communication via virtual COM port
          
    Integrated software stack with comprehensive range of functions

title: UD2100002-01 LANTRONIX, UDS2100 Two Port Serial Device Server
overview:
UD2100002-01 is a two-port device server, it enables users to connect, manage and control just about any piece of equipment with a serial port from virtually anywhere over Ethernet or the Internet. With the UDS2100, two pieces of equipment of virtually any type can be added to an Ethernet network in a matter of minutes. This dual-port device server is a quick, simple and inexpensive way to bring the advantages of remote management and control to equipment not currently connected to a network. Available in one and two-port models, and equipped with flexible power options including PoE, the UDS makes it simple to network-enable equipment without changing the way you work. Supplied with Lantronix TruPort COM Port Redirector software, UDS creates a fully transparent serial connection to existing PC-based software applications. The built-in web server enables users to access and configure the UDS2100 from a standard web browser.
	


    
          
    Access, monitor and control equipment over Ethernet
          
    Replace dedicated PCs and/or modem lines with fast and reliable Ethernet networking
          
    Configure quickly and easily via HTTP, DHCP, Telnet, serial or Lantronix DeviceInstaller™ utility

title: ZETAPLUS-868-SO RF SOLUTIONS, RF TRANSCEIVER, 500KBPS, 868MHZ
overview:
The ZETAPLUS-868-SO from RF Solutions is an 868MHz miniature Smart RF transceiver module in SMT package. This is a plug and play radio communication module with simple SPI and URAT (LV 323) interface. With only few connections to power, comms and antenna user can quickly start sending and receiving data. No other external components are required. With a highly tuned on-board RF matching network ZETAPLUS outperforms other modules achieving range far in excess of its competitors for given power output/ power consumption. It features 64byte transmit/receive FIFO, preamble detection, sync word detector and CRC are all automatically handled allowing power consumption and for use of lower cost system MCU's. The ZETAPLUS also gives access to the integrated auxiliary 11bit ADC used for internal battery voltage detection making low battery detect very simple to implement on user design. It is used in home automation, sensor/mesh RF networks, telemetry, keyless entry, health monitors.

title: PEM1305 INFOMART IT SOLUTIONS, Power Over Ethernet PD Module, 12.95W, 5V
overview:
PEM1305 is a power extraction module, have complete compliance with the IEEE 802.3af Power-Over-Ethernet (PoE) standard, and is designed to extract power from CAT5 Ethernet cable when sourced by a IEEE 802.3af compliant Power Sourcing Equipment(PSE). With the increasing demand for Green Power IEEE has emphasized the need for power rightsizing. The PEM1305 series Powered Device (PD) modules provides full PoE signature and programmable power classification for granular power management. Its high efficiency DC/DC converter provides a well regulated low noise and low ripple output with in built overload and output short circuit protection. The PEM1305 provides a quick, easy, and low cost method for Ethernet equipment manufacturers to PoE enable their equipment.
	


    
          
    Fully IEEE 802.3af compliant
          
    12.95W output load
          
    IEEE power class programmable (Green)
          
    1500V DC isolation (Input to Output)

title: PEM1203 INFOMART IT SOLUTIONS, Power Over Ethernet PD Module, 10W, 3.3V
overview:
PEM1203 is a power extraction module, have complete compliance with the IEEE 802.3af Power-Over-Ethernet (PoE) standard, and is designed to extract power from CAT5 Ethernet cable when sourced by a IEEE 802.3af compliant Power Sourcing Equipment (PSE). With the increasing demand for Green Power IEEE has emphasized the need for power rightsizing. The PEM1203 Powered Device (PD) module provides full PoE signature and programmable power classification for granular power management. Its high efficiency DC/DC converter provides a well regulated low noise and low ripple output with in built overload and output short circuit protection. The PEM1203 provides a quick, easy, and low cost method for Ethernet equipment manufacturers to PoE enable their equipment.
	


    
          
    Fully IEEE 802.3af compliant
          
    10W output load
          
    IEEE power class programmable (Green)
          
    1500V DC isolation (Input to Output)
          
    3.3V DC output voltage model
          
    Compact package minimum PCB footprint
          
    Minimal external components required
          
    Overload and short circuit protection
          
    Wide input voltage (36Vdc to 57Vdc)
          
    Low output ripple and noise, low cost

overview:
The KAPPA-T868-SO from RF Solutions is a Smart radio telemetry module SMT package 868MHz band. It is a small and simple to use receiver module which operates with RF Solutions transmitters. The KAPPA-T receiver module provides a reliable radio link directly compatible with any of the RF Solutions handheld transmitter range on 868MHz such as the compact FOBBER key fob, the multi-buttoned ELITE-T8 as well as the long range ELITE-XT and the rugged, industrial SABRE. KAPPA-T868 can be used with the BRAVO-T868 as a module to module solution. Typical applications include remote control, sensors, I/O telemetry devices, remote switching and remote traffic lights.

title: LC234X FTDI, EVAL BRD, USB TO UART INTERFACE BRIDGE
overview:
The LC234X from FTDI is a low cost FT234X USB to UART development module. It provides USB to UART bridge using the FTDI FT234XD to transfer data at up to 3Mbaud. The FT234XD is a USB to serial UART interface with optimised packaging (3mm x 3mm 12 pin DFN) for smaller PCB designs. The module is ideal for programming Arduino Pro, ESP modules etc. The pin-out follows the industry standard FTDI TTL cable interface. In addition to the 4 data lines (RXD, TXD, RTS, CTS) there is also the option to output 5V power to external hardware. The interface IO level may be set to either 3.3V or 5V by an on-board jumper no soldering/de-soldering required. The LC234X module's UART interface is mapped to one 1X6 pin header. The module is supplied with one right angle socket and one right angle pin header for maximum flexibility. Furthermore there is an LED provided to indicate data transmission on the UART signals.
	


    
          
    Small PCB size as 15.24mm x 28.19mm
          
    Easy configurable IO voltage interface, USB 2.0 full speed
          
    4.75V to 5.25V output power voltage (3V3, 5V IO interface)
          
    Supply current of 450mA (5V, 3V3 IO interface)
          
    300bps to 3Mbps supported baud rates

    Operational temperature range from- 40°C to +85°C

    Low supply current of 10mA

                        Communications & Networking

title: ZULU-T868 RF SOLUTIONS, ZULU Smart RADIO Telemetry Module, Remote Switching, 868 Mhz, DIP Package
overview:
The ZULU-T868 is a 868MHz radio telemetry module in DIP package. It provides a reliable transceiver based industrial remote switch with up to 2, 000 metres range. Two modules are combined to provide a simple network of radio switching. Each unit is supplied ready to operate, once paired with another module a remote control system is created connections for power, antenna and input/output are the only connections required. Each module can be set to act as a transmitter or receiver. A remote telemetry system is achieved when two modules are paired together, as transmitter (ZuluTx) and receiver (ZuluRx). Each time an input changes on the ZuluTx, it will transmit the status of its inputs to the paired ZuluRx(s). which will set its outputs to follow the ZuluTx Inputs and reply back with an acknowledge signal. Once completed the modules will then go into sleep mode.
	


    
          
    10 channel transceiver module
          
    10 digital input/outputs

    Receiver outputs follow transmitter inputs

    Easy pairing process
          
    One to one operation

title: VMUSIC3 FTDI, USB Interface, VNC2-48L1B, USB, 5.5 V
overview:
The VMUSIC3 is an USB host and MP3/WMA player Vinculum-II Development Module. The default firmware of the VMUSIC3 supports audio playback and UART or SPI communication interfaces for integration into the target product. VMUSIC3 can be used to read MP3 and other audio format files from a USB flash disk, process the data and output the stereo audio through the line-out header and headphone jack. The VMUSIC3 is a drop in replacement for the VMusic2 for the majority of VMusic2 applications. VMUSIC3 uses firmware called V2MSC which is similar to V2DAP (used in VDrive3) with an additional module for controlling MP3 playback. However for a small number of applications that use SPI, differences exists between VMusic firmware and V2MSC firmware which would require some changes to be made to the application software.
	


    
          
    MP3 and WMA playback
          
    USB A type socket to connect to USB client devices
          
    2mm (0.08") pitch 8-pin header used for the UART/SPI interface
          
    Connects directly and communicates with a FTDI TTL-232R-3V3-2mm USB-UART cable
          
    Jumper selectable UART and SPI interfaces, both operating 3.3V TTL/CMOS
          
    Pre-programmed with V2MSC firmware
          
    Vinculum-II debugger module port under the enclosure, for changing the firmware and debugging
          
    UART programming mode control pins PROG# and RESET# are connected to an internal header
          
    Reprogrammable over USB port from flash drive

title: TX2H-433-64 RADIOMETRIX, RF Module, FM Data Transmitter, 433.92 Mhz, Internal Antenna
overview:
The TX2H is a 433/434MHz single-channel FM transmitter module with a power output of 25mW nominal. It is a 100% pin-compatible drop-in replacement for the Radiometrix TX2 and can be used to replace the TX2 in applications where greater radiated power is desired (for example when space limitations dictate the use of small and inefficient antennas, or in countries where the extra power is permitted). The module will handle raw data rates up to 64kb/s. The TX2H transmitter can be used with either RX2G or RX2A receivers. Instead of the SAW-based technology of the TX2, the TX2H uses a PLL circuit locked to a crystal for better frequency stability over a wider temperature range (-40C to +85C), at the expense of slightly slower power-up.
	


    
          
    Usable range over 500m
          
    Fully screened
          
    Low power requirements
          
    Conforms to European EN 301 489-3 and ETSI EN 300 220-3 (for ERP <=10mW)
          
    Conforms to Australian/New Zealand AS/NZS 4268:2003
          
    Operating frequency of 433.92MHz and 434.42MHz
          
    Input Power Supply of 3V or 5V regulated

overview:
The RFM98W-433S2 from Hoperf is a Lora™ RFM98W transceiver module at 433MHz band in SMD package. It feature LoRa™ long range modem that provides ultra long range spread spectrum communication and high interference immunity whilst minimising current consumption. Using patented LoRa™ modulation technique RFM98W can achieve a sensitivity of over -148dBm. The high sensitivity combined with the integrated +20dBm power amplifier yields industry leading link budget making it optimal for any application requiring range or robustness. LoRa™ also provides significant advantages in both blocking and selectivity over conventional modulation techniques, solving the traditional design compromise between range, interference immunity and energy consumption. Device also support high performance (G)FSK modes for systems including WMBus, IEEE802.15.4g. The RFM98W deliver exceptional phase noise, selectivity, receiver linearity and IIP3 for significantly lower current consumption t

title: 725TRX8-1K RF SOLUTIONS, TELEMETRY TRANSCEIVER, 869.5MHZ, 13DBM
overview:
The 725TRX8-1K from RF Solutions is a 700 series 868MHz DIN rail radio telemetry transceiver (+13dBm). The 725TRX telemetry system provides bi-directional, transceiver, remote switching. The module has two switch inputs and two relay changeover contact outputs. When two or more modules are paired together the relay outputs will follow the state changes of the other modules inputs. Additional input/output modules can be connected to provide extra inputs/outputs to a 725TRX. All signals are acknowledged and a watchdog feature means that when an input is activated, the status of its remote counterpart is assured. This is automatic, allowing the user to simply connect to the screw terminals and achieve a reliable telemetry link. Supply current is 50mA (quiescent), 101mA (all output relays operating), 25mA (watchdog relay operating), 95mA (when transmitting). Typical applications include industrial telemetry, remote monitoring and control, reliable remote switch.
	


    
          
    FSK and spread spectrum LoRa
          
    Up to 1Km range line of sight, self contained telemetry receiver
          
    2 x closed contact input, 2 x relay switch output
          
    Easy plug and play installation, built-in range test mode
          
    Many to many operation, 12VDC to 32VDC supply voltage
          
    LED bar graph signal indicator, auto or manual wiring
          
    CE compliant, all connections via screw terminal
          
    One relay watchdog output for fail safe operation
          
    Dimension is 136mm x 78mm x 42mm, operating temperature range from -10°C to 50°C
          
    100mW RF output power (ERP) at 869.50MHz
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Industrial

title: ZETAPLUS-868-D RF SOLUTIONS, RF TRANSCEIVER, 500KBPS, 868MHZ
overview:
The ZETAPLUS-868-D from RF Solutions is an 868MHz miniature Smart RF transceiver module in DIP package. This is a plug and play radio communication module with simple SPI and URAT (LV 323) interface. With only few connections to power, comms and antenna user can quickly start sending and receiving data. No other external components are required. With a highly tuned on-board RF matching network ZETAPLUS outperforms other modules achieving range far in excess of its competitors for given power output/ power consumption. It features 64byte transmit/receive FIFO, preamble detection, sync word detector and CRC are all automatically handled allowing power consumption and for use of lower cost system MCU's. The ZETAPLUS also gives access to the integrated auxiliary 11bit ADC used for internal battery voltage detection making low battery detect very simple to implement on user design. It is used in home automation, sensor/mesh RF networks, telemetry, keyless entry, health monitors.
	


    
          
    Supply voltage range from 1.8VDC to 3.6VDC (marked blue dot)
          
    Maximum ((G)FSK) data rate is 500Kbps, OOK data rate is 120Kbps, 2Km range

    Transmit power of +13dBm, -116dBm high sensitivity at 2.4Kbps GFSK and -102dBm at 40Kbps OOK
          
    Best in class cost performance

overview:
V2DIP2-32 is a 32pin VNC2 based development module with two USB connectors. The module is targeted for prototyping with the VNC2 and for application integration to enable USB capability within a finished product design. The VNC2 is the second of FTDI's Vinculum family of Embedded dual USB host controller devices. The VNC2 device provides USB host interfacing capability for a variety of different USB device classes including support for BOMS, Printer, HID. For mass storage devices such as USB Flash drives, VNC2 also transparently handles the FAT file structure. Communication with non USB devices such as a low cost microcontroller is accomplished via either UART, SPI or parallel FIFO interfaces. The VNC2 provides a new cost effective solution for providing USB Host capability into products that previously did not have the hardware resources available. The VNC2 supports the capability to enable customers to develop custom firmware using the Vinculum II development software tool suite.
	


    
          
    Uses FTDI's the VNC2-32Q embedded USB host controller IC device
          
    Two USB 'A' type socket to interface with USB peripheral devices

title: RI-ACC-ATI2-00 TEXAS INSTRUMENTS, Antenna Tuning Indicator, RFID, S2000
overview:
RI-ACC-ATI2-00 is a antenna tuning Indicator is a tool which simplifies the resonance tuning of the antenna and the adjustment of the RXSS synchronisation level for wireless read cycle synchronisation. The Antenna Tuning Indicator makes the resonance tuning of TI-RFid's Standard RFM (RI-RFM-104B) and the High Performance RFM (RI-RFM-007B) easy. LED's indicate in which direction the tuning core should be turned (RI-RFM-104B) or whether tuning capacitance need to be added or removed (RI-RFM-007B) to bring a connected antenna to resonance. As a second function, this tool helps to adjust the noise level threshold of a connected reader to best fit the actual environment of other interfering RF emitters. The Antenna Tuning Indicator also assists to optimise the wireless synchronisation of a S2000 system with multiple readers and so guarantees best possible reading performance. The ATI is connected directly to the RF Module via the ATI connector on the RF Module.
	


    
          
    Operating frequency is 134.2Khz
          
    Resonating tuning accuracy is ±600Hz
          
    Operating temperature range 0°C to +50°C
          
    ATI makes the resonance tuning of TI-RFid's Standard RFM and the High Performance RFM easy
          
    LED indication is used to indicate which direction the tuning core should be turned

title: LM931-0636 LM TECHNOLOGIES, Bluetooth® Smart v4.1 Module, 2.4 to 2.4835GHz
USB-COM422-PLUS-4 FTDI, USB to a Quad Interface RS422 Level Serial UART Adaptor
overview:
The USB-COM422-PLUS4 module is a single USB interface to four independent RS422 ports, communication device. The integrated electronics of the USB-COM422-PLUS4 utilise the FTDI FT4232H (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed device) and includes RS422 level shifters plus Power/TXD/RXD LEDs to provide a visual indication of data traffic through the module. The module uses a standard USB Mini B device connector for connection to an upstream host or hub port. RS422-level signals, including modem handshake signals, are available on an industry-standard DE-9P connector. The maximum RS422-level data rate is 10Mbps. The USB-COM422-PLUS4 module requires USB device drivers, which are used to make the USB-COM422-PLUS4 appear as four Virtual COM Ports (VCP). This allows existing serial communications software such as HyperTerminal to exchange data through the USB-COM422-PLUS4 to a legacy RS422 peripheral device.
	


    
          
    Adds quad RS-422 serial ports by connecting to a USB 2.0 Hi-Speed interface.
          
    Easy plug & play installation and RS-422 device connection
          
    Works with USB 1.1 & 2.0 Host and Hub ports
          
    Industry standard FTDI chip set & device drivers for maximum compatibility
          
    Microsoft Windows WHQL-certified, Mac OS X, Linux and Windows CE device drivers
          
    Installs as four standard Windows COM ports
          
    Supports Windows Server 2008, 2003, Vista, XP, 2000, Windows CE, Linux, Mac OS X
          
    FIFO with 2k byte transmit buffer, 2k byte receive buffer
          
    RS-422 data signals: TxD+,TxD-,RxD+,RxD-,RTS+,RTS-,CTS+,CTS-,GND. Serial port speed up to 10Mbps

This RFM110W is a part of the CMOSTEK NextGenRF™ family which includes a complete line of transmitters, receivers and transceivers. title: ZETAPLUS-433-D RF SOLUTIONS, RF TRANSCEIVER, 500KBPS, 433MHZ
overview:
The ZETAPLUS-433-D from RF Solutions is a 433MHz miniature Smart RF transceiver module in DIP package. This is a plug and play radio communication module with simple SPI and URAT (LV 323) interface. With only few connections to power, comms and antenna user can quickly start sending and receiving data. No other external components are required. With a highly tuned on-board RF matching network ZETAPLUS outperforms other modules achieving range far in excess of its competitors for given power output/ power consumption. It features 64byte transmit/receive FIFO, preamble detection, sync word detector and CRC are all automatically handled allowing power consumption and for use of lower cost system MCU's. The ZETAPLUS also gives access to the integrated auxiliary 11bit ADC used for internal battery voltage detection making low battery detect very simple to implement on user design. It is used in home automation, sensor/mesh RF networks, telemetry, keyless entry, health monitors.

title: RFM31B-868-S1 QUASAR, Receiver Module, Wireless ISM, Low Cost, Highly Integrated, 868 MHz
overview:
The RFM31B series are highly integrated wireless ISM receiver modules. The low receive sensitivity (-121dBm) ensures extended range and improved link performance. Built-in antenna diversity and support for frequency hopping can be used to further extend range and enhance performance. The RFM31B's digital receive architecture features a high-performance ADC and DSP based modem which performs demodulation, filtering, and packet  handling for increased flexibility and performance. An easy-to-use calculator is provided to quickly configure the radio settings, simplifying customer's system design and reducing time to market.

title: AMB8665-M-K AMBER WIRELESS, Wireless USB Adaptor, M-Bus, 868Mhz, Antenna
overview:
The AMB8665-M-K is a 868MHz Wireless M-Bus USB Adapter Set with SMA connector, comprising of AMB8665-M and AMB1981. This adaptor is based on the Wireless M-Bus radio module providing a plug-and-play PC communications link via USB interface. It allows PCs or service-terminals to communicate with electricity-, gas- or water-meters via the wM-Bus interface. It simplifies the installation, the testing or maintenance of the radio-interface of data concentrators or MUCs. The integrated microprocessor controls the entire data communication as well as block- and checksum-creation. Data packets are built and transmitted according to EN13757-4. The USB-adapter is versatile configurable and supports all operating modes according to the wireless M-Bus specification. The quality of the radio link can be assessed by using the measured field strength, the RSSI value. The graphical user interface of the free windows application "AMBER-ACC" allows for easy configuration of the operating parameters.
	


    
          
    Range up to 800m
          
    Communication via virtual COM port
          
    Wireless M-Bus according to EN13757-4:2013 standard
          
    OMS (Open Metering System) standard supported
          
    wM-Bus modes - S, T, R and C
          
    EU R&TTE directive compliant
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking

title: FM-RRFQ1-868 TELECONTROLLI, SIL FM Receiver Module 868.35 Mhz
overview:
FM-RRFQ1-868 is an SIL 868.35 MHz FM receiver module. These miniature RF modules provide a cost effective high performance FM radio data link at 433.92MHz or 868.35MHz. It is manufactured using laser trimmed thick film ceramic hybrid. Receiver module operates with sleep / Power down mode . These modules exhibit extremely stable electronic characteristics over an industrial temperature range and manufactured on a ceramic substrate provides a very reliable operation over a wide temperature range. This transmitter and receiver pair enables the simple implementation of a data link at up to 4.8Kbit/s at distances up to 75m indoors and 250m in open ground. Due to their small size and low power requirements, both modules are ideal for use in portable, battery-powered applications, such as hand-held terminals.

title: AMB8426-M AMBER WIRELESS, Compact Wireless M-Bus Radio Module, 868 Mhz
overview:
The AMB8425-M is an all embedded low-cost wireless M-Bus radio module, which operates in 12 channels in the 868 MHz frequency band. The integrated protocol controls the entire data communication. Data packets are built and transmitted according to EN13757-4:2005 specification. Configuration of parameters is handled via the UART interface. The module automatically adds the Manufacturer ID and the Address based on parameters configured in the radio module. Measured field strength (RSSI value) offers the option of enhancing quality of the radio link. The customised application layer can be fully integrated in the radio module, thus eliminating the need for an external host microcontroller. The radio module supports the AES-128 encryption standard. A very low-power mode ensures long battery lifetime.

title: PEM3112C INFOMART IT SOLUTIONS, Power Over Ethernet Plus (POE+) PD Module, 30W, 12V
overview:
PEM3112C is a Power Over Ethernet Powered Device (PD) power extraction module, have complete compliance with the high power IEEE 802.3at Power-Over-Ethernet Plus (PoE+) standard, and is designed to extract power from CAT5 Ethernet cable when sourced by both IEEE 802.3at(POE+) and IEEE 802.3af (POE) compliant Power Sourcing Equipments (PSE). The PEM3112C module provide full two event PoE+ and single event POE signature for layer 1 classification and supports layer 2 classification via an AT Detect pin. Its high efficiency DC/DC converter provides up to 30W of power in a well regulated, low noise and low ripple output with in built in rush current, overload and output short circuit protection. The PEM3112C provides a quick, easy, and cost effective method for Ethernet equipment manufacturers to PoE enable their equipment.

    Adjustable output voltage
