title: LTP5902IPC-WHMA#PBF LINEAR TECHNOLOGY, RF Transceiver Module, 8Dbm, 2.4835 GHz
overview:
The LTP5902IPC-WHMA#PBF from Linear Technology is a SmartMesh WirelessHART node wireless mote module in 66 lead PCB with MMCX connector. SmartMesh WirelessHART wireless sensor networks are self managing, low power networks built from wireless nodes called motes. The LTP5902-WHM is wirelessHART mote product in Eterna family of IEEE 802.15.4 printed circuit board assembly solutions, featuring highly integrated, low power radio design by Dust Networks as well as an ARM Cortex-M3 32bit microprocessor running Dust's embedded SmartMesh WirelessHART networking software. The LTP5902-WHM at 24mm × 37mm is designed for surface mount assembly with dust's time synchronized WirelessHART networks, all motes in the network may route, source or terminate data while providing many years of battery powered operation. The SmartMesh WirelessHART software provided with the LTP5902-WHM is fully tested, validated and is readily configured via a software application programming interface (API).

    Compliant to WirelessHART (IEC62591) standard, redundant spatially diverse topologies
          
    Time synchronized network wide scheduling, per transmission frequency hopping
          
    Supply voltage range from 2.1V to 3.76V and supply noise of 250mV at 50Hz to 2MHz
          
    Operating relative humidity range from 10%RH to 90%RH

title: MRF24WG0MB-I/RM MICROCHIP, Module, Wi-Fi Transmitter, U.Fl External Antenna Connector, 2.483 GHz
overview:
MRF24WG0MB-I/RM is an agency certified IEEE 802.11 WiFi radio transceiver module. The MRF24WG0MB has a U.FL connector for an external antenna, matching circuitry, and supports WiFi with the free TCP/IP protocol stack. The MRF24WG0MB module connects to hundreds of PIC microcontrollers via a 4 wire SPI interface. The MRF24WG0MB is a low power, 2.4GHz, IEEE 802.11-compliant, surface mount modules with all associated RF components like crystal oscillator, bypass and bias passives with integrated MAC, baseband, RF and power amplifier, and built in hardware support for AES, and TKIP (WEP, WPA, WPA2 security). The modules also provide acceleration for hosts running WPA-EAP application security. The integrated module design frees the designer from RF and antenna design tasks and regulatory compliance testing, ultimately providing quicker time to market. The MRF24WG0MB module comes with an ultra miniature coaxial connector (U.FL).

title: EQCO-FASTECOAX7501.2 MICROCHIP, Ethernet Over Coax Adapters with PoE/PoC
overview:
The EQCO-FASTECOAX7501.2 is an Ethernet over Coax Adapter with PoE/PoC accelerate IP camera deployment. The surveillance camera market is steadily moving from analogue to digital. The reasons are clear, better imaging, intelligent image processing and the benefits of fully networked integrated solutions. Many digital camera support IP-based communication and are designed to connect to NVRs or video servers over Cat 5 or 6 Ethernet cables. But why waste perfectly functional 75R coaxial video cabling just to go digital. Microchip's Ethernet over coax media adapter allows 100Base-T standard-definition and high-definition megapixel IP cameras to use coax cabling to transmit IP-based communications to the NVR, servers or switches. Reusing the cable infrastructure also allows the analogue-to-digital transition to be done one camera at a time as needed. Microchip's Ethernet over coax adapters uniquely provide PoE bridging over the coax link to provide ample power (PoC) for remote devices.
	


    
          
    Uses legacy analogue video cabling (75R coax)
          
    Fully transparent 100Base-T full duplex Ethernet including link status pass-through
          
    Full 100Mbps FDX over 250MTR coax runs
          
    Can be concatenated using repeaters for even longer cable runs
          
    Supports 10/100Base-T Ethernet SD and HD video camera including PoE-powered devices
          
    Optional DC power pass-through for remote powering of low-voltage cameras
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking

overview:
VMusic2 Module is a USB Flash Drive and Audio Playback interface module, provides audio playback as well USB interfacing capability using the VNC1L IC. The onboard audio decoder supports playback of MP3s and other digital music formats from a USB Flash disk. Extensions to the Vinculum VDAP command set allow users control playback of selected files, as well as control the volume, balance of the sound channel and monitor the status of the file being played. overview:
The CYBLE-212023-10 from Cypress Semiconductor is an EZ-BLE PROC module. This is a turnkey Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) wireless module solution and includes onboard crystal oscillators, trace antenna, passive components and Cypress PRoC BLE 256KB chip. The CYBLE-212023-10 module does not have a metal shield and does not include RF certifications or Bluetooth SIG qualification. It supports a number of peripheral functions (ADC, timers, counters, PWM) and serial communication protocols (I2C, UART, SPI) through its programmable architecture. Up to 23 GPIOs configurable as open drain high/low, pull-up/pull-down, HI-Z analogue, HI-Z digital or strong output. The CYBLE-212023-10 includes a royalty free BLE stack compatible with Bluetooth 4.1 and provides up to 23 GPIOs in a 14.52mm × 19.20mm × 2mm package. It is a drop-in compatible with CYBLE-01201X-X0. This module is targeted at applications requiring large memory size and cost optimized BLE wireless connectivity.

title: CL2510-100-232-SP LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, RF MODULE, TXRX, FHSS, 2.4GHZ, RS232
CL2510-100-232 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, RF MODULE, TXRX, FHSS, 2.4GHZ, RS232
overview:
CL2510-100-232 is a RF module based on CL2510 transceiver, a frequency hopping spread spectrum (FHSS) radio designed for license free operation in 2.4GHz ISM band. The radio sustains a standard asynchronous serial data stream between two or more radios out of the box. Housed in a compact and rugged die cast enclosure, the radio is equipped to replace thousands of feet of serial cable. Optimized for point to point or point to multipoint networks and embedded with robust server client protocol, the CL2510 permits an unlimited number of clients to synchronize to a single server for low latency communications. The server and all clients in a network can communicate with any radio in range via either addressed or broadcast packets. A simple to use Windows Configuration Utility allows customers to easily configure and test the transceivers. The CL2510 is available with a male DCE RS232 interface and 100mW of output power for use in the worldwide 2.4GHz ISM bands.
	


    
          
    Standard male DB9 DCE RS232 serial interface
          
    Standard baud rates supported from 1200bps to 230, 400bps
          
    RF data rates of 280kbps or 500kbps, selectable
          
    Advanced configuration using AT commands
          
    Retries and acknowledgements

title: CL2510-050-232-SP LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, RF MODULE, TXRX, FHSS, 2.4GHZ, RS232
overview:
CL2510-050-232-SP is a RF module starter pack based on CL2510 transceiver, a frequency hopping spread spectrum (FHSS) radio designed for license free operation in 2.4GHz ISM band. The radio sustains a standard asynchronous serial data stream between two or more radios out of the box. Housed in a compact and rugged die cast enclosure, the radio is equipped to replace thousands of feet of serial cable. Optimized for point to point or point to multipoint networks and embedded with robust server client protocol, the CL2510 permits an unlimited number of clients to synchronize to a single server for low latency communications. The server and all clients in a network can communicate with any radio in range via either addressed or broadcast packets. A simple to use Windows Configuration Utility allows customers to easily configure and test the transceivers. The CL2510 is available with a male DCE RS232 interface and 50mW of output power for use in the worldwide 2.4GHz ISM bands.
	


    
          
    Standard male DB9 DCE RS232 serial interface
          
    Standard baud rates supported from 1200bps to 230, 400bps
          
    RF data rates of 280kbps or 500kbps, selectable
          
    Advanced configuration using AT commands
          
    Retries and acknowledgements
          
    Frequency hopping spread spectrum for security and interference rejection
          
    Customizable RF channel and system ID
          
    Automatic link synchronization
          
    Low latency and high throughput
          
    RP-SMA Jack antenna connector
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Wireless

overview:
FM-RTFQ1-868 is an 868.35MHz DIL FM transmitter module. These miniature RF modules provide a cost effective high performance FM radio data link at 433.92MHz and 868.35MHz. Manufactured using laser trimmed thick film ceramic hybrid, the modules exhibit extremely stable electronic characteristics over an industrial temperature range. Manufacture on a ceramic substrate provides a very reliable operation over a wide temperature range. This transmitter and receiver pair enables the simple implementation of a data link at up to 4.8Kbit/s at distances up to 75m indoors and 250m in open ground. Due to their small size and low power requirements, both modules are ideal for use in portable, battery-powered applications, such as hand-held terminals.

title: DC-ME-Y402-C DIGI INTERNATIONAL, System-on-Module with Integrated 10/100 Ethernet
overview:
DC-ME-Y402-C is an Digi Connect ME 9210 module for NET+OS with 4MB flash, 8MB RAM (single-unit pack). The Digi Connect ME 9210 is an ultra compact embedded system-on-module (SoM) with 10/100 Ethernet support based on Digi's new and powerful 32bit NS9210 processor (ARM9). The module allows customers to implement the next generation of leading network enabled products and maintains full form factor and pin compatibility with the existing Digi Connect ME family. Digi's own NET+ARM processor technology also delivers the true long-term availability that is a key requirement for embedded applications. The Digi Connect ME 9210 family features the development and operational benefits of the iDigi device cloud. This secure, highly-scalable platform seamlessly ties enterprise applications and remote devices together. iDigi manager pro empowers IT, network operations and customer support organizations to conquer the challenges of managing equipment in their device networks.

overview:
The LTP5901IPC-IPMA#PBF from Linear Technology is a PCB with chip antenna. The SmartMesh IP wireless sensor network is self managing, low power Internet Protocol (IP) network built from wireless node called mote. The LTP5901-IPM is the IP mote product in the Eterna family of IEEE 802.15.4e printed circuit board assembly solutions, featuring a highly integrated low power radio design by Dust Networks as well as an ARM Cortex-M3 32-bit microprocessor running Dust's embedded SmartMesh IP networking software. Complete radio transceiver, embedded processor and networking software for forming a self-healing mesh network. It is industry leading low power radio technology with 4.5mA to receive and 9.7mA to transmit at 8dBmn RF modular certification include USA, Canada, EU, Japan, Taiwan, Korea, India, Australia and New Zealand.

title: AMB8626 AMBER WIRELESS, Compact OEM Radio Module, High Performance, 868 Mhz
overview:
The AMB8626 is a compact and low-cost radio data transmission module for wireless half-duplex communication. The integrated microprocessor controls data communication, handling packet and checksum generation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and re-transmission of lost packets. The host system does not have to perform any radio-specific tasks. The module can be configured in many ways and supports data transfer with fast channel and address switching. An opportunity to assess the quality of the radio link is also provided by using the measured field strength (RSSI value).
	


    
          
    Low-cost OEM radio module for the 868 MHz SRD band
          
    Compact dimensions: 17 x 27 x 4 mm
          
    Supports low-power applications and WOR (wake-on radio)
          
    Integrated AMBER RF stack with extensive functions
          
    Flexible addressing with up to 255 nodes in 255 networks
          
    Conforms with EU R&TTE 1999/5/EC directive
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Communications & Networking

title: AMB8420 AMBER WIRELESS, All In One Radio Module, 868 Mhz, w/Antenna
overview:
The AMB8420 is a compact and low-cost radio data transmission module for wireless half-duplex communication. The integrated microprocessor controls data communication, handling packet and checksum formation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and resending unreceived packets. The host system does not have to perform any radio specific tasks. The module can be configured in many ways and supports data transfer with fast channel and address switching. Measured field strength (RSSI value) offers the option of enhancing quality of the radio link. The GUI for the freely available Windows application AMBER-ACC makes it easy to set operating parameters. A USB adapter is available to easily connect the AMB8420 to a PC system. The AMB8420 is constructed on an SMD design and suitable for automatic component mounting. It can also be delivered in tape and reel packaging.

title: FT-MOD-4232HUB FTDI, Serial/Hub Module, USB Hi-Speed
overview:
FT-MOD-4232HUB is an USB hi-speed serial hub module. The FT4232H based USB hi-speed serial/hub module is a USB interface expansion module targeted at connecting to the FTDI V2DIPx modules to expand the number of interfaces. However, it is not limited to this application. It can also be used as a hub device or an FT4232H evaluation module. The module has a USB 2.0 hi-speed hub chip which supports up to three external downstream USB ports, 2 ports through a dual USB connector and 1 port through DIL connector pins. Additionally, by utilising the FT4232H USB hi-speed four port bridge chip which handles all the USB signalling and protocols, The module can easily support up to 4 flexible interfacing ports. It is ideal for development purposes to quickly prove functionality of adding USB to a target design.

    USB hub controller and FT4232H are USB bus powered

title: AMB8665-K AMBER WIRELESS, Wireless USB Adaptor, 868Mhz, SMA
overview:
The AMB8665-M is a Wireless M-Bus USB Adapter with SMA connector. Based on the Wireless M-Bus radio module AMB8626-M providing a plug-and-play PC communications link via USB interface. It allows PCs or service-terminals to communicate with electricity-, gas-or water-meters via the wM-Bus interface. It simplifies the installation, the testing or maintenance of the radio-interface of data concentrators or MUCs. The integrated microprocessor controls the entire data communication as well as block-and checksum-creation. Data packets are built and transmitted according to EN13757-4. The USB-adapter is versatile configurable and supports all operating modes according to the wireless M-Bus specification. The quality of the radio link can be assessed by using the measured field strength, the RSSI value. The graphical user interface of the free windows application AMBER-ACC allows for easy configuration of the operating parameters.

UMFT234XD-WE FTDI, USB Interface, FT234XD, UART, USB, 3.3 V
overview:
The UMFT234XD-WE is a Breakout Module utilizes FTDI's FT234XDIC to convert USB to UART. The breakout module is a breakout board that converts USB 2.0 full-speed to UART. This module do not have a USB connector, instead, the modules plug directly into the USB host connector and the pads of the PCB makes electrical contact with the electrical contacts of the USB connector. The UART interface operates at +3.3V voltage levels, however all I/Os are 5V tolerant. The Breakout modules provide the simplest development hardware for the FT-X series of devices. To reduce cost the USB interconnect is simply tracking on the PCB which plugs directly into the USB host socket. The interface connector is a standard 0.1-inch pitch socket. The module is ready to use when plugged in to enable instant development work to begin.

title: XB2B-WFPT-001 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Module, Xbee 2.4Ghz WiFi, PCB Antenna
overview:
XBee Wi-Fi embedded RF module provides simple serial to IEEE 802.11 connectivity. By bridging the low power/low cost requirements of wireless device networking with the proven infrastructure of 802.11, the XBee Wi-Fi creates new wireless opportunities for energy management, process and factory automation, wireless sensor networks, intelligent asset management and more. Featuring easy provisioning methods and native Device Cloud by Etherios™ connectivity, XBee Wi-Fi modules give developers the fastest IPto- device and device to cloud capability possible. Focused on the rigorous requirements of these wireless device networks, the module gives developers IP to device and device to cloud capability. XBee modules offer developers tremendous flexibility and are available in surface mount and through-hole form factors. The XBee Wi-Fi shares a common footprint with other XBee modules. This allows different XBee technologies to be drop-in replacements for each other.
	


    
          
    Native Device Cloud integration for data acquisition and device management
          
    Hardware and software complete module easily joins existing 802.11 b/g/n (Wi-Fi) infrastructures
          
    Common XBee footprint allows OEMs to support a variety of wireless protocols
          
    Flexible SPI and UART serial interfaces
          
    Available in Surface Mount and Through Hole form factors
          
    Support for low power sleeping applications with <6 µA power-down current
          
    Simple provisioning methods including Soft AP and Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS)

                        Embedded Design & Development,

title: LTP5901IPC-WHMA#PBF LINEAR TECHNOLOGY, RF Transceiver Module, 8Dbm, 2.4835 GHz
overview:
The LTP5901IPC-WHMA#PBF from Linear Technology is a SmartMesh WirelessHART mote module with chip antenna. It serves as a wireless node or mote in a SmartMesh WirelessHART network with >99.999% network reliability in the most challenging RF environments Sub 50µA routing nodes. It incorporates a 2.4GHz, IEEE 802.15.4 system-on-chip, complete with embedded SmartMesh networking software. Device includes an onboard chip antenna and comes with modular RF certifications. With Dust's time-synchronized SmartMesh WirelessHART networks all motes in the network may route, source or terminate data while providing many years of battery powered operation. The SmartMesh WirelessHART software provided with the LTP5901-WHM is fully tested and validated, it is readily configured via a software application programming interface (API).
	


    
          
    Onboard chip antenna, 42mm x 24mm PCBA module, compliant to the WirelessHART standard (IEC62591)
          
    Time synchronized network-wide scheduling, channel hopping communications
          
    Redundant spatially diverse topologies
          
    Network-wide reliability and power optimization
          
    Secure mesh with 128bit AES encryption
          
    Highly accurate time stamping
          
    4.5mA to receive a packet, 5.4mA to transmit at 0dBm & 9.7mA to transmit at 8dBm
          
    Very low power design enables motes to be powered by a wide variety of energy harvesters
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications

title: ERA900TRS LPRS, Easy Radio RF Transceiver Module, 804 Mhz - 940 Mhz
overview:
This module includes the ability to change bandwidth of the radio from 19.2KHz down to 12.5KHz, which means narrow-band performance. Internal temperature measurement ensures less than 1.5KHz frequency drift from ambient 20°C, over a range of -40°C to +85°C, as well as providing a usable thermometer for the connected application accurate to within 1°C. Modes of transmission include a protocol with 16-bit encryption and anti-cross talk software, plus raw data modes where users can use self-coding system which can be set to interface to any other raw data module on ISM bands in both FSK and ASM modulation.

title: BRAVO-T868 RF SOLUTIONS, SmartRadio Telemetry Module, 8 Channel Transceiver, 869.5 Mhz
overview:
The BRAVO-T868 is a 868MHz radio telemetry module in SIL package. This module provides a reliable transceiver based industrial remote switch with up to 1000m range. Two or more modules may be combined to provide a simple or complex network of radio switches. Each module can be set to act as a transmitter or receiver. A telemetry system is achieved when two modules are paired together, as transmitter (BRAVO-Tx) and receiver (BRAVO-Rx). Each time any input changes on the BRAVO-Tx, it will transmit the status of all inputs to the paired BRAVO-Rx(s). The BRAVO-Rx(s) which will set their outputs to match the BRAVO-Tx inputs. After each state change the modules will return to sleep mode.
	


    
          
    8 channel transceiver module
          
    8 digital input/outputs
          
    Receiver outputs mirror transmitter inputs
          
    Minimal external components
          
    Secure data protocol
          
    Ultra low power
          
    Easy pairing process
          
    One to one and one to many operation
          
    Incorporates self test mode
          
    +13dBm transmit power
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications, 
                    
                        Lighting, 
                    
                        Wireless, 
                    
                        Communications & Networking

title: ARF8045PA ADEUNIS, LoRaWAN Sensor Transceiver, LoRaWAN V1 Network Protocol, Range up to 10 km
overview:
The ARF8045PA from Adeunis is a LoRaWAN sensor. The LoRaWAN transmitter with analogue/digital sensor interfaces is a ready to use radio transceiver allowing transforming any type of 0 to 10V, 4mA to 20mA & I/O sensor into a wireless sensor. This product meets the needs of users looking to remotely monitor the data of all kinds (temperature, pressure, level, humidity, CO2, speed, brightness & opening). It provides connection to the any operated network using the LoRaWAN protocol. The configuration of the transmitter can be done via radio allowing the choice of sensors interface, periodicity or data encryption. It is in building management, metering utilities, smart industry, connected agriculture, transportation and smart infrastructure.

title: RWD-MIFARE-OEM RF SOLUTIONS, Reader Board, Read/Write system for ISO14443A Mifare 1k, 4k, Integrated PCB Track Antenna
overview:
RWD-MIFARE-OEM is a MicroRWD MF LP (Low Power) module is a complete read and write solution for 13.56MHz Mifare (1k, 4k and Ultralight versions) and supports "Mifare" contactless operations to dual interface cards such as DESFire, Mifare ProX, Smart MX and other types. The solution is entirely housed within a 24 pin DIL package and only needs an antenna connected and a 5v DC supply to be a fully featured ISO14443A Mifare read/write system. The MicroRWD MF LP version behaves in the same manner as the standard reader except that it has an active average current consumption of less than 100µA (micro Amps) with 1 second (default) polling rate. As on other RWD modules, all commands and data response are via a simple TTL level RS232 interface. In addition, the RWD MF LP version has auxiliary data outputs on the OP0/OP1 pins that can be programmed to automatically output UID (serial number)or other block data as asynchronous 9600 baud serial or Wiegand protocol Data High/Data Low signals.

    Integrated PCB antenna, LEDS, RS232 or USB interface
          
    Supports Mifare 1k, 4k, Ultralight and ICODE / Tag-it
          
    Average current consumption down to 100µA (micro Amps) even when fully active.

title: RF600D-SO RF SOLUTIONS, Decoder Chip, Keeloq, 18 Pin, SMT Package
overview:
RF600D-SO is a decoder I/Cs with 18pin SO-8 package, it has been designed to achieve the maximum possible range from any radio/infrared transmitter receiver set. This decoder is very easy to use and can be inserted directly into a circuit. In the stand alone operation, the RF600D-SO has the capability to learn up to 7 unique RF600E transmitters and with the addition of an EEPROM memory device this is increased to 48 RF600E encoders. The RF600D-SO may operate with an external 96C76 EEPROM device as additional memory to store identity information of transmitter/encoders. Data stored within the EEPROM is encrypted to maintain security. The RF600D-SO is connected directly to the data output of a radio receiver module and upon detection of a valid data packet it will decode the Keeloq encrypted data stream. When an address match occurs the RF600D-SO asserts its 4 digital outputs. An additional output, which shows the status of the encoder battery, is also asserted.
	


    
          
    Decoder I/Cs with 18pin SO-8 package
          
    Highly Secure Keeloq Protocol
          
    In stand alone operation, RF600D has the capability to learn up to 7 unique RF600E transmitters
          
    Each RF600D+EEPROM combination can learn up to 48 unique transmitter/encoders

    The digital outputs may be configured as latching or momentary action
          
    Led Indication of Transmission

title: FX30 SIERRA WIRELESS, IOT GATEWAY, E-NET, 850/900/1800/1900MHZ
overview:
The FX30 from Sierra Wireless is a programmable IoT gateway with 10/100 Base-T RJ45 with Ethernet interface. It is an industry's smallest, most rugged, programmable, extensible 3G/4G LTE cellular gateway. Providing an integrated, secure embedded application environment, tightly integrated with the cloud, the FX30 enables swift, scalable and global deployments of IoT applications for any connected machine or infrastructure. It integrates Legato® Open Source Linux platform that simplifies application level development with a secure application framework, maintained Linux distribution and feature rich development environment. It has -30°C to 75°C operating temperature (CLASS B), 158g weight, 75 x 60 x 32mm (w/o connectors), 82 x 60 x 32mm (w/connector) dimension and features USB driver for Linux, WIN7, WIN8. The FX30 has 2mW (ultra low power), <1W (idle), 400µW (65µW at 5V) ignition off power consumption.
	


    
          
    AT&T telecom & carrier, WP8548-G radio module, ARM® Cortex™-A5 processor with 550MHz frequency
          
    Reaches global 3G/2G market w/ single product, scale to LTE w/ full hardware/software compatibility
          
    1xIoT connector (1xUSB, 1xUART, 1xSPI, 1xI2C, 4xGPIO, 1xADC, 1xSDIO, 1xPCM), 4.75 to 32V voltage

    AirVantage IoT application enablement allows device to cloud solutions to be deployed in record time

    HSPA+ / EDGE / GSM / GPRS air interface, B1 / B2 / B5 / B6 / B8 / B19 3G UMTS/HSPA+

title: BTM431 LAIRD TECHNOLOGIES, Bluetooth® AT Data Module with Integrated Antenna
overview:
BTM431 is a Bluetooth AT Data Module with integrated antenna. Designed to meet the needs of developers who wish to add robust, short range Bluetooth data connectivity to their products. They are based on the market leading Cambridge Silicon Radio BC04 chipset, providing exceptionally low power consumption with outstanding range. With a small footprint and best of class, low power operation, these modules are the ideal choice for applications where designers need both performance and minimum size. For maximum flexibility in systems integration, the modules are designed to support a separate power supply for I/O. To aid product development and integration, it has integrated a complete Bluetooth protocol stack within the modules, including support for the Bluetooth Serial Port Profile. A comprehensive AT command or Multipoint Packet Protocol is included, which simplifies firmware integration. This ensures that the choice of this Bluetooth modules guarantees the fastest route to market.

title: ZULU2-M868-SO RF SOLUTIONS, RADIO MODEM MODULE, 868MHZ, 115KBPS
overview:
The ZULU2-M868-SO from RF Solutions is a 868MHz ZULU-2 radio modem module in SMT package. This is a highly integrated RF modem and intelligent controller with simple interface. Modem can achieve a wireless serial data link at up to 38K4bps over a 2Km range. Range may be further extended with suitable antenna. The user interface is standard RS323, operating at low voltage. All RF operation is automatically controlled (with error checking) so that it can be treated as simple communication device. Typical applications include one to one and multi-node wireless links in applications including car and building security, EPOS, inventory tracking, remote industrial process monitoring and computer networking. Because of small size and low power requirements module is ideal for use in portable, battery powered applications such as hand held terminals and also remote networking, USB/RS232 cable replacement, remote data log and meter reading.

title: XB8-DPUS-001 DIGI INTERNATIONAL, Module, Xbee 868Lp, U.Fl Connector, SMT
overview:
The XBee 868LP module was designed to provide a high performance, low power module at an extremely competitive price point. The XBee 868LP module can run either a proprietary DigiMesh® or point to multipoint networking protocol utilising a low power energy micro microcontroller and an Analog Devices ADF7023 transceiver, which offers industry leading interference blocking. The XBee 868LP operates between 863-870 MHz, making it deployable in several regions throughout the world including approved European countries and India by utilising a software selectable channel masking feature. The XBee 868LP is also the industry's first RF module using 868MHz and surrounding frequencies for LBT + AFA (Listen Before Talk and Adaptive Frequency Agility). This virtually eliminates interference by listening to the radio environment before any transmission starts, and automatically shifting to a new channel when interference is detected.
	
    
            Applications
            
            
                        RF Communications

title: V2DIP2-64 FTDI, USB Interface, USB Host Interface, VNC2-64Q, SPI, UART, 5 V
overview:
V2DIP2-64 is a 64pin VNC2 based development module with two USB connectors. The module is targeted for prototyping with the VNC2 and for application integration to enable USB capability within a finished product design. The VNC2 is one of the family of Vinculum devices from FTDI. The second of FTDI's Vinculum family of Embedded dual USB host controller integrated circuit devices. The device is capable of handling the USB Host Interface for a variety of different USB device classes, e.g. BOMS, Printer, HID etc. When interfacing to mass storage devices such as USB Flash drives, VNC2 also transparently handles the FAT File structure. Communication with non USB devices such as a low cost microcontroller is accomplished via either UART, SPI or parallel FIFO interfaces using a simple to implement command set. VNC2 provides a new cost effective solution for providing USB Host capability into products that previously did not have the hardware resources available.
	


    
          
    Uses FTDI's VNC2-64Q embedded USB host controller IC device
          
    Two USB 'A' type socket to interface with USB peripheral devices
          
    UART, parallel FIFO with and SPI interfaces can be programmed to a choice of available I/O pins
          
    Single 5V supply input from DIL connectors or 5V supplied via USB VBUS slave interface or debugger
          
    Auxiliary 3.3 V / 200mA power output to external logic
          
    All VNC2 signals available on 0.8" wide, 0.1" pitch DIL male connectors
          
    Power and traffic indicator LED's
          
    Debugger interface pin available on DIL pins or via 6way male header
          
    Firmware upgrades via UART or debugger interface pin header
          
    V2DIP2-64 is a Pb-free, RoHS complaint development module

title: RFM119W-433S1 HOPERF, RF TX MODULE, FSK/GFSK/OOK, 433MHZ
overview:
The RFM119W-433S1 from Hoperf is a RFM119W FM transmitter module at 433MHz band in SMD package. The RFM119W is high performance, highly flexible, low cost, single-chip (G)FSK/OOK transmitter for various wireless applications. This RFM119W is a part of the HOPERF NextGenRF™ family which includes a complete line of transmitters, receivers and transceivers. It provides the simplest way to control the data transmission. The transmission is started when an effective level turnover is detected on the DATA pin. While the transmission action will stop after the DATA pin holding level low for a defined time window or after a two-wire interface (TWI) command is issued. The chip features can be configured in two different ways, setting the configuration registers through the TWI or programming the embedded RFPDK. It is used in remote fan controllers, infrared transmitter replacements, remote lighting control, remote keyless entry (RKE), wireless alarm and security systems.

    FSK, GFSK and OOK modulation

    Output power range from -10dBm to +13dBm
          
    Supply voltage range from 1.8V to 3.6V
          
    Current consumption of 27.6mA FSK at 868.35MHz

overview:
The MIR-24SW-PIFA from Talon Communications is a MIRAGE Sierra mangOH IoT module. The mangOH IoT connector is an open interface standard from Sierra Wireless to simplify product development with a single interface for connectivity and sensor module technology. The Talon MIRAGE RF module on mangOH form factor is a low power extremely high performance IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n compliant, 2.4GHz RF module with integrated and external antenna options. The MIRAGE is based on TI WiLink WL1831 dual mode Bluetooth + Wi-Fi platform. The development environment is based on Legato open source Linux which is designed to simplify embedded IoT project with a suite of development and build tools target, host and build tools to create apps ready for deployment to user devices The MIRAGE IoT module brings out 3 different communication and 1 programming interface for maximum usability and flexibility including 1 x UART, 1 x SDIO bus, 1 x PCM and 1 x JTAG.

title: MGA-631P8-BLKG BROADCOM LIMITED, Gallium Arsenide Low Noise and High Linearity Amplifier in a 8-TSLP Package
overview:
MGA-631P8-BLKG is an economical, easy to- use GaAs MMIC low noise amplifier (LNA) with active bias and comes in antistatic bag. The LNA has low noise with excellent input return loss and high linearity achieved through the use of Avago Technologies proprietary 0.5um GaAs enhancement mode pHEMT process. The LNA has an extra feature that allows a designer to adjust supply current and gain externally. Due to the high isolation between the input and output, gain can be adjusted independently through a resistor in series with a blocking capacitor from the output pin to FB1 pin, without affecting the noise figure. is housed in a miniature 2.0 x 2.0 x 0.75mm3 8-pin thin small leadless package (TSLP) package. The compact footprint and low profile coupled with low noise, high gain, excellent input return loss and high linearity make the MGA-631P8 an ideal choice as an LNA for cellular infrastructure for GSM, CDMA, GPS and ISM application.

title: AMB8426 AMBER WIRELESS, Compact Low Cost Radio Module, 868 Mhz
overview:
The AMB8426 is a compact and low-cost radio data transmission module for wireless half-duplex communication. The integrated microprocessor controls data communication, handling packet and checksum generation, addressing, monitoring of channel access and re-transmission of lost packets. The host system does not have to perform any radio-specific tasks.  The module can be configured in many ways and supports data transfer with fast channel and address switching. An opportunity to assess the quality of the radio link is also provided by using the measured field strength (RSSI value).
	


    
          
    OEM radio module for the 868 MHz SRD band
          
    Compact dimensions: 17 x 27 x 4 mm
          
    Supports low-power applications and WOR (wake-on radio)
          
    Integrated AMBER RF stack with extensive functions
          
    Flexible addressing with up to 255 nodes in 255 networks
          
    Complies with requirements of R&TTE Directive 1999/5/EC
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

title: SN8200 MURATA, MODULE, WIFI / 802.11 NETWORK CONTROLLER
overview:
SN8200 is a complete low power self-contained embedded wireless solution to address the connectivity demand in M2M applications. It integrates micro-controller, Wi-Fi BB/MAC/RF IC, RF front end, clocks, and on-board antenna into a small form factor module. SN8200 can be controlled by a host device through a serial interface; it can also serve as a standalone Wi-Fi station or network controller. Thus, it can be used to enable wireless connectivity to the simplest products with minimal engineering resources. The SN8200 provides standard IEEE802.11 b/g/n functions. The integrated MCU supports Broadcom WICED software.

overview:

The Quasar UK FM-RX1 Super Heterodyne receiver module provides a complete radio receiver which can be used to receive undecoded data from the range of Quasar (UK) FM transmitter modules. The receiver incorporates an entire Phase-Locked Loop (PLL) ensuring precise local oscillator generation. The module is very simple to operate and offers low power consumption allowing for extended battery life without the need to power down the module. Data can be fed directly into a microprocessor or decoding device, Thus keeping the component count down and ensuring a low hardware cost. All receivers are compatible on producing a CMOS/TTL output and only require connections to power and antenna.

title: 1.XX.04 EMBOS SSL ASIA SEGGER, RTOS, SINGLE SOURCE CODE LICENSE
overview:
The 1.XX.04 EMBOS SSL ASIA is a priority controlled real time operating system, designed to be used as foundation for the development of embedded real time applications. It is a zero interrupt latency, high performance RTOS that has been optimized for minimum memory consumption in both RAM and ROM, as well as high speed and versatility. Throughout the development process of embOS, the limited resources of microcontrollers have always been kept in mind. The internal structure of embOS has been optimized in a variety of applications with different customers, to fit the needs of different industries. embOS is fully source compatible on different platforms, making it easy to port applications to different CPUs. Its' highly modular structure ensures that only those functions that are needed are linked, keeping the ROM size very small. Tasks can easily be created and safely communicate with each other using a complete palette of communication mechanisms.
	


    
          
    Single product source code license
          
    Pre-emptive scheduling
          
    Round robin scheduling for tasks with identical priorities
          
    Thread local storage support
          
    Thread safe system library support
          
    No configuration required
          
    Unlimited number of tasks (limited only by available memory)
          
    Minimum RAM usage
          
    Zero interrupt latency time
          
    Size and number of messages can be freely defined
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

title: ATZB-24-A2R MICROCHIP, ZIGBEE MODULE, 2.4GHZ, CHIP ANTENNA
overview:
The ATZB-24-A2 ZigBit™ is an ultra-compact, low-power, high-sensitivity 2.4 GHz IEEE 802.15.4/ZigBee® OEM module based on the innovative Atmel's mixed-signal hardware platform. It is designed for wireless sensing, control and data acquisition applications. ZigBit modules eliminate the need for costly and time-consuming RF development, and shortens time to market for a wide range of wireless applications. Two different versions of 2.4 GHz ZigBit modules are available: ATZB-24-B0 module with balanced RF port for applications where the benefits of PCB or external antenna can be utilised and ATZB-24-A2 module with dual chip antenna satisfying the needs of applications requiring integrated, small-footprint antenna design. ZigBit module is compatible with robust IEEE 802.15.4/ZigBee stack that supports a self-healing, self organizing mesh network, while optimizing network traffic and minimizing power consumption. Atmel offers two stack configurations: BitCloud and SerialNet.
	


    
          
    Ultra compact size 24 x 13.5 x 2.0 mm for ATZB-24-A2
          
    Innovative (patent-pending) balanced dual chip antenna design
          
    High RX sensitivity (-101 dBm)

overview:
The AR166-LC is an advanced real time kernel for the Infineon XC16x and C16x as well as the STMicroelectronics ST10 families of microcontrollers with node locked license type available in downloadable form. It is designed to solve several problems in embedded programs. While it is possible to implement an embedded program without using a real time kernel, a proven kernel like AR saves time and makes software development easier.
	


    
          
    Multitasking allows to manage several jobs (tasks) on a single CPU
          
    Real time control allows to configure tasks that operations execute within a defined period of time
          
    Flash file system allows to create, save, read and modify files stored on a standard flash memory
          
    TCP/IP networking is a ground up implementation specifically designed for embedded applications

title: TEFLCST3 MATRIX, S/W, FLOWCODE 3, STUDENT, FOR PIC
overview:
The TEFLCST3 is a Flow code 3 microcontroller development software for PICmicro MCUs. This Flow code 3 is one of the World's most advanced graphical programming languages for microcontrollers. The great advantage of Flow code is that it allows those with little experience to create complex electronic systems in minutes. Flow code achieves this in two steps, firstly students drag and drop flowchart symbols onto the screen, fill in the dialog boxes when prompted. Then Flow code compiles the flow chart into code that is downloaded to a microcontroller which executes the program. This Flow code contains standard flow chart icons and electronic components that allow you to create a virtual electronic system on screen. The range of components is large and includes simple switches and LEDs, communication bus interfaces like I2C and SPI, and more advanced components such as Bluetooth and internet servers.
	


    
          
    Easy to use interface
          
    Allows complex systems to be developed and managed quickly
          
    Supports most PICmicro and Atmel AVR microcontrollers
          
    Save time and money
          
    Fast & flexible
          
    Error free results
          
    Open architecture
          
    Flow code is supported by a wide range of materials for learning, developing the electronic systems

                        Embedded Design & Development

title: SW006015 MICROCHIP, MPLAB C COMPLIER, FOR PIC32
overview:

A free evaluation is available by downloading the Evaluation Edition. It has no code size limit and provides complete functionality for 60 days. The compiler is fully compatible with MPLAB IDE and popular third party IDEs.

title: SW006012 MICROCHIP, MPLAB C COMPILER, FOR PIC24, DSPIC
overview:
The SW006012 is a MPLAB C compiler for PIC24 MCUs and dsPIC DSCs (also known as MPLAB C30), full featured ANSI compliant C compiler for the 16bit devices PIC24, dsPIC30F and dsPIC33F. MPLAB C is a 32bit windows console application as well as a fully integrated component of MPLAB integrated development environment, allowing source level debugging with the MPLAB REAL ICE Emulator, MPLAB ICD 2 In Circuit Debugger and MPLAB SIM Simulator. The dsPIC family of (dsPIC30F and dsPIC33F DSCs) combines the high performance required in DSP applications with standard microcontroller features needed for embedded applications. PIC24 MCUs are identical to the dsPIC DSCs with the exception that they do not have the digital signal controller module or that subset of instructions. All of these devices are fully supported by a complete set of software development tools, including an optimizing C compiler, an assembler, a linker and an archiver/librarian.
	


    
          
    ANSI compliant with standard, math, memory, data conversion and math libraries
          
    Generates relocatable object modules for enhanced code reuse
          
    Optimised to generate as much as 30% less code than other 16bit MCU compilers
          
    Strong support for in line assembly when total control is absolutely necessary
          
    Peripheral library for quick coding using Microchip device peripherals
          
    Allows code and data to be located at absolute addresses
          
    Supports advanced code size optimizations
          
    Support for DSP accumulator registers from the C language (dsPIC devices only)
          
    Support for DSP intrinsincs (functions) from the C language
          
    Free unrestricted evaluation version of the C compiler
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

                        
          
    

Footnotes
90 Day Warranty only.  After Expiration of Warranty returns must be processed via Microchip.

title: C0SI1-WW7500-T512-UK AUTODESK, Eagle, 3 Year Term, 1 User, Premium Edition, Linux / Mac OS / Win - UK Customers
overview:
The C0SI1-WW7500-T512-UK from Autodesk is powerful, easy to use AUTODESK EAGLE PCB design software. It is affordable powerful tool for designing printed circuit boards. The name EAGLE is an acronym which stands for Easily Applicable Graphical Layout Editor. This software offers user friendly, powerful and affordable solutions for PCB design including streamlined schematic design, robust power full PCB layout and accessible library content. User can take ideas from concept to reality with the easiest schematic editor, connect all the pieces of design together with the advanced PCB layout tools and take all the busywork out of design process with access to hundreds of ready to use part libraries. This Autodesk EAGLE PCB design software made for every engineer on Windows, Mac and Linux.
	


    
          
    Premium 2017 edition, 1 user licence and 3 year term
          
    Includes 999 schematic sheets, 16 signal layers and no limit to board area
          
    Schematic features multi sheets, electrical rule check (ERC) and dynamic design sync
          
    PCB layout features assembly variants, high speed technologies, design rule check (DRC)
          
    Library features 3D component models, complete parts, dynamic part data, accessible library content
          
    Designing of most complex, multi layered PCBs in less time with intuitive routing tools
          
    Instantaneous BGA fan-out, simple design re-use
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

title: ARF8041AA ADEUNIS, AMR Sensor Wireless M-Bus Transmitter
overview:
The ARF8041AA is an AMR Sensor from Adeunis RF is a ready-to-use radio transmitter allowing transforming any type of 0 to 10V, 4 to 20mA and I/O sensor into a wireless sensor. It meets the needs of users looking to remotely monitor the data of all kinds (temperature, pressure, level, humidity, CO2, speed, brightness and opening). Using the wireless M-Bus protocol it allows integrating the AMR sensor into any already deployed network or creating its own ecosystem from the AMR product range of Adeunis RF.

Integrating a high performance Adeunis RF radio module, the ARF51-PRO can design unique solutions to connect or to measure wireless I/O over long distances (up to 20km) or in disturbed industrial environments. overview:
The ARF7944BA is a 500mW ultra long range Radio Modem that enables a wireless bidirectional half duplex data transmission up to 15km. To enable rapid implementation, the ARF169 ULR is equipped with a SubD9 serial connector which offers automatic recognition of the type (RS232/RS485) and data rate (auto-baud). In order to permit their use for applications over very long distances or in harsh environment, it offers repeater function. The small, lightweight and robust body is including a DIN rail mounting for immediate integration in industrial environment.

title: MDKPL-KD-40001 ARM, Keil MDK-PLUS Edition, 1 Year, FlexLM, Download
SW006011 MICROCHIP, MPLAB C COMPILER, FOR PIC18
overview:
SW006011 is a MPLAB C18 Compiler for PIC18 MCUs is a full featured ANSI compliant C compiler for the PIC18 family of PICmicro 8 bit MCUs. MPLAB C is a 32 bit Windows console application as well as a fully integrated component of MPLAB Integrated Development Environment (IDE), allowing source level debugging with MPLAB software and hardware debug engines. Projects, compiler switches and linker customizations can be controlled completely within MPLAB IDE to provide a full graphical front end for this powerful compiler. Text errors in source code and breakpoints instantly switch to corresponding lines in the proper file. The Standard Eval Version is free, it has all the features of the full compiler and libraries. After 60 days, the optimizations related to procedural abstraction and to the extended instruction set of the newer PIC18XXXX devices will be disabled. Code compiled after the expiration date will function but may occupy more memory space.
	


    
          
    ANSI 89 compatibility
          
    Generation of relocatable object modules for enhanced code reuse
          
    Compatibility with object modules generated by the MPASM assembler
          
    Transparent read/write access to external memory
          
    Efficient code generator engine with multi level optimization
          
    Extensive library support, including PWM, SPI, UART, USART, string manipulation and math libraries
          
    Full user level control over data and code memory allocation
          
    MPLIB allows easy use of included libraries and for user created libraries
          
    Supports both a small and a large memory model for efficient use of memory
          
    Extensive multi pass optimizations. And Supports new PIC18F extended mode instructions

title: EF-VIVADO-DESIGN-FL XILINX, Vivado Design Suite: HL Design Edition Floating (Server) License
overview:
The EF-VIVADO-DESIGN-FL from Xilinx is Vivado® Design Suite with HL design edition and floating license. It offers a new approach for ultra high productivity with next generation C/C++ and IP based design. When coupled with the new UltraFast™ high level productivity design methodology guide, this unique combination is proven to accelerate productivity by enabling designers to work at a high level of abstraction while facilitating design reuse and users can realize a 10 to 15x productivity gain over traditional approaches. This tool suite is architected to increase the overall productivity for designing, integrating and implementing systems using the Xilinx® UltraScale™, 7 series devices, Zynq® UltraScale+™ MPSoC device and Zynq®-7000 All Programmable (AP) SoC. The new HL edition supplies design teams with the tools and methodology needed to leverage C-based design and optimized reuse, IP sub system reuse, integration automation and accelerated design closure.

    Vivado® serial I/O, analyzer debug IP (ILA/VIO/IBERT)
          
    Software defined IP generation with Vivado® high level synthesis
          
    Block based IP integration with Vivado® IP integrator
          
    Brings ultra high productivity to mainstream systems and platform designers
          
    4x faster implementation, 20% better design density
          
    Up to 3-speedgrade performance, advantage for low end, mid-range and 35% power advantage in high end

title: EF-SDSOC-NL XILINX, SDSoC Environment, Floating License
overview:
The EF-SDSOC-NL from Xilinx is a SDSoC™ (software defined system-on-chip) Development Environment with node locked license. It provides familiar embedded C/C++/OpenCL application development experience including an easy to use Eclipse IDE and a comprehensive design environment for heterogeneous Zynq® All Programmable SoC and MPSoC deployment. Complete with industry's first C/C++/OpenCL full-system optimizing compiler, SDSoC delivers system level profiling, automated software acceleration in programmable logic, automated system connectivity generation and libraries to speed programming. It also enables end user and third party platform developers to rapidly define, integrate and verify system level solutions and enable their end customers with a customized programming environment. Xilinx OpenCV libraries are now available featuring 50+ hardware optimized OpenCV functions including Gausian, Median, Bilateral, Harris corner, Canny edge detection, HoG, SVM, LK Optical Flow and many m

    Automated run time instrumentation of cache, memory and bus utilizations
          
    Enables early and rapid generation and exploration for optimal total system architecture

EPCWIN-2000 NUMBER ONE SYSTEMS, SOFTWARE, EASY-PC, WIN, 2000 PIN
overview:
The EPCWIN-2000 easy PC for Windows product family is a modern 32bit Windows based product running under Windows 95 to XP. Each software module can be used together as an integrated electronics design environment. The easy PC For Windows is an advanced professional Schematic and PCB design system. Easy PC allows the user to draw the schematic and simulate it using the easy Spice A/D mixed mode simulator. The schematic editor enables easy modification of the components and values to check the performance of the circuit as required. Once the circuit is correct, within the same environment and using the same libraries, the schematic is translated to the PCB design editor and the printed circuit board is laid out. The easy router II auto router enables the conversion from the ratsnest into copper tracks. At all times the connectivity and design rules can be checked automatically to ensure that the PCB matches the schematic and that all the rules set have been obeyed.
	


    
          
    Fully integrated 32bit Windows program
          
    Schematic and PCB design editors included as standard
          
    Supplied with libraries and easy editing library manager
          
    A professional PCB design package capable of dense complex PCBs or simple single sided designs
          
    Link to optional integrated Spice based A/D mixed mode simulator
          
    Comprehensive design rules checking between schematic and PCB designs at all times
          
    True connective database, everything stays connected when moved or edited
          
    Unlimited layers (of any type)
          
    Accepts netlists from other systems such as OrCAD and EWB
          
    Pin limited variants available for 2000pins
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

information.value: Fully integrated 32bit Windows program, Schematic and PCB design, Supplied with libraries

EF-VIVADO-SYSTEM-FL XILINX, Vivado Design Suite: HL System Edition, Floating (Server) License
overview:
The EF-VIVADO-SYSTEM-FL from Xilinx is Vivado® Design Suite with HL system edition and floating license. It offers a new approach for ultra high productivity with next generation C/C++ and IP based design. When coupled with the new UltraFast™ high level productivity design methodology guide, this unique combination is proven to accelerate productivity by enabling designers to work at a high level of abstraction while facilitating design reuse and users can realize a 10 to 15x productivity gain over traditional approaches. This tool suite is architected to increase the overall productivity for designing, integrating and implementing systems using the Xilinx® UltraScale™, 7 series devices, Zynq® UltraScale+™ MPSoC device and Zynq®-7000 All Programmable (AP) SoC. The new HL edition supplies design teams with the tools and methodology needed to leverage C-based design and optimized reuse, IP sub system reuse, integration automation and accelerated design closure.
	


    
          
    Vivado HL system edition includes all features of the design edition plus system generator for DSP
          
    Partial reconfiguration, synthesis, place and route
          
    Vivado® simulator, Vivado® device programmer, Vivado® logic analyzer
          
    Vivado® serial I/O, analyzer debug IP (ILA/VIO/IBERT)
          
    Software defined IP generation with Vivado® high level synthesis
          
    Block based IP integration with Vivado® IP integrator
          
    Model based DSP design integration with system generator for DSP
          
    Brings ultra high productivity to mainstream systems and platform designers
          
    4x faster implementation, 20% better design density
          
    Up to 3-speedgrade performance, advantage for low end, mid-range and 35% power advantage in high end
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

title: SPC5-HTCOMP-NLTL STMICROELECTRONICS, Compiler, Power Architecture, Node Locked, 1 Licence
overview:
The SPC5-HTCOMP-NLTL is a 1-year HighTec GNU "C" Compiler delivered fully integrated inside SPC5 Studio development environment and comes with 30 days free trial full feature support. It is an open source high performing compiler (code size and compiling speed) designed by HighTec to make affordable to get started with SPC5 MCUs. Customer front line support is delivered by STMicroelectronics including libraries bug fixing. The migration to HighTec commercial version is granted and effortless thanks to make file compatibility. HighTec compiler supports SPC56 and SPC57 product families. One year license node locked activation code can be ordered directly from ST franchised distributors. To install HighTec compiler download SPC5Studio from ST WEB (free download) and follow the installation procedure.

    Open source libraries
          
    Support and maintenance service provided through STMicroelectronics first line support

PK166-T ARM, Keil CA166 166 Microcontroller Developers Kit, 1 Year, Node Locked, Shipment
overview:
The PK166-T is a professional developer's kit for the 166 microcontroller family with one year term node locked license type available in DVD. It supports all available XC16x, C16x and ST10 derivatives and enables to write and test programs in C or assembly using the powerful C166, C167, and XC167 instruction sets. We should consider the PK166-T professional developer's kit if we will work with a variety of 166 microcontrollers, need to write code in C, require a simulator or don't have an emulator and create complex, single chip applications that require a small real time kernel.
	


    
          
    Onchip peripherals and key features of 166 microcontrollers are easy to access with PK166-T
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

                        
          
    

    
       Contents
        
            µVision integrated development environment, debugger and simulator, Keil XC16x/C16x/ST10 compilation tools, MON166 target monitor, RTX166 tiny real time kernel.
        
    

Footnotes
The C166 compiler, assembler and linker are limited to 4KB of object code and source code may be of any size.

title: MDKPR-KT-40000 ARM, Keil MDK-PRO Professional Edition, FlexLM, Shipment
overview:
The MDKPR-KT-40000 is a professional edition software development environment for Cortex-M, Cortex-R4, ARM7 and ARM9 processor based devices with perpetual flex floating license type available in DVD. This microcontroller development kit is specifically designed for microcontroller applications and it is easy to learn and use, yet powerful enough for the most demanding embedded applications. It combines the ARM C/C++ compiler with the Keil RTX real time operating system and middleware libraries. All tools are integrated into µVision which includes project management, editor and debugger in a single easy to use environment. The fully integrated ARM C/C++ compiler offers significant code size and performance benefits to the embedded developer, however, MDK can also be used with the GNU GCC compiler. The MDK professional includes a flexible file system and middleware libraries for TCP, USB, and CAN peripherals.
	


    
          
    Industry leading ARM C/C++ compilation toolchain
          
    µVision4 IDE, debugger and simulation environment
          
    Keil RTX deterministic, small footprint real time operating system (with source code)
          
    TCP/IP networking suite offers multiple protocols and various applications
          
    USB device and USB host stacks are provided with standard driver classes
          
    Complete GUI library for embedded systems with graphical user interfaces
          
    ULINKpro enables on the fly analysis of running application and record every executed instruction
          
    Execution profiler and performance analyzer enable program optimization
          
    Numerous example projects help user quickly become familiar with MDK-ARM powerful built in features
          
    CMSIS Cortex microcontroller software interface standard compliant
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

title: CWP-MCTB-567XK-N NXP, Motor Control Development Toolbox, Power Architecture, 1 Licence
overview:
The CWP-MCTB-567XK-N motor control development toolbox provides an integrated development environment and tool chain for configuring and generating all of the necessary software (including initialization routines, device drivers and a real-time scheduler) to execute motor control algorithms on the Qorivva MPC564xL and MPC567xK automotive MCUs. The toolbox includes the automotive math and motor control library set developed by NXP's Motor Control Center of Excellence. It also includes dozens of blocks optimized for fast execution on NXP MCUs. with bit accurate results compared to Simulink simulation using single precision math. Built in support for software and processor in the loop (SIL and PIL), enables automated comparison and plotting of numerical results.
	


    
          
    Generate code for standalone application with direct download to target support
          
    Support for MPC564xL/MPC567xK MCU families single/dual core, IEC 61508 (SIL3) and ISO 26262 (ASIL-D)
          
    Optimized library blocks including park/clarke transforms, digital filters, and general functions
          
    I/O blocks including CAN, SPI, PIT timer, Sine Wave Generation, eTimer, PWM and A/D
          
    On target profiling of functions and tasks
          
    Data acquisition and calibration using Free MASTER tool
          
    Boot loader utility for programming application in flash or RAM
          
    Seamless integration with embedded coder including SIL and PIL test
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Motor Drive & Control, 
                    
                        Industrial, 
                    
                        Automotive, 
                    
                        Automation & Process Control

title: BUNDS-KT-4PE10 ARM, Arm DS-5 Professional + ULINKpro-D Bundle, Perpetual, Floating
BUNDS-KT-4PE00 ARM, Arm DS-5 Professional + DSTREAM Bundle, Perpetual, Floating
overview:
BUNDS-KT-4PE00 is a bundle of DS-5 Professional Edition with Floating license and DSTREAM. The ARM DS-5 tool chain enables engineers to develop robust and highly optimized embedded software for ARM application processors, such as the Cortex-A series, Cortex-R real time processor and other ARM embedded processors. The DS-5 tool chain comprises tools such as the best in class ARM C/C++ Compiler, a powerful Linux/Android/RTOS aware debugger, the ARM Streamline system wide performance analyzer and real time system model simulators, all conveniently packaged in a user friendly integrated development environment based on Eclipse. DSTREAM high performance debug and trace unit which enables software debug and optimization on any ARM processor based hardware target. DSTREAM enables the connection of DS-5 Debugger to ARM based devices via JTAG or Serial Wire Debug. DSTREAM uses FPGA acceleration to deliver high download speeds and fast stepping through code on single and multi processor devices.
	


    
          
    Support for all ARM processors
          
    Powerful C/C++ industry leading compilation tools
          
    Fast and accurate simulation enabling software development without the need for hardware
          
    Flexible C/C++ editor and project manager
          
    Run control debug and trace unit supporting all ARM and Cortex processors
          
    USB 2.0 and Ethernet interface allows direct and remote connections from the host PC
          
    Support for JTAG and Serial Wire Debug target interfaces
          
    Code download at speeds of up to 2500KBytes per second
          
    JTAG clocks of up to 60MHz provide fast software upload over the existing debug port 
          
    Device bring up and test utilities

                        Embedded Design & Development

title: AR166-F ARM, Keil AR166 Advanced RTOS License, Floating, Download
overview:
The AR166-F is an advanced real time kernel for the Infineon XC16x and C16x as well as the STMicroelectronics ST10 families of microcontrollers with floating license type available in DVD. It is designed to solve several problems in embedded programs. While it is possible to implement an embedded program without using a real time kernel, a proven kernel like AR saves time and makes software development easier.
	


    
          
    Multitasking allows to manage several jobs (tasks) on a single CPU
          
    Real time control allows to configure tasks that operations execute within a defined period of time
          
    Flash file system allows to create, save, read and modify files stored on a standard flash memory
          
    TCP/IP networking is a ground up implementation specifically designed for embedded applications
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

title: 978-0-9896-140-23-DL THE MATHWORKS, Matlab / Simulink, Student Suite, 1 User, Windows
overview:
The 978-0-9896-140-23 from The Mathworks is a MATLAB and Simulink Student Suite. It makes easy to model, simulate and analyze fun projects such as a personal weather station or a face detecting robot. Build and realize them on popular low cost hardware platforms like Arduino and Raspberry Pi. MATLAB is a high level technical computing language and interactive environment for algorithm development, data visualization, data analysis and numeric computation. Using MATLAB, user can solve technical computing problems faster than with traditional programming languages. You can integrate your MATLAB code with other languages and applications. Simulink is a platform for multidomain simulation and model based design of dynamic systems. It provides an interactive graphical environment and a customizable set of block libraries that let you accurately design, simulate, implement and test dynamic systems, such as control signal processing and communications.
	


    
          
    Development environment for managing code, files and data
          
    2D and 3D graphics functions for visualizing data
          
    Object oriented programming for rapid application development
          
    Extensive and expandable libraries of predefined blocks
          
    Built-in support on windows for proto typing, testing and running embedded/ autonomous models
          
    Ability to manage complex designs by segmenting models into hierarchies of design components
          
    MATLAB function blocks for bringing MATLAB algorithms into Simulink
          
    Accelerated simulation modes for running simulations interpretively or at compiled C code speeds
          
    Graphical debugger to examine simulation results and diagnose unexpected behaviour in design
          
    Full access to MATLAB for analyzing and visualizing data, developing GUI and creating model data

                        Embedded Design & Development

title: 11-100-15-1 P E ALTIUM, CircuitStudio, Commercial License, 1 User, Professional Edition, Windows ECAD SWITCH PROMO
overview:
The 11-100-15-1 P E from Altium is a CircuitStudio professional PCB tool that's professional, affordable and intuitive. It is built on 25 years of Altium R&D experience and features a modern interface so user can get their design done faster and easier. CircuitStudio provides the tools necessary to capture and layout boards and produce the manufacturing data with which to turn ideas into physical reality. It has intuitive and streamlined interface that helps user to do job quickly and efficiently. Native 3D PCB editing in CircuitStudio lets user to visualize, navigate and edit your board as it appears in the real world. It gives user the flexibility to create detailed and comprehensive schematic designs from the outset and quickly synchronize them with a PCB for board layout. CircuitStudio allows you to easily import your existing designs from CadSoft EAGLE in a few easy steps.
	


    
          
    Standalone license plus 1st year subscription
          
    Create complete multi-sheet and hierarchical schematic designs
          
    Mixed mode simulation capabilities are included right from inside the tool
          
    Altium industry-standard schematic editor and file format
          
    Constraint driven interactive routing, built-in autorouter engine, support for differential pairs
          
    Content library of over 350,000 parts and growing
          
    Integrated live supply chain management and visibility
          
    Easily create custom parts from existing library or from scratch, step export capability
          
    View and navigate your board in native 3D to verify mechanical form
          
    Interactive pin swapping with managed synchronization with schematic
          
    
    
    
          
    Operates on Windows OS
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

title: 100001-BCPICPRO SOURCEBOOST TECHNOLOGIES, COMPILER, PIC18, PIC16, PIC12, PRO
overview:
The 100001-BCPICPRO is a BoostC Pro License C compiler. BoostC is the latest generation C compiler that works with PIC18, PIC16 and some PIC12 processors. BoostC was designed to rival Hi tech C compiler. This ANSI C compatible compiler addresses limitations that exist in our C2C plus compiler. It supports features like source level debugging, signed data types, structures/unions and pointers. The BoostC compiler will eventually replace the C2C-plus compiler. The BoostC compiler can be used with the SourceBoost IDE (Integrated development environment), or can be integrated into Microchip MPLAB. BoostC works under MS Windows 95/98/ME/NT/2000/XP.

title: PK51-UD-LC ARM, Keil PK51 Maintenance Restart, Node Locked, Download
PK51-T-LC ARM, Keil PK51 8051 Professional Developers Kit, 1 Year, Node Locked, Download
overview:
The PK51-T-LC professional developer's kit for the 8051 microcontroller family with one year term node locked license type available in downloadable form. It supports all 8051 derivatives including new devices with extended memory and instruction sets (like the Dallas 390/5240/400, Philips 51MX, and Analog Devices MicroConverters) and classic devices and IP cores from companies like Analog Devices, Atmel, Cypress Semiconductor, Dallas Semiconductor, Goal, Hynix, Infineon, Intel, NXP (founded by Philips), OKI, Silicon Labs, SMSC, STMicroelectronics, Synopsis, TDK, Temic, Texas Instruments, and Winbond. We should consider the PK51-T-LC professional developer's kit if we will work with a variety of 8051 microcontrollers, will develop code for the Dallas 390 or Philips 51MX devices, need to write code in C, require a simulator or don't have an emulator and create complex, single chip applications that require a small real time kernel.
	


    
          
    Onchip peripherals and key features of 8051 microcontrollers are easy to access with PK51-T-LC
        
    
    
    
 

    
            Applications
            
            
                        Embedded Design & Development

                        
          
    

    
       Contents
        
            µVision integrated development environment, debugger and simulator, Keil extended 8051 compilation tools, Keil classic 8051 compilation tools, Target debuggers, RTX51 tiny real time kernel.
        
    

Footnotes
The 8051 compiler, assembler, linker and debugger are limited to 2KB of object code and source code may be of any size.

title: OM13060,598 NXP, IDE, LPCXpresso, ARM Cortex, Professional Edition, Linux, Mac OS, Windows, 1 Licence
overview:
The OM13060,598 is a 1-user professional LPCXpresso IDE Software License features the industry standard GNU tool chain with our own optimized C libraries and the latest version of Eclipse with many ease-of-use and Microcontroller specific enhancements to simplify development with NXP LPC microcontrollers. The LPCXpresso IDE is a comprehensive, highly-integrated Eclipse-based IDE software development tool chain for NXP LPC microcontrollers based on Cortex-M, ARM7 and ARM9 cores. NXP is continually updating the LPCXpresso IDE to make sure the latest advances from ARM's compiler development team and the eclipse foundation are available for your LPC projects. Being based on Eclipse, the LPCXpresso IDE also allows plugins to support an ever-growing set of specialist tools.
	


    
          
    Eclipse-based IDE with many ease-of-use enhancements
          
    Can be enhanced with many Eclipse plugins
          
    Built-in CVS source control, GIT, Subversion, TFS and others are available for download
          
    Command-line tools included for integration into build, test and manufacturing systems
          
    Built-in flash programming
          
    Enhanced trace and profiling features
          
    One year of email-based support from NXP engineers in addition to free Forum-based support
          
    High-level and instruction-level debug
          
    Views of CPU registers and on-chip peripherals
          
    Support for multiple devices on JTAG scan-chain
          
    
    
    
          
    Device-specific support for LPC Cortex-M-, ARM7- and ARM9-based MCUs

overview:
The MDKPR-KD-40000 is a professional edition software development environment for Cortex-M, Cortex-R4, ARM7 and ARM9 processor based devices with perpetual flex floating license type available in downloadable form. This microcontroller development kit is specifically designed for microcontroller applications and it is easy to learn and use, yet powerful enough for the most demanding embedded applications. It combines the ARM C/C++ compiler with the Keil RTX real time operating system and middleware libraries. All tools are integrated into µVision which includes project management, editor and debugger in a single easy to use environment. The fully integrated ARM C/C++ compiler offers significant code size and performance benefits to the embedded developer, however, MDK can also be used with the GNU GCC compiler. The MDK professional includes a flexible file system and middleware libraries for TCP, USB, and CAN peripherals.

This receiver can acquire Wireless M-Bus frames and transit them to any collection device and/or operating data with a RS232, RS485 serial port or USB port. The TNC socket can accept any type of 868MHz antenna and deport it so as to optimize the level of reception of radio frames.
